1b1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shri dz+nyA na gar b+han ma yo ga ni mahA ta natra rA dza dzA tir dze/ 'od
1b2(rgyud): smad / dpal mi shes stong po zhes bya rnal 'byor 'i chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i tshul lo// dpa
1b3(rgyud): rdo rjesems dpa' sa phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
1b4(rgyud): rirab kyi rtse mor bye ba phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs kyi mkha' 'gro nga mkhar 'gro mas yongs su bskor
1b5(rgyud): nas b+ha gul chen po'i skyed mos tshal na bzhugs so// der bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo legs dgyes
2a1(rgyud): dbang mod lhan cig tu rol pa mdzad pa'i tshe rje btsun la baspu langs so// de'i dus su bcom ldan 'das ma legs dkyis kyi sbyor la
2a2(rgyud): las rangs te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir
2a3(rgyud): nyid kyi skul bsdu langs lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ kye bcom ldan 'das mede la dgol pa ci zhig yod/ gang gi don gyi
2a4(rgyud): phyir nga'i skul ba spu langs pa de ni gsang ba chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol ba/ gsang ba chen po lags mod kyang mchog gi dbang phyug
2a5(rgyud): bka' stsal cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga yis lags dkyus kyi bde 'a nyams su myong zhing steng dang 'og na gnas pa'i dga'
2b1(rgyud): rnamam sa dus pa ltar gas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis paka' stsal ba/ sang nga nan gnas pa 'daga' ba skad byed ma rnams la ga shig 'dus pa na nas ma shes/ bcom ldan 'dasams gas pa/ 
2b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de skad du de ltar ni lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang mi shes pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bdag gis na zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni so so rang gis nyams su myongs
2b3(rgyud): yin mod kyang / 'on kyang khyod kyi dngas bshad par byaste/ dga'abral gyis dga' ba 'byung ba'i steng phrag 'dun bcucu gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi cha'i dra ba'ang zhing g.yos pa rnam gyis tshul shar ro// tshul
2b4(rgyud): sharabs thig le'i rgyal po zhu'o// thig le'i rgyal pa zhu ba las steng dang 'og na gnas pa'i dga' ba spyad byed ma rnams la 'dus pa'o// de skad ces thos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la maso pos phyag 'tshal
2b5(rgyud): dam du byud ba byas nas ma macu'i bdud ci'i btung bas dgyes par byaste phyin pa yang nub ma da// kye bcom ldan 'das dga'abral gyi dga' ba'i dus su 'dus pa lags na/ del sbyor ba med pa gang gi
2b6(rgyud): dus lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dris pa yang dag dgyes pa mchog/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnyed dka' ba// dga' bral dus su sbyor ba med// de ni dga' bral dga' ba min/ 
2b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das mas gsal pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das dga' bral gyi dga' ba dang dag 'bral la khyad par ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dka' mo khyod ci'i phyir de skad ces smra/ dga'
2b8(rgyud): bral gyi dga' ba dang dka' bral gnyis la khyad par cher yod pa de brjod par bya'o// gang zhig dag 'bral gyi dga' ba de zhu pa gnas pa ste 'pho ba la sogs pa dang bral ba'o// gang zhig dga'abral de ni dga' ba dang / 
3a1(rgyud): ru/  na / la da ga gnas pa/ mtshogs pa samam // mam ldan ma
3a2(rgyud): gsol pa/ rang gis nyams su song ba'i mtshan nyid dga' bral gyi dga' ba dang / ldan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i khyad pa ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lhan cag skyes pa'i
3a3(rgyud): dga' ba da dngos po yang ma yin/ dngos po ma yin pa yang ma yin/ gsang ba yang ma yin/ ye shes kyang ma yin/ ye shes las byab yang ma yin/ sred pa yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das
3a4(rgyud): mdas yid/ char yang ma yin/ thig le yang ma yin/ tshul yang ma yin/ rgyal tsam yang ma yid/ mchog sa ma rin/ rgan dmachog kyang ma yin/ shar ba yang ma yin/ nub pa yang
3a5(rgyud): gzugs kyang ba yin/ swa yang ma yin/ bre yang ma yin/ ro lang ba yin/ len bya yang 'ayin/ yi de yang ma yin/ rna mangs yin/ bden pa yang ma yin// khams kyang ma yin/ shes ra
3a6(rgyud): kyang ma yin/ thabs kyang ma yin/ thim pa yang ma yin/ longs spyod kyang ma yin/ dbang yang ma yin/ sbal ba yang ma yin/ mo sa kyang ma yin/ longs spyod kyang ma yin/ lus kyang ma yin
3a7(rgyud): ngag kyang ma yin/ yid kyang ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad dang rnam par bral ba/ mi zad pa/ dri ma med pa/ skye ba med pa/ 'gag pa med pa/ rtag tu shar ba'o// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ 
3a8(rgyud): lta bu'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba gang las rnyed/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bral gyi dga' ba nyams su myong ba las rjed de/ de bzhin du bsam gtan la sogs pas ma yin
3b1(rgyud): ldan 'das mas gas pa/ ldan cing skyes pa'i dga' ba de/ dag 'dral gyi da gas ma sa maldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nag
3b2(rgyud): dka' ba'i tshu yin te 'bras bu // bcom ldan 'dasams gsol pa// kun gyis grub pa'i/ na cig skyes pa'i dga'ab 'byung ba la rgyu'i dngos pas dkris par chis/ rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro// 
3b3(rgyud): sreg pa ladud pa bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de sad rnaM dam ma yin te/ dang por sreg pa med pa de rjod pa 'byung ba gang las 'ong / de la bu'i rigs pas lhan ga
3b4(rgyud): bco ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ de ltar lags na lhan cig skyem pa las dag 'phrul gyi dga' ba ni tshul yin la 'bras bu yang yinan/ 'o kyi 'di tshun gnyis su dab ba dang / 'bras bu yang ga
3b5(rgyud): sal rgyu dang/ 'byung ba rgya'o// 'bram bu ma bzhin no/ ma na das mas gsol pa/ bye bco ldan 'das gas ba dang / 
3b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal po/ gsal yi rkyeni dag 'phrul gyi dag sa/ de ltar ma ma bzhin no// 'dra gan dga' b.las cog gdug /  ldan la
3b7(rgyud): ba'i le'u su dang po'o// / bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ gang nig dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig pa'i da kyi rgyal ba las phyag rgya chen pa'i don bstan pa dpob par bya ba'i khon du de'i thabs
4a1(rgyud): sa'o// na pa shes pa na mas kyi yo ldan pa'o// shed 'ad
4a2(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po de yang 'ad gsal ma yin pa gzhan las mi rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das mis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od gsal shes 'gye ba ji ltar lags/ gang du gnas
4a3(rgyud): ba yin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od gas lan nam mkha'i dbus su gnas pa'i thig le'i nga bo ste de ni phyag rgya chen po rnyed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ re
4a4(rgyud): 'ododags la na ltar rnyed pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ las dang dmatshig dang ye shes dang chos kyi phyag rgyas so// bcom ldan 'das mas gsal pa/ phyag tu rnams nyid nig
4a5(rgyud): las rnyed par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang bskur ba phyi'i phyag rgyal brten nas nang gi phyag rgya rnams rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ phyi dang nang gi phyag rgya
4a6(rgyud): gan sa gang du gnas par 'gyur/ mtshan ni sa ru/ rang shi shing \u0f89\u0fa4/ de nga ni ma bra lags/ com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ 'di na / sa byed gas
4b1(rgyud): shes dang/ na shin shi la//  pa kya na ga' ba'i mong ldan pa gnon dum la po pral bum nyam par ldan pas kya yang lu ga par byas so// gas du na
4b2(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i gnon nam ga na yang bcu 'debs pa las so// shes ras pa shes ni khams kyi ladang ldan pa'i kunon nu la sbyin cig bsgrub pa dang 'grub pa'i ma'as chen po las zhu ba 'pha ba'i dul she
4b3(rgyud): bas su myong bas so// da de bzhin bzhi pa ni shes rab ye shes de nyid brtan par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir de ltar de bzhin zhes bstan pa yin no// brtan par byas pa tsam gyis drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'dab ma'i
4b4(rgyud): gtu bzhi mnyam par sbyar bar 'gyur ba yin na// de yang 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / 'gro ba dang / rten pa'i dbos so// 'jug pa ni gtum ma'o// gnas pa ni rang bzhin gyis rtog pa med pam
4b5(rgyud): gror bya dang nga ma'i 'o// rten pa'i dpos sogasa'i ma'o// don dam par phyag rgya chen po gcig tu/ na kyang las khye bzhin gyis bzhi sa bya'o// bcom ldan 'das pas gsol pa/ 
4b6(rgyud): 'dang de rnams sa las skye rang bzhin gyi bye brag je ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bga' stsa ga ne ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / drag pos/ las kyi bye brag gis phyag rgya chen pos thob pa'o// 
4b7(rgyud): ma ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni ba dang / rgyas la dang / dbang dang / drag po rnams kyi ming dang spyod pa ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba ni rgod pa/ 
4b8(rgyud): rgyas pa deb ltapa'o// dbang ne lag pas 'khrud pas so// drag po ni gaN+DI'i gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa'o// de rnams la sod pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i spyod pa dang / 
5a1(rgyud): gas dral gyi 'dul zhugs kyi spyod pa dang / rang dbang gi spyod pas so// dpal ye shes snying po las phyag rgya chen po dang / dbang bskur ba'i don zhes bya ba'i laT gyi gnyis par/ 
5a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ dbang bskur ba'i dus su dkyil la ba rnams ri su/ slob dpon ne re la bus bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ slob dpon gyi dbang bsngar ba'i dus su rdus
5a3(rgyud): tshon la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// gsang ba'i dbang la bla ma la dbul ba'i dkyil 'khor ni rang byung gi me tog dang ldan pa'i me tog gis so// shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus su byang chub kyi sa ma
5a4(rgyud): bzhi ba'i dus su gzhan ma yin pa byang chub kyi sems 'ba' zhig dkyil 'khor gyis so// de la slob dpon ni mtshan thams cad kyis brgyad pa dang / rgyud rnams
5a5(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa dang / dbang bskur ba la mkhas pa dang / thugs rje drang ldan pa dang / rgya che ba la mol pa dang / sngags la sogs pa dang / rab tu sbyor ba la mkhas pa dang / dngos grub thob pa'i slob
5a6(rgyud): dpon la sogs pas dbang bskur ba dang / dngos grub thob pa'i bla ma'i bka'i gnang ba thob pa dang / yang na rang nyid dngos grub thob pa des ni dkyil 'khor dang / dbang bskur ba'i rim pa dang / bsgrub za
5a7(rgyud): la sogs pa bya'o// de bzhin du rtog ge pa las sogs pas ne ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das pas gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das slob dpon gyi na dbang bsgyur ba'o// dkyil 'khor mtshan ma'i
5a8(rgyud): lags// dkyil 'khor gyi ni tshad ji tsam// gtso bo bdag po yang ni gang // ngo bo gang gis slob ma gzung // las kyi slob dpon rnga lta bu// mchod pa rnams ni nga ltar lags// bla ma'i yon ni je
6a1(rgyud): / ba'i bdag pa'o// mtshan pa'i skabs su dbus su dod dang / do dril bus bya'o// de nas slob pa sagon byas la sman sa tshogs kyis khrus byas pa/ rnam par snang mdzad kying pos slobs
6a2(rgyud): rung bar bya'o// las kyi slob dpon ni bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas pa/ ser sna mad pa/ mtshan ma cung zad thob pa'o// der mchod pa po rnams shin tu mkhas pa/ chags pa la sogs pa dang bral
6a3(rgyud): mtshan ma rnyed pa/ dbang gsum thob pa'o// slob dpon la dbang bskur ba'i dus su'am/ rgyud 'os pa 'dus su shin tu gces pa'i chung ma dang / bu mo dang / gzhan yang gser dang / mu tig dang / nor
6a4(rgyud): dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / zhing dang / grad dang / bran mo dang/ na bza' dum la sogs pa ci tsab nus pa dbul bar bya'o// nor la sogs pa yod nas gang zhig mi 'bul na de ni bskal pa stong gi bar du dmya
6a5(rgyud): ra skye bar 'gyur ro// longs spyod med pang gyur bas dang rang gi lus po dbul bar bya ste bran du bya'o// des ni tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid dam/ yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// 
6a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa la sogs pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas sam/ rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ram ci/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo sbyin pa la sogs pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas sam
6a7(rgyud): rje 'dzin par mi 'gyur te/ 'on kyang bra ma la mchod pas bsod nams chen po'i tshogs skye'o// bsod nams chen po'i tshogs bsags pa las sdig pa'i phung po zad de/ bla ma'i mchog sangs rgyas
6a8(rgyud): khams pa dgye nga bzhin rang gi sgra'i grwa yang dag pa dang phrad paphab po// thad pas yang dag pa'i man ngag gnang bar 'gyur ro// man ngag thob pa las bcan 'grus can po dang ldan pa yin no// des tshe 'di nyed
6b1(rgyud): sams sa mni 'dzin pangar par 'gyur ro// dpal la shes snying po las dbang bskur ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi don nas byab rab sa gsung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das pas gsol pa// khyod kyi kyi
6b2(rgyud): 'khor ji ltar lags// mnga' bdag chen po la bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdag gis dkyil khor dag pa ni// nyon cig spa po rab tu bshed// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rtababs/ 
6b3(rgyud): drab dra byed chun 'phyang dang // 'dod yon rin chen la sogs brgyan// de yi dbus su gzhan min bdag/ zhal bzangs khyed dang lhan cig go// phyag ban pa la zhal bzhi pa// spyan gsum
6b4(rgyud): ut+pal sngon po'i mdog/ phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa dang // sna tshogs dras pa'i rgyan dang ldan// zhi ba chen po'i rang bzhin can// sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du ni// 'jigs byad dus mtshan nabs kyis mdan// rgyal por
6b5(rgyud): bzhugs stabs kyis ni bzhugs// rdo rje dril du rje rlung dang // ka pA la dang laT+wAM bsnams// zhal gzhan ser dang dmar dang ldang // lha mi khyad kyang bdag gi mdog/ zhal gsum mal spyan gsum pa// phyag ga
6b6(rgyud): gre gug pa da sdod 'dzin// sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mas gsal pa// 'di yi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la// 'khor ni gang lags grangs du mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
6b7(rgyud): snum pa// keng zhig khyod kyis bdag la nus// nyon cig lha mo bdag gis bshad// dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhir dpa' chen po// shes rab yan lag mas 'khyud cing // mtshams su rdo rjem mo ba ni// sgor ni khros
6b8(rgyud): pa'i mar nir// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol ba/ de rnams la bskyed pa'i cho ga ni gang / mdog pa phyag sa dang bzhugs thabs la yongs pa'i ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
7a1(rgyud): dang dag rol pa mad cing / bsrub pa dang bsrub pa'i thabs chen po'i sbyor ba'i dga' ba'i rtags las dpa' bo chen po'i tshangs pa zhes bya ba phyag bani pa/ zhal gsum pa/ spyan gsum pa/ ga
7a2(rgyud): kyi mdag nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs kyis gnas pa/ ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ shes rab ma yan lag gis 'khyud pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'dzin pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis
7a3(rgyud): brgyan pa'o// de dang / dril bu dang / rje'u chung dang / ka pA la dang / kha jug bsdams pa/ shar gyi 'dab mang ro// yang bsrub pa dang bsrub pa'i thabs kyi mchog gi dga' ba'i rtags pas dpa' bo chen
7a4(rgyud): po byab 'jug ces bya ba/ ma ra ka ta'i mdog lhag ma ni tshangs pa bzhin du byang du'o// yang bsrub pa dang bsrub pa'i thabs kyi dga' bral gyis dga' ba'i rtags las dpa' bo chen po drag po zhes bya ba mdog nag
7a5(rgyud): po khyab 'jug bzhin dub tu'o// yang bsrub pa dang srub pa'i thabs kyis lhan cig skyes pa'i dag ba'i rtags las dpa' bo chen po dbang phrag ces bya ba la mdog dkar po bzhin lho phyogs su'o// padam
7a6(rgyud): mtshams su dri zhim pa dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba'i bum pa'i steng du bdud rtsi lngas bkang ba'i ka pA la bzhi'o// yang bsrub pa dang bsrub pa'i thabs kyi ro brgyad las me'i mtshams su dpa' mo chen mo mdog dag
7a7(rgyud): mo'o// chu'i mtshams su gzhan gyis mi thub ma bai DUr+ya'i mdog go/ rlung gi mtshams su dus mtshan mnam mkha' sngon po'i mdag go/ da'ang ldan gyi mtshams su gaur mdog ser po'o// 
7a8(rgyud): shin tu lang tshol bab pa zhal gcig pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi po/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rgyal po'i bzugs stabs kyis bzhugs pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'dzi pa/ phyogs kyi gos can/ 
7b1(rgyud): ga/  la/ nad/ de rnams pa/ phyogs rga ma tshan nag mtshan po ya/ na nga dgas byed ma thar mi na/ can dang sapa
7b2(rgyud): dang/ ga zhin #na rgyang/  ma yi pa / namapa 'as dang/ btid gagan
7b3(rgyud): 'a gas byed chen po mche ba gtsigs pa/ sngags 'dril la/ dbu skyes 'bar ba/ sgra chen po'i sgra sngags pa/ ral gri dang / rtse gsum pa dang / 
7b4(rgyud): ka pA la dang // kha T+wAMg bsdams pa/ rang 'od kyi thabs dnga'akhyud pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo chen pa rnams la shes rab ma'i yan ladabang ltar lags/ bcom
7b5(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' phul ba/ dpa' bo chen po rnams la shes rang ma'i yan lag rang rang gi me ga dang mtshungs pa ste/ 'on kyang khyod bzhin du zhal gcig pa'o// de lha'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po ni// rnal 'byor rgyud du rnyed par
7b6(rgyud): dka'// dgyes pa thams cad grub byed cing // sdig pa thams cad 'jig par mdzad// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa// bcom ldan khyad dang bdag sred pa'i// sa bon gang lags snying poni// nye ba'i snying po
7b7(rgyud): sngags ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// da kyis padag le gang nig cus// nyan ces ma bdag gis pa shang // ma ban la sde'i bdun pa'o// gangs yig lnga pa sa lan/ 
7b8(rgyud): na ma ze/ la ldang// khyod kyis pado rab mchog sa/ ya sA'i sa bon brgyad pa na// byangs yi gdug pa dang ldan pa//  bkal yis nang can// bad/ sas pa'i ba ma chog go// des 'on gnyis
8a1(rgyud): rab// thams cad dbang byed pa ni// lus can kun gyi snying la bzhugs// skye ba dang ni srud byed do// drug pa brgyad pa bzhi pa dang // bcu gnyis pa dang tsud te// dang por a dang hUM phan mthar/ 
8a2(rgyud): /  chus nyisas la//  sa / da tshangs pa kyi // da pa sa dpas pa // da ma me //  ma ma
8a3(rgyud): chags kun gyi ni sngags yin to// mchod pa'i dus su mchod par bya// oMsat+pam rab mar d+han ma hA bI rA hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ skal ldan mod khyod kyin// nye ba'i snying po drag po che// lar+ha ti ha he haM/ kem
8a4(rgyud): ka le sar+b+ba do sta pra b+ha dza ka d+hu hU~M Ta phaT/ pad ma'i nal de bdag gis ni// 'od chen nye ba'i snying po'o// bcom ldan 'das mes gsol pa/ sngags 'di la nus pa'i mthu tsam zhig mchis lags/ bcom ldan
8a5(rgyud): 'das kyis bdaka' stsal pa/ grub pa tsam gyis khams gsum thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// rnal 'byar ba khro ba'i lta bas 'bum phrag gcig dkrus pa byed na/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po lta ngu la 'bum phram
8a6(rgyud): gcig gis gsod par byed do// ni ba'i tshul gyis bzlas pa byas na grangs med pa'i nad dang / nyon mongs pa dang / dngul po dang / mdze dang / bal mig 'jig par byed do// phra mo'i grub pa brgyad skad cig gis
8a7(rgyud): gzhan yang lal du ma rjes su 'brang bar byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ma legs dgyes dbang mo stan las langs nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 
8a8(rgyud): thams cad dang lhan cig tu lan gsum du skor babyas nas rang gi rdu tshul gyi la mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das mchog gi dbang phyug legs sa lags sa zhes brjod na pa gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas
8b1(rgyud): naldags pa nga/ ma nas na thamam nas ga la mas bas s+ho// namamam ldan das na na
8b2(rgyud): dgags pag kyi bamiH/ mayod cab pa mi snang bar gyur to// dpal pa shes snying ba les gas pa'i dkyil 'khor bye ba'i don nas byu skye ne bar// dpal ye shes myeng po nas bya na la 'byom
8b3(rgyud): na mi'i chud pa rgyal po'i rnal 'jigs s+ho// rgyag kyi ma khan po dpa la shes zags pa'i na la ldanas bsgyur ba'o// dpas phyag tu chen pa theg le rnal 'byed ma'i gyud kyi rgyal ba'i phyima'i phyi do// // 
8b4(rgyud): rgya gar srid du/ shrI nan ti la ga ba shin nA blang ba ma hA ma d+hA ta na sa/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes mig le na la 'byor mi'i chun kyi rgyal po napo chog chad du byung ba zhes bya ba/ dpal ye shes thig
8b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' bo'i dbang phyug mas rnam
8b6(rgyud): par bskor nas rdo rje btsun pa'i b+hag la bzhugs so// der dpal nam mkha' dri med dang / shin tu stobs chen po dang / lha'i dbang phrag dang / gsang ba'i bdag po dang / 'do ba dang nyi dgra dang / mchog dga' dang / 'am
8b7(rgyud): cad kyi byed pa yod/ At+pala'i snying po dang / ne ba chen po'i bdag po dang / nag po 'dul ba dang / rmang du byung ba'i dba'abo dang / dregs chen dang / nag pa chen po drags 'joms dang / rirab brtan pa dang / nam mkha'i nal lo// 
8b8(rgyud): yang dpa' mo'i dbang mo'i dbang phrag sa rnams la 'di lta ste/ zlab ma dang / g.yon pa ma dang / nyi mnyam pa dang / drang bab ma dang / bas la sbyin ma dang / snying po'i 'dab ma dang / bag yod mo cog ma dang / nyi ma 'dus
9a1(rgyud): pa dang / zhiba'i che ba'i po nyam dang/ ldang brtson ma dang / 'di 'dun ma dang / tshangs pa'i mdang / khyab 'jug ge ma dang / thog lam dang / thams cad bskyed pa dang / dpa' bo'i bum ma/ 
9a2(rgyud): mama'i 'dun sa rnams pa'i g+ha ste/ skam pa dang / legs pa dang / 'od ma dang / mchu 'phyang ma dang / ri rabs ma dang / dus kyi ba byed ma da / nyi mag pa dang / phan la ma dang / 'dod pa'i mdang/ lce rangs ma
9a3(rgyud): dang / chos dga' ma dang / 'do bden ma dang / mig slong ma dang / stag ma dang / gtam me dang / 'dod gzugs pa'o// de sa bu'i rab zhal la lags pa dpa'ang chen po dang / dpa' mo 'dabang phyug pa dang / 
9a4(rgyud): btsun ma bye ba phrag bdun duHgnyis kyi grangs kyi 'khor gyi dbus su lams dgyes chen po'i sbyor ba la 'azhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha 'dab
9a5(rgyud): byung ma sa dpa'am ma sadapa can pa b+ha thug na sa nye ga sums padang nyid bye dang /  la chog te/ bya chenas papa 'dang / dpa sa pa dag rnam pa dang / tshadag pal
9a6(rgyud): ye shes theg le grags pa nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang bag la khor thams cad dang lhan cig du la na gas pa dungs
9a7(rgyud): das/ chom ldan 'das can pas la mgobs phyag 'tshal ta/ sal ba sa ni cang mesra bar 'dug go/ de'i tshen ma mkha' la ma tog mA dA ba dang / marA ra ba chen po dang / gasbal dang / nye ma la dris
9a8(rgyud): dang/ shes dang / rked ka dang / a sha ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / ang ngan dang / nag gsar la sogs pa dri nim pa'i matog rnam pa rje chags pa dag chen pa che'i thar dus bcom ldan 'das kyi napas kyi
9b1(rgyud): 'angs so// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga'i dbang phyag la bos te/ khyid mon gal yam chan du 'gyur/ lha dbang phyug gis gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das da
9b2(rgyud): gsum kyi bdag nyid kyi dang / zla ba bdab mchog dang / phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' dang / de la rang shing yang chad dang / rnam pa yod dam chil gang zhes bdag la mtshan du gyur lags so// dpa' bo chen po lha dbal
9b3(rgyud): la rje 'dzin pa'i mchog gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma ho// de khon nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang / zla ba'i bdeb mchog dang \u0f7fgargya chen po'i mtha' la de'i rang shi ba dang / rnam pa dang / tshad med
9b4(rgyud): dmaci/ dkar ma len na chos thams cad byeng po stong sa nyid 'digs shas/ mig pa rim gyis rgya'i rten ni tshal thams cad do// de ltar gracil bzhin nas dri yungab sa kyi'i tsho po da drongs rnyed par gyur/ 
9b5(rgyud): de bzhin du rang gi ngo bo dang / chos kyi tshad dang / rnam pa dag med par gyur na/ de khon nyid gsum kye bdag nyid dang / zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang / phyag rgya chen po'i sku'i rnyed pa med de// de bas na khyab dang khyab byed pa bras
9b6(rgyud): gnyis su med pa'i bde ba che// bde ba sA la brten pa'i phyir// bde ba bsnyen na de nyid 'gyur// bde sku rnam par shes yin na// thams cad gnyis su med pa'i dngos// drug gi bde ba re shes mchog/ bde dang sku ni
9b7(rgyud): las 'byung // 'khor la drug gi dbus na ba zhugs// de nyid gsam gyi bdag nyid mcho// bra la sogs bral bdag nyid// banyed gsum bdag tu ru grags// lus brten srog gi dbug pa la// sbyor brdzun
9b8(rgyud): shes pags// la pha la drug gi zhi ba'i dbus// phra ma'i lus ldan can phra// theg le dang bcas de rnams sbyor// srog gi dbug pa ye nang du'o// bad chen 'khor la'i le ba yi// bu mo che dang ldan pa / 
10a1(rgyud): ni srog pag cab yin// dra gsu brtson rnam pa'i rdul// longs sun rnams pa'i lte ba yi// khyim de ldan ni// den srog ga dbyug pa'i ste// rigs kyi ma tog dang drug/ chos
10a2(rgyud): mang po ste la// dmamapa ma nis shes dras/ gagi datheg pa'i snying/ me ga gags// ska bsrem pa la ya da// 'di na ldan pa// na ga ga
10a3(rgyud): // pad sa rgyas pa rnam pa bzhin// chom 'tsha bar ngag pa// 'dod da / nas/ na mug ga 'i mas// 'i rnam pa zhin la// gal ma lta la// 
10a4(rgyud): yin nas mdagag/ sron ga ga pa la// ti gyis martag rgyas pazhinan// na sto byug gnas shes// cad mig sad na to// tog mad pas ni gyud min byer// da tshangs
10a5(rgyud): thug pa ye// da ye dus ni bdag shes pa nga // shar nga drub pa rnam gnyis so// gang gi mtshangs pa'i dgug pa la sadud pa sum du cu gnyis yadade/ de ba ste ba'i na tu 'phob bcu bya// mye du ma
10a6(rgyud): drug/ byang chub kyi sems dang drung gnyis zad pa byor 'thob ste/ snying 'ag gcig pu'i dngas pa skor ba'i rtsasu ma bcu gnyis so// byang chub kyi sems dga' ba dang ldan pa'i gdub bu'i rnam pa sru dang gsung dang
10a7(rgyud): gas kying cigacig bu'i tog med pa de legs yod mas tshangs pa'i dbug pa la 'gyud nas/ bdab chen po'i gtsug tor nas gsang ba bde btsun po nor bu'i bdung ga 'khor lo lan chad/ des na
10a8(rgyud): ma sa tshan pa yod // lha dang thuganas thos ma she ba shad pa sa/  sa pa sa pa kun pa byung po'i di sa thogasam kyirnam pa ma ba 'i theg pa
10b1(rgyud): pa'i byang chub tu sems 'ad kyi zag la shas rab ma ltabs drab yang ngo chas dang po'i chu tshed gcig ga par du 'dod pa'i dga' ba shar ba'o// pad ma'i 'bras bu'i 'dod pa las 'dar sanya ba dang ldan pa ches gnyis ca da
10b2(rgyud): gnyis kyi bar du slobs nung pa'o// drag po'i mig gi 'dus pa las 'phro ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa ches gsum gyi chu med gsum gyi bar du smin gyi thig le shar ba'i dus so// rigs kyis ma tog gi ru rag pa las da
10b3(rgyud): brtson du 'gro bdang ldan pa chos panal che dang ni 'bar du nub pa'o// tshangs pa'i mig ma mchu'i bdud rtsi brdung ba sbyin pa las rgyas pazur dbyung ba dang ldan pa chos lnga chu chong lnga bangar du shugs shar ba dus so// dung ni
10b4(rgyud): mig gis sen 'a gas pa las drag pa la gas po'i rdul dang ldan pa'i ches drug ga na chad drug gi bar bu pu t+pa la'i nub pa'i ngas so// ra ba'i mag gi sporang ba las blang ba'i khyab byed dang ldan pa'i tshes bdun gyi chu tsho dang
10b5(rgyud): du sho ka la shar ba'i dus so// 'a mog gis 'bras bu'i bsod pa las mchog ga dga' ba ngan dang ldan pa mas tshad dad brgya dkya bar du ming nub pa'i dus sa// dung gi lte ba'i da bdapa
10b6(rgyud): ra rjod pa dang ldan pa'i chas dadu chu che dgu' ra byed pa shar ba'i das so// grang la che'i lce ba 'an ngag las thag sa mtha' dang ldan pa'i chos bcu 98/ ba pa'i so// up+pa
10b7(rgyud): theg ga' las byas pa lang thu dang ldan pa'i chas banas tshag/ ga su cad ben gcig pa she shar ba das sa// pad pa'i lba ba'i sa gceng bamigs pa las dag dag
10b8(rgyud): gnyis kyi chu tshang bcu gnyis kyi ba nga drug pa dab 'dus sa/ las yang se rim pa dang ldan pa mas ngan gsum gyi tshad bcu gsum gyi bar du mchog ga shar ba'i dus so/ 
11a1(rgyud): / pa'i bsdum pa las tshul 'byed pa dang ldan pa'i chos bcung ni tsu chod bcung ni rabang du kyu drub 'dus so// rdo rje meng mnyam par myong ba las gnyi don pa dang ldan pa'i nya'i chod bco lnga ba
11a2(rgyud): shar ba'i dus so// rnam par rgyas pa'i til gyi me tog ha brjod pa las tshes bcu drug gi chu tshod bcu drug gabar du ltad cig skyes pa'i dka' bags lo ba dang ldan pa'i thog gi nub pa'i dus so// rog ni sngags 'ji
11a3(rgyud): byed pa ste// de la nub pa bcu drug pa yin// shar dang nub pa gang la lar// lhan cig skyes la de yod min// yon pa'i gdub bu'i rnam pa yi// rtsa yi lte dbus thig le dang // dka' ba la sogs shar ba dang // den
11a4(rgyud): nub pa'i dus su'o// de lha'i bad can rnam pan// 'phob dri ni bdag gis bshad// dngas dang rten dang rnam par 'byed// ye shes dga'abral lhan rtag bzhugs// dngos par mnyam lta ba yin// 'dod pa chags
11a5(rgyud): rnam dag byed// 'dus pa reg bya byed pa yi// dngos ni sred pa med par byed// 'odong 'khyud pa'i longs spyod rnams// dngos ni dngos po rab gtsad byed// puN+Da ri kar 'brangs yis// zur gsum la sogs brten pa
11a6(rgyud): yis// rten ni bsam du med pa ste// chos dbyings rang gi ngo bo yin// steng dang 'og ni mnyam pa'i rten// mya ngan 'das pa rtog med byed// bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i rted// rigs lnga yi ni mchog gi gzhi// ya
11a7(rgyud): 'dod pa lhun kyis grub// 'dar ba dga' ba mchog gi dga'// ye shes shel pa ldan gyis grub// gzhi med pa yi lhan cig skyes// gzhi dang bcas pa dga' bral dka'// ye shes nga rgyal med par byed// chos
11a8(rgyud): kun na pa par shes pa// ye shes shes bya na su/ byed// rnam par 'byed pa 'od gzugs grags// tshul ba sbyin de lnga zis padang nyid// rnam par 'byed pa dngas kucung // rnam pa'i gzhi dang cas bcom
11b1(rgyud): skad gnas pasgra phrul // rnam par myed pa gti sngagagaso// mkhri sa sngags dang byub pa// doms byed na rnam par byed/  da// rtsom pa'i phyir na rnam par sna/ @
11b2(rgyud): snang ba'i mjal// rnam par byed pa gas pa pa yas// ye shes shin du bye byed// rnam papa myed pa da byer rdzo// gnyis sume pa mcho ga nag/ chags pad ni cag sa bral min// drim med pa tshas
11b3(rgyud): da dang sngags dang rim pa bral// rang rig pa dang brjed med// thams cad khyab cing dpe byad med// de lta bu ni don dam ni// lha yi dbang phyug rnam par 'byed// sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun gyi// thugs kar rtag
11b4(rgyud): btsugs pa'o// rnam par 'byed pa skem pa yang // lung sa 'amal la logs dgral// sbrul sogs pam chos kyi stong // sno dang snying rje'i bdag nyid yin// tshangs pa khyab kya drag po dang / dbang brag rtag tun pa dang
11b5(rgyud): dernams kun gyi ya ba yin no// 'byed pa dang ni mchog rmad 'byung // de nyid ye shes rig la 'dir// mchog rnams grub pa'i mnga' ba dag go/ 'byung ba kun gyi nang yod ga// sku lnga'i bdag nyid rang mchog yin// 
11b6(rgyud): bang phrag lnga bdag po// nam mkha' bdag nyid skyed med do// nam mkha' lnga yi nang du thim// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa// de lha'i gsang chen ye shes ni// ye shes dbang po rnyed dka' ba// ji ltar no
11b7(rgyud): ma yis// ma rnyed byed ltar 'bad pas sla// dpal ye shes bag le las 'phob 'dus shar ba dang nub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang pa'o// / b+ha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa// kye bcom ldan 'das/ 
11b8(rgyud): gsum bdagang dzig// de bzhin nub pang ba mchog/ phyag tu chen po'i rnam pa ci// do la mtha' ning ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsang ba// de nyid garum ni sru gsung thugs// de rje gsum ni ye shes
12a1(rgyud): mchog/ klab pad pa mchagacas pa// de ma jung pong dbang po khams// phyag chen pod snang po// de yi mtha' da phrag sman// mama' dang snang ba rnam par shes// ru li zla ba bzhin du mthong / 
12a2(rgyud): dzin pam med// sngang ba las ni las cad kyang // sra ba dan 'gag pa med// yang dag 'ad las thams cad 'byung // rnal par mtsham tham sa med pa dag nyid na bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes pa
12a3(rgyud): / del dang po'i rnam pa dang bcas pa'adaHsa la bar rtsal ra lo'i bskyed pa bsgom pa dang / sngags dang bzlas pa dang / skyon sreg dang mchod smin dang / gtor ma dang mchod pa dang / gnas kyi brjod pa dang / 
12a4(rgyud): dbang bskur gyi rim pa de dag bshad do// dpal ye shes theg lelas de yin nyid gsum gyi bdag nyad dang zab mchog gi bde ba dang phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' la legs pa'i phyogs tsam bstan pa'i le'u sre
12a5(rgyud): pa'o// lha'i dbang phrag gis gsal pa/ tshangs pa'i lus pa sreg gang byug pa'i steng dang 'og ka'apheb cha gnyis ng+yas ma cu na gnyis kyi rang bzhin pas be'u da par gang garu
12a6(rgyud): gcigs rtsog med padi lags med pagacag grangs par bstan pa ma tsaM/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan rnams das kyi phyir de ma gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ ga
12a7(rgyud): tog pad pa zags med ma da bye ba khrag bdun du rtsa gnyis byen bra ma'i drab rnams rol mo'i don du byas pa/ snga chags kyi bdud ce bsam gyis ma khyab pa chos kyi 'bring gnas chen po'i sa spangs sa gyu ni
12a8(rgyud): /  nagags sas las/  sa ma ga 'dams se da grangs sa
12b1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis ga'astsal pa/ 'dabang drug su thu na can ga ming rnams nyon cig/ gsang bad pa dang sred pa dang gra po dang ru mdang du ci khrim dang gapa ma dang de ba ma dang nathos ma da bas ma da rdzas
12b2(rgyud): drung ma dang ser ma dang / naun+dan pa dang dga' ba dang sngam ma dang bro ma dang mang ma dang sgrar ma dpa' ba ma dang bskam dang cham dang man ma ma dang cu ya dang / dang ma dang stobal ma dang dga' byed la dang dga' sbyin ma dang gnyid mngapa
12b3(rgyud): bcad sred ma dang khong chud ma dang chem ste/ de dag nartsasum cu gcig te/ steng dang 'og tu 'phob gnyis kyi zla ba dang nyi ma dang gsang zin pa'i dus su tshigs rgyas pa'o// de nas dbang gi rim pa bshad de/ ji lnga yin go rims
12b4(rgyud): sra// dar bskur mchog ni med pa gang / cad du ni nul par // yon tan tshul khrims ldan pa'i bu// bu ma dang por dbang bskur bya// khrus byas mig dag ras kyis bgag// snyim pa me tog gis bkang
12b5(rgyud): yon du nas ded 'ad ba na dang bldar bya/ ngam bas ni sangasargyas sa/ cichi med par da pa'i ga/ des thartsam pa de/ sha la das pa sngal las sa/ 
12b6(rgyud): bsrung ba ni gru ba ni// sra na 'ona' dbu ba yin// dang por slab dpon gyi ni dbang // gnyis pa de ni gsang ba dbang // gsum pa shes rab pa shes dbang // de ltar de brten pa ni pa'o// 'ani gnyis rab tu dbyeb
12b7(rgyud): ni// slob dpo dbang la sogs par bskur// derje slob dpon dbang gsum du// nam mkha' mnyam du bdag gis bshad// de gnyis la ni bcu gcig kye// rdo rje slob dpon dbang rgyal lo// dbang bskur de ni rin po che// 
12b8(rgyud): khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa// thar par lag pa 'grub dan du// 'di du ma pas bdag zhes bshad// bu dang dbu rgyan rdo rje dang // phreba'u med dang brtul zhugs dang // lung bstan pa dang skyabs sbyin da// phyag
13a1(rgyud): / sngags dang ye shes so// nal 'byor rgyud la mos pal// dbang brgyad bye ba sbyin par bya// rnal 'byor bla ma la mos la// bcu gcig bdag nyid spyan par bya// rnal 'byor ma khams pa rnams// gas
13a2(rgyud): pa'i dbang ni sbyin pa'o// gsang ba gnyis su dbye bar gsung // deni phyi dang nang gis so// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor bla ba'i phye// dbang bskur shes pas sbyin par bya// nang gi rnal 'byor ma yi rlud// gas pa 'da' ni
13a3(rgyud): sten// don gsang ba gsum du dbe// skye dang mdud dang de bzhin sang// shes rab rnam pa gnyis su daH// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i bye brag go// shes rab brgyad gnyis la dang ldan// spyan la mkhas pad/ 
13a4(rgyud): yon lag can nas rapa'i dri// shin tu 'jam pa'i phub mtshim// gzugs bzang stsol skal ldan ma// rol nam thang zhing 'jam la mtho// bsam gtan sngags la dang cing ni// dbang ba ltar dang ldan thugs
13a5(rgyud): de lta'i rab grags 'bad de bcal// dbang gi don du bram bu// dekun mtshan nyid dang ldan pa// rung ba yang na sring mo'am// bu mo yang na mna'ama'am// mkhas pas 'bad blang bar bya// rab ni rigs ning bzhin rted/ 
13a6(rgyud): khu ba dang bcas gnon nu ma// sna tshogs rgyan gyis legs par brgyad// mkhas pas bla ma la ni 'bul// dbang gi man ngag gsum du bzhugs// nang gi yis ni brda byed pa// bane ba 'bras bu'i po ror grags/ 
13a7(rgyud): gsum dang bral ba'i gsum bdag nyid// dga' ba la sogs bye brag sa// rdo rje gzhon nums gsal dbye// dbang bskur gyis ni 'khor lor bskur// the tshom med par yin par 'gyur// dbang gis drim med par
13a8(rgyud): tshul lags pas ras bzlas bzhin// chog thams car rdzogs pa dbang // lan lag de nyid pa ni bcas// gcig nas gcig tu rim pas brgyad// bla ma rab kyi zhal nas blang // gzhan du drug gi'i tshigs
13b1(rgyud): mthas// sgra yi bstan bcos rtag mes la// dbang gi mchog ni rnam pa gsum// blang bar mi bya min ma bya// yang dag 'bras bu 'dad pa na// dan ra nga nga spang bar bya// da ltar yang bya ma dum bsdus pa'i'aphung po la'ang
13b2(rgyud): dernam par tshang bal ma mnga'i zig pa byed kyang mi 'byung ngo // dbazhin rtog gi mang ba dang / ngag gi ba dang ldan pa la bstan pa'am/ nyan pa la sani la nyon mangs pa'ang nag las gzhan 'bras buni rnye dpa man
13b3(rgyud): debs na gcig nas gcig tu rim pas brgyad de rnyed pa'i dbang shes pa de ni rdo rje slob dpon pa mchen po'o// mi gsal mchog gi bkra shis can// sangs rgyas 'bras bu spen pa'i sbyin// pra ba'i gzugs so/ 
13b4(rgyud): non ma yin// bsod rnams thams cad rkyen gnas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dag// tshangs pabargya byin kyang 'jug tu// dkun gyis ni bdag mchod 'os// ma grags kyang na grags gzugs yin// 
13b5(rgyud): sar shes nas sgrub pa pos// 'bad pa yis ni mchod par bya// bla ma'i nal snga mchod byas na// ci 'dod pa'i 'bras pa rnyed// rgyud kyi don dam dbang gi don// shes nas bla ma mi mchod pa// sa skye nye na yod par
13b6(rgyud): / de ni mnar med pa ru 'gro// de bas kun tu 'bad pa yis// gus pas bla ma mchod par bya// rin chen sna tshogs bzor byas legs// gser gyi pad ma dri ma med// mu tig do shal ring zang med// sna tshogs dum
13b7(rgyud): nogos// gces pa'i btsun mo bu dang bcas// glang chen tu dang bran la sogs// dpapa ldan bu ma'i sman sa // dadagus brtan pas dpral bar bya// dpal ye shes theg la las yon dbul ba dang ces pa'i dbang
13b8(rgyud): girim pa zhes bya ba'i le'u sku gsum pa'o// de na sa gzhan yang rab bshad nyon// gnas kyi rnyed pa je bzhin don// ka ba gcig dang sgo dgur ldan// rdo rje brtsegs pa'i brgyan dang ldan// rdo rje'i theg dang bla ngas
14a1(rgyud): ni// kun tu yongs su bskor ba yin// drang la sogs pa'i rim pas dbye// 'byung ba zhi nga ldan pa yin// ji snyed nam mkha'i mtha' kun du/ khams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bcugs// da gur
14a2(rgyud): me/  pa ma bzhin pa/ mas 'dru la gser ma// ma chu mas pa'o// thab ma kyi gal gsums// spyan/ ma pas kya drugs// gsas
14a3(rgyud): 'dzugs pa dang // gsus pa drob/ sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ sngags 'dril ba/ mche ba 'jigs pa gtsigs pa/ dbu skra ser po gyen du 'greng ba/ ag tshams dang smin mtshon rang ba ste/ shar gyi 'khor la
14a4(rgyud): rdebs la gshin rdo gshed skul dag nag po g.yas dang g.yon pa'i nal gnyis ni ser po dang dmar go phyag g.yas gnyis na ral grid rtse gsum pa/ phyag g.yen gnyis na cod pa dang dbug pa'o// lho phyog
14a5(rgyud): rtsi bsal shel rab ma par byed dkar po ga la ba kyi nal dmar ba/ g.yon sngo ba/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis kyis dbug pa dang ma kri// phyag g.yon pa gnyis na mtshon rtse gcig pa dang mgo ba'o// nubs pa dam pa
14a6(rgyud): byed dmar po zhal g.yas dag pa ning g.yon sngon po/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag bzhin ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / ri la bur btad pa'o// byang du bgegs mthar byed sngon po g.yas dang galan rtsa
14a7(rgyud): nal gnyis ni dkang po dang dpar ba'o// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag bzhin da nga rgya gram dang / ram ge dang / mang dang / me'i mthams su 'dod pa'i rgyal ba'i gzugs can g.yas dang gamam nas gnyis ni kAng
14a8(rgyud): dmar ba/ g.yas kyi phyag gnyis naral gre dang rin po che/ phyag g.yon na sta re dang mdung thung ngo // srin po'i mtshams su dbug pa sngon po chu srin 'dzin ser po gzugs/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal ldang ba nga
14b1(rgyud): brag ga las gnyis na tugras cu gsum dang la gri// phyag g.yon gnyis na sA pa'i shing chen po dang / de bzhin du me'o// rlung mtshams su spobs pom du ba'i mdog/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i nal gnyis diser ba
14b2(rgyud): dmang po/ phyag dil greng rang nga sngas daram mo dang sa samatshams sum nayo ma nan gas gapan dmar po// gamam ldan pa/ g.yas ga pa kyi phyag bzhin sa kri dang sngags kya kyi mas
14b3(rgyud): gnyis ni sngob dang dkar ba/ phyag bzhin 'khor lo dang / ral gri dang / ka pA la dang / nAM ka'o// 'og tu su lha'i rgyal
14b4(rgyud): sku mdog nam mkha' ltar sngo ba/ gala'i byi na la mthon maming chen po'i 'od can/ g.yon pa ni nyi ma gzhon nu'i 'od can/ g.yas kyi phyag gnyis naral gri dang lcags kyu/ g.yon gnyis na gri phug dang thod pa'o// 
14b5(rgyud): kyirtsaba'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje drang pad ma bsnams pa/ rang gi 'od kyi shes rab ma la 'khyud pa'o// 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa ni 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad kyi steng du'o// gtsug tor la ngor los bskur ba dang
14b6(rgyud): rgyal po na zla ba dang nyi ma'i steng du shel par bya'o// 'di'i 'khor lo'i lte bgru gsum gyi gzugs te ri bong can dkar po'i 'od chos kyi 'byung gnas so// de'i dbus su sngar bstan pa'i 'byung ba ba ni ji lta bu'i rim pas
14b7(rgyud): rnam par snang mad yongs su gyur pa las dur grod brgya dang ldan pa'i gakal las khang yangs pa chen po'i 'pha ma gnyis nyi ma ga na dus tshogs pa ma'adab ma brgyad kyi lte bar 'jigs byed da dus mtshams kyi
14b8(rgyud): da pa'i steng du tshul dang thigs pa'i rang gi bo A li dang kA li gnyis las nyung ba/ me hUM las dpal ye shes tshig le phyag rgya chen pos 'khrud cing nal brgyad pa/ phyag brgyad g.yas brkyang ba/ zhal bzhin
15a1(rgyud): ba dang sa rab/ dmang ba dang snga gu'o// gzhan pa nas sut+pal sngon po'i 'dabam lta bu'o// rdo rdo dang / dril bu dang / rje'u chung dang / ka pA la dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / rab kr-i dang / mda' ga rngu/ 
15a2(rgyud): tshogs rdo dang zlab ches pas ngas pa'i dbunan dang dpal bar rjod pa'i steng du mi bskyod pa'i tshod pan can no// phyag tu drug gis snga bcings pa/ rdza mal brgyas pa mam pa chen po 'do shal gyis sna brgyan pa/ 
15a3(rgyud): ba'i phags pas rked pa'i sham thapas can gyi srur bzhengs shing ha ha'i gad kyangs dang pa kar 'tshal pa'i sgra chen po'ang bsngags shing brjod pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i g.yulas bye ba'i grangs kyis med pa
15a4(rgyud): bar mdzad pa/ mi bzad pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / lce sbyang gi tshegs 'jigs su rung ba dang / sha za'i tshogs ha har rgod pa dang / nag po'i me can gyi dur khrod chen po brgyad na 'jigs byed kyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa'i
15a5(rgyud): kar byed pa'o// dpal ye shes thig le las dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // da ni sngags mchog bshad bya ba// sgrub pa po ni 'grub 'gyur ba// sa yi cha ni mnyam pa
15a6(rgyud): mchog/ gang rtseg kur gyis ni byug/ bri nim pa yi me tog bkram// me tog gis ni chal par dgram// chu ngogs yang na thang stong du// rdo rje skud pa yis ni 'ad+mor// mig mdzes rdo rje gzhon nu ma// zla ba nyis
15a7(rgyud): pad ma khengs// lang tshogs ral rag bya 'jam// dang po mkhas pas 'jug par bya// sngags kyi gnas su lugs ji bzhin// legs dgyes shin tu sbyor bar bya// de yi sbyor bas gang zhig 'byung // kha dngas
15a8(rgyud): mchod par bya// bdang 'dab ma brgyad pa bya// rdo rje pani bur thubacu// mkhas pas khro bo'i sngags kyil gdag// A li kA li mnyam byas nas// 'da' ma kun la rim pas dgod// A la ye shes 'da'as
15b1(rgyud): kAl 'bam bdun dun// la Da ma ram g+ha sa?// lnga pa ldan lnga la'o// 'dab ma gnyis su bani gnyis te// kAH ya~M lag 'phru na nga // dbyangs lag gas la yig bye bragaH// A li kA li 'du shes yin/ 
15b2(rgyud): kyi yi ge 'dab ma yis// sngags kyi rgyal por byed dran// dang po'i gzugs kyis rgyal ba'i dbang // de na sa 'dapa gnyis kyi dang bor// bani pa'i dbyangs yig dang bcas pa// 'ag/ re ba li sa ni brgyan// de nas
15b3(rgyud): 'dab ma gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'o// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa// khro ba'i ngan 'gro dag bad pa// 'dab gnyis dang po bzhi pa yin// de nas gsal byed pa yi brgyar// 'dab gnyis dang po'i gnyis pa
15b4(rgyud): ldan pa thams cad rims 'phrog byed// gsal byed pa la gsum pa ste// brlabs yang dag ldan pa // dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa yis// lha yi bang phyag brgyan pa'o// bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang // de nas de yi nga
15b5(rgyud): btu ngag pa la gsum pas ldan// thams cad sngags kyi tshig gi gzhi// de nas pa ni dag pa dang // de bzhin gsal byed dang po'o// yan lag gsal byed sum cu gsum// dbyangs yig drug pa yang da
15b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi ni 'byung ba'i gzhi// zla tshes thig les rnam par brgyan// de ni de dang nye bar gnas// sems kyi dbang phyug yi ge mchog/ gang zhig lnga pa'i gnyis pa dang // gsum pa'i dang po dang ldan pa// mthar ni sa
15b7(rgyud): ldan pa ste// snying po'i sngags ni rmad byung mchog/ dang po ru ni gzugs kyi mchog/ 'dab ma gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'o// 'og ca re pha yang dag ldan// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhipas skar// reg pa'i rgyal po'i yi ges
15b8(rgyud): / le yes ni mgo bo mnan// de dang du ni nye bar gnas// thams cad ni bzhi pa'i mchog/ thigs pas mnan pas sum cu gsum// lu drug pa na gnyis par ldan// yang ni de nyid yi ge mchog/ khams gas
16a1(rgyud): /  na /  gas shes / maldan pa shes pagams so// daso sa ga sungams/ 
16a2(rgyud): cad gud rnas sa// gas la byed ni pa na gnyis pa/ nye run bdun pas ni ldan// nyi shu ci gnyis pa sa gnan// dbyungs kyi yib bdun pas 'dun// ban pa las na gsum pa'o// dang ba spyang me / 
16a3(rgyud): dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa dang ldan// 'bras bu thams cad don sbyin no// lnga pa yis ni lnga pa dang // ha la yig 'bru de dang he// lnga pa yis ni gsum pa dang // nyi shu rtsa brgyad de nas so// lnga pa yin dang ngod/ 
16a4(rgyud): ca bdun nas so// dbyangs yig gi ni gnyis pas ldan// khams gsum dgug par nus pa'o// gsal byed kyi ni dang po dang // nyi shu rtsa bdun pa ni mun// nye shu rtsa lnga bdag dang // dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyi
16a5(rgyud): bas ldan// nyi shu drug mi ga mchog/ dbyangs kyil ga bcugacig ldan// sArnam pa sasu ni//  bcwa kyis spel ba bya// dan byag kyi che snyed po// yid pa zhi rin chen mnyam pa'i 'od// nga ma ra
16a6(rgyud): 9// de nas 'dapa gnyis pa'i gsum// las sde can gnyis pa dang/  sh+ye medagu nas so// dang kyi yi ge gsum pa yis// seng ma nga du chud par bya// sngag pani byed dag pa// ra pe
16a7(rgyud): dang mnyam// dza ma sA hA dang ldan pa// hU~M ba ni spel ba yin// nye ba'i snying po sngags chen po// thams cad sngags kyi bdag po mchog/ oM sh+ye ma hA ka ru Nak+Shata/ ma hA be bed/ swa pa ma hA kakrAn k+She/ 
16b1(rgyud): ga l+ra lA kar+Na ba/ shAny+dza ya bA ny+dza ya/ su ma tsu ya/ ha ha ha ta/ 11haM/ mdza dza d+ha ra/ paN+Da ma ya/ hrIdz+dzar+thadz+dza/ phaT phaT sa Ta phaT sA hA/ oM ma hA kr-id+ha shA rA ya trA pa Ta swA hA/ oM ma hA ba de Ne sA rAHyang+ga la swA hA/ 
16b2(rgyud): oMs traka wA mi shrI sa ma pre pA la h+ne Ta AH/ yang ma 'jas yan+da Ta ha sA ya h+nA Ta yAn/ oMm hAkror g+hor shArA la hU~Mr AhA/ oM ma ng+ga bI shI shA rA ya tI Ta swA hA/ oM mahA ra tin da mA lA de pA la rjel du
16b3(rgyud): oM ma su seM sa kyi lo tsan ye trA phaT swAta/ e Aka shong mA ya hU~M phaT sA hA/ i ma hA sa ga go kan d+ha phaT swA hA/ oM tan tan hA baT swA hA/ ad ha ha hU~M phaT swA hA/ a ba tsa ba tsahrI phaT swA hA/ am tha ma sa
16b4(rgyud): oM bi d+ha sa ye bi d+ha sa ya hUM phaT swA hA/ a A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya hU phaT swA hA/ oM b+hAny+dza ya b+hUny+dza ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM nuN+DA ya tsur+N+Na ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ha ha ha ha hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM ka hi hi hi hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA
16b5(rgyud): ma dA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ e hU~M hU~M hrI d+hA d+ha phaT swA hA/ oM phaT praT phaT saT b+hu raT swA hA/ phreng ba'i sngags ni mchig gi lha// las thams cad ni rab grub byed// oM ma hA kA ma ru b+hiNI ye sa ra sa ra/ be se ra 'i kAr/ A gar+b+ha
16b6(rgyud): swA d+he/ san ste byam sa d+ha la/ sanA ma ra/ nin pa/ ma hA dwer shA ra sa b+ha pA tA la/ bad ge / sa p+ta sA gar/ shraSha Ne mu u Ne/ dzas b+ha ne/ stam b+ha ne/  rnam ka n+te/ nanata(\u0f7f/ 
16b7(rgyud): hA kak+sha d+his ma tha pA la hU~M thA pra rba sa Tas / phreng ba'i sngags ni mchog gis// bcom ldan ma/ ya ba dag gis bstan// hAnAMtAM/ kr-ibyai/ Sh+T+r-iH// 
16b8(rgyud): / zakra zag pa gi rje gri 9/ 'am la sngags na sngags chen to// 
17a1(rgyud): // dpa' pa' yan lags snying sngags//  yi bang phyug bdag gis bshad// dang por mi dang mthar hUM phaT// bar du meng ni spel ba'o// gas pa'i sngags kyi dgang pa ni// mchod pa 'dus su
17a2(rgyud): yin / ma brtan pa ma hA b+hUT/ a ma \u0f7fga la gas pa/ in 'jas du sa dz+rab+h+yaH/ aMb gra sa tu Ta/ sa pa ldan kA la hU~M 3/  she
17a3(rgyud): ga sngags de'ang // 'khor lo drug pa'i nang de bzhugs// gsang ba'i dkyil la bar rgyal dbang po// 'di 'i sngags kyis mchod par bya// a kaN Ta ta pa ya sha sma ni grags// sde chen brgyad kyi ga
17a4(rgyud): rtsa ba'i sde tshan gtor ma gtang // brtag pa gnyis kyi ji bzhin no// rdo rje'i phyag rgya'am snying po yis// mig mi 'dzub pa'i lta bas sprin// bsrung 'khor yod pa'i gre bo yi// de yi sngags ni bdag gis ba
17a5(rgyud): dzeSh+Te/ g+ha m+ba ro g+ha g+ha ro/ d+hA d+ha ra/ be d+ha pe d+har/ Ta k+She Ta g+heT/ sbom gi gro lo ga/ a ta a ta hA sa/ ar+tha ar+tha hA sa/  hU lu/ bi kram ba kra ma/ hUM phaT kyis ni ma'i'amar ldan// bar
17a6(rgyud): le ba'o// dang gsum pa ye shes rgyal// oM AHhUM ni sngags kyi mchog/ dpal ye shes thig le las sngags brgyab zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas mchod sbyin rab bdag bshad// gnas
17a7(rgyud): logs pa'i ram pas sgor// bskyed pa'i bye brag zigs pa gsum// rdzogs pa'i rimagasu ma de ltar ro// rnam shes la sogos bye brag tu// mchod sbyin tshangs pa'i g.yulas che// rnam par shes pa
17a8(rgyud): spyod// snga dang nam mtha' ye shes bzhin// srubargyad kyini bye brag tu// dngos parten dang rnam par 'byed// de bzhin 'dod pa sdug pa ni// mtshad sbyin rnol 'byor ma dkyil 'khor// oM D+yan la sogs
17b1(rgyud): gnas san// legs kyis mas gas la man// mal shas yin mchog srin// srid nang du byaba'o// mamang sbyin byas na sun pam// 'bras bub ga shes ldan pas// sams canarnams byas bye bra/ 
17b2(rgyud): gas thabs ni rab tu bshad// bcig rnams la 'dul ba'i thabs// 'acig rnams la mad sde'o// la la pa ma phyin pa'i lam// khacig la ni sngags kyi mchog/ rab 'bring tha ma'i bye brags// bar bar
17b3(rgyud): zabs yin no// blo gros che'ang thag gzhan gyis// grangs med gsum gyis sangs rgyas yin// sngags kyi theg pa la mos na// tshe 'di la ni sangs rgyas so// yang ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid// rnal 'byor ma khyod smos
17b4(rgyud): dges// yang na lus ni spangs mthag/ blan med pa'i ye shes dag/ brtson par mi ldan pas kyang rnyed// btsun 'grus ldan pas spos ci dgos// brtan pa'i brtsod pas don thams cad// 'bad pa med kyang 'grub pa
17b5(rgyud): yin// don kun 'grub pa'i bsod nams can// tog med nyon mongs med pa'o// gang zhig las ni ni byed pa// de ni bsod nams 'phel ba yin// 'dod pa'i longs spyod gang gang spyod// de kun mchod pa la sogs
17b6(rgyud): yin// don tshad srid 'phel ba yin// mchong las ye shes 'bras bu rnyed// de ni mchod sbyin yang dag pa// rmad kun du ni rnyed dka' ba// 'bras bu chen po thams cad sbyir// rab 'byor ma yi ka ni yi
17b7(rgyud): dpal ye shes cika' las mthod sbyin gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// de des mchod pa'i chog na// sdug pa thams cad 'jig byed pa// med 'brog lha me me tog gis// grub nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan/ 
17b8(rgyud): me dang sgron ma rbad du byung // mchod sbyin dkyil 'khor la mchod pa// dbang ni ma do'i dang po yi// ru drug pa le dang pa yis// gnyis pa yi ni rab them gsum// bcu drug dang po'i 'og ma yis// gsum pa men
18a1(rgyud): longs spyod yin// bcu drug pa yi gsum pas so// bzhi pa yi ni thim pa 'byung // gsum pa ye ni 'og mas so// lnga pa yi ni longs spyod len// bcu drug pa ye lwa bas so// drug pa pan ram
18a2(rgyud): pa 'byung // 'jug pa yi drug pasas// bdun pa yi ning mchod dbang // mar ngo ma ni brgyad padag/ dbyangs yig brgyad pos mchod par bya// dgu pa yi ni longs spyod 'byung // bcu drug pa yi dgu pas
18a3(rgyud): so// bcu ba yin rim pa 'byung // dbyangs yig gi ni bdu bas so// bcu gcig pa yi dbang yin te// bcu gcig pa yis mchod par bya// bcu gnyis kyi ni rim pa 'byung // dbyangs yig bcu gnyis po yis
18a4(rgyud): so// bcu gsum pa yi longs spyod ni// de gnyis kyi ni mchod par bya// bcu bzhi yis ni tshim par 'gyur// dbyangs yig bdun pa gnyis kyis mchod// nya gang ba la dbang yin te// dbyangs yig bco lnga pa
18a5(rgyud): yis so// byang chub sems 'byung mtshad pa yin// yar ngo mar dbya brag tu// shes rab babs ni rab tu sbyor// sku gsum ye shes dkyil 'khor na// tshe dang yi ge sngags kyis rba// ri bong pa ni dpal
18a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur// thig le nam mkha' 'gog pa yis// rang bzhin de ni 'byung bar 'gyur// thig le'i rang bzhin ye shes ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang rnyed dka'// bdag gis bka' drin rang bzhin drung // 
18a7(rgyud): chom med par rnyed pa yin// blun po gang gis bdag mi shes// bsam gtan ragasal rtag mos pa// de rnams kun ni grub pa med// lha yi dbang phyug bden pa'o// sa kun dbang phyug gis bdag po// sa
18a8(rgyud): kun dbang phrag mnga' bdag po// sa kun dbang phyug gi rgyal po// thams cad bdag nyid kun nang bdag/ thams cad khyab pa rtag tu stong // sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa// shes rab thabs kyi rang
18b1(rgyud): bzhin grags// 'gram 'apral bdag nyid doso// mchog gi nam mkha' mapa med pa// mtshan nyid du bral gzhi dang bral// lha yi dbang rnams thub dbang rnams// rdo rngan yang rnyed dka' ba// chos dang longs
18b2(rgyud): bdag gis mna'// ye shes rnam shes bad// de can dang sangs rgyas kun// lha yi dbang phyug rnyed par sa// rnam pa mchog gi ye shes sku// pus kyang sra'am yin no// dpal ye shes thig la las
18b3(rgyud): pa'i cho ga nye bya ba'i le'u ste 'dun pa'o// // de nas yang ni bshad bya ba// sbyin sreg sdig pa 'jigs byed pa// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // de bzhin dbang dang drag pa'o// ni ba'i hom khung zlum po ste// rgyas pa
18b4(rgyud): gro bzhi'o// dbang ni gzhu yi rnam pa bzhin// drag po ya ni gra gsum mo// dkar po sed dang de bzhin dmar// nag po 'di ni rim pas so// rgya mtsho med mig zlab// lha yi dbang phyug chad yin no// gzhan kun
18b5(rgyud): rim pas gcig/ sngar grub kyis ni gzhanam 'grug// ho ma khung minang sring gar bad// rigs kyi las kyi gam so// de steng sna tshogs da ste// 'od cer lda ldan pa'o// skye bo na du me g+ha ni// zhalag
18b6(rgyud): po dang phyag bzhi pa// sku mdog ser po sman zlum pa// ral pa'i cod pan gyis ni brgyan// 'bar ba'i mche ba 'jigs pa che// rdo rje skyil krung du ni bzhugs// bdan gsum dang bgrang phreng g.yas// g.yon na dbyin
18b7(rgyud): thugs so// snying ga na ma yi lha// lce bdun 'od ldan gsal bar 'brang // cod pan rin chen 'byung ldan mgon// rig le'i dbus su ma yin no// tshur gshegs 'ad zer cher ldan pa// 'dod pa 'don kun sku
18b8(rgyud): dbang ngo // e b+hur grub swA hA// ra byung chen pabacom ldan 'das// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'dod pa ster// me lha las thun smra ba byed pa// 'dir ni ba gas nye bar 'azhugs// le lha spyan drang ba'i sngags so// don
19a1(rgyud): / mchod khon da nye ga dang / 'al // oM \u0f85 tra/ mchod yon gyi sngags so// oM b+h+rUM hrI he gra zhe sngags so// mab+ho k+Sha.a b+hok+Sha 'byor bkrung gi sngags so// de nas gdan dbul ba ni/ 
19a2(rgyud): chol su rgyad byas nas// khams byud cinag zugs// srin la gcig gi tha gra gzhan pa rung ma me / gdan sa pa ma phyag kyi'o// mas pa'i na sa byed can// dang duH/ 
19a3(rgyud): rarnyed// do ni de nyid ra 'grub bya// sgrub pa'i dbang po yan tan dzan// sngags dang chud kyi thos 'che/ de sngags kyi bzlas la gcigs mas// yid mi 'phrogs pa gsam ma'o// theg pa
19a4(rgyud): ye shes che// bye brag shes pa na chen rigs// rigs rdza'i gnon num gas dge' grub pa lan cig nasman mengs ma dang dag pa ma// ma na sran pa 'jam la mno/  sreg gnas du ga da lda
19a5(rgyud): gcer bu na bya bral ba// sbyin sreg las su don paslab phyir// rigs dza tu mo gzhug par bya// shes pas mas kyi tshig yis// bla ma nyin byed yo sa cing// brtags pa dang ni ma bcugs pa'o// 'dzi
19a6(rgyud): 'dir ni ma bya'o// sogs pa'i 'byung pos zin pa sa//  tshogs thabs ni dag gis bstan// don tu myi don med// nang she ma yin par ma yin// rdul med rnam par rdzub med de// steng ba dang ni sung
19a7(rgyud): rang rigang por rig bral// ngag shes gyi 'i rnyed do// depung po khams ni rnam par rtog/ lha la dbang phyug gang zhig sreg/ de ni me yi don dam sa // lus gnas las las ma skyes pa'o// thams cad rnam pa
19a8(rgyud): mchog gis rjegs// chos dun gyi ni mang na btsugs// thun rdo rnam pas gzugs su ni// lha yi dbang phyug kun brtags pan/ ku m+b+ha rtags ma shes sbyor ba yis// rimatham gnas ni rnyed par 'gyu
19b1(rgyud): debs kun nas 'bad pa yis// rnam pa thams cad mchog gi d+har// rang gzhan gyis chu bdon du// mchod sbyin snyan sreg gtor nabya// ba bad nam sa chogs ni'i phel phyir dang // sems can pa na don dag bya// na
19b2(rgyud): dag ti la dang / 'bral lo ba dang / gro dang / 'bras dang / bka'i ng+ka dang / lung la kar dang / sman thams cad dang / ma pa dang / ko bras bu dang/ dpal bras dang / nAg she sa dang / bur d+ham dang / bzhin
19b3(rgyud): bu dang / 'o ba dang / zho dang/ thug pa dang / bsla ba dang / ladu dang / 'ja ba ma gogs pa dang / ku yu la dang / sih+la dang / gu su bdag pa yod/ ya rnalag bcu la chon sa da ga me med dang / sa dang / mar me dang / dri dang
19b4(rgyud): zlab shos dang / mda'adang dpal sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / mems kyi dkyil ma nga phyo kha mtshams 'i thebra yum la kun bad+mad sna tshogs dang / brgyan gyis brgyan ci tsunam pa'i dus ltob 'aka ma/

20b1(rgyud): jig rang // rgyam nasas gzhan gnas/ man ku dang bral ba lo// bya la yul mnan gaman// sla ba dang na 'dus las brgyan padang // rdo rje mdang ni rnam par gzugs// de srud lasagos bas

20b4(rgyud): gri gug rung bas brtag par bya// yan lag rab kyi pad+ma'i snod// btung ba'i don du bla ma'i mdun// byed ni 'khor lo la brim ste// phyed ni gtor mar gtang bar bya// khrag chen dang ni sha chen po// ci rnyed pa ni brtag pa yin/

24a1(rgyud): / du phreng ba rgyad kya bus su ni// dpa' na ma yas 'phro/ 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad dang ldan// shing gi rgyal po brgyad kyis bskor// dkyil 'khor kyis pa'abar ma gnyis/

24a8(rgyud): 'dul mi dang 'od bdun mdud pa nag po'i mdog go// khyo slor yang budar dzad du byung ba dpa' mdang tshangs pa'i mdu ba'i mdog go// sher lho'i mtshams su tsa n+do ha hi ri sil bar drag chan dang khya
24b1(rgyud): / 'jug ma smin gyi do/ kau/ byang mtshams su kra ta bar dregs 'joms dpa' ma gser gyi mdog go// nub mtshams su nya ba'i tsha rbo ha la pa pa garang re rab brtan ma dang thams cad skyed byed ma dmar nag go// sgo mtshams
24b2(rgyud): su kan tse kar nam mkha'i zhal dang dpa' bo'i yum gser gyi mdog go// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i 'khyud pa dang / sku mdog dang bzhugs stabs 'dra'a'o// dpa' bo rnams ni zhal bzhi
