85a8(rgyud): dus su 'ang // blam sa de bsnyed bkur byed// gsong bor byed pa'i grubal po// mtha' 'grom sartag dga' ba/ de sa da mi grub 'byung ba mapa/ ma pa 'di dpa' nyid 'gyur// khams gsas pa' la
85b1(rgyud): tu ba'i bdag/ sgrub po dpar ba nyid 'dod pa// thams cad ni mchod par 'gyur// de rdal 'byor la rab 'jug/ yang dag rten pa'ang dag par 'gyur// he rug ye btul zhugs 'ad// slob da'od dpa' po song
85b2(rgyud): ra na// mthong ming mthong ning kun du dga'// sgrub pa bos na sngags 'di las// dpa' ba gyi ba'i gsang sngags mchog/ lan bdun ni 'arjod pa bya// rab gas thul sogs pas phye// de rnams 'tha de phyas
85b3(rgyud): byed na// bangs rgyas la sogs thams cad 'ad// rtag pa nyid du dpa' chen dang // rom par ldan par potshom med// de la thugs gang gnas pagam// dad dpa'i brnal 'byer pa// pa nya rnams dang lhan cig
85b4(rgyud): de dang gang nig legs skyes pa// srog chags pa so dam pa mthong ba yin// lab rga'i 'gram dang bye mtsho dang // ri bo ni lani mdo nga // lteng sa dang ni khron pa cos// khang grong dpa 'am srang dag/ tham pa cad du
85b5(rgyud): dpa'ar gros// kun byi zhen pa la gnas/ 'jigs chen po can// ga 'byod bzhin pa'on dang // mas ni sa// jigs ci gzun sa da ma chen po'o// de da
85b6(rgyud): bi ba dang gas pa'i dpa' ba'i gnas kyi cho ga le shes pa than brgyan pagro// de na sa gapa pa'i rnab 'byor che// sngags ni rnam la brgyad kyis rgod// de nas 'di la sa dag thong// gsol par 'gyur bar gdon pa

86a3(rgyud): lesags kyis bzlas pa yis// ral 'byor cho ga gnas pas 'brug/ smon pa phyod kyad bcas pa dang // nya yi sha dang ldan par ni// dpa' dbang gan sa skabasasems cad du// nyi ma bdun gyis sgrub pa pas/

92b3(rgyud): ya kaM/ ma A kra pa'i bde mchog yin// rdo rje sems dpa' rnaMpa sdang mangs// de bzhin 'dam dang dbang dang // shAta gtadang ni//  snying nga ni rnamatshan nyid//

92b7(rgyud): rabashad pa yi cho ga yis// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog rjed// 'khor lo chen po grub ku gnas// de bzhin dngos grub kun gyi gzhi// 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba dang // dpa' be bye bas legs par gsung
92b8(rgyud): dngo gyi// 'khor ni bye ba dag tu 'gyung // rnal 'byor ma ni lakha' 'gro nyid// gzugs can ma dang dus skyes ma// de shim snga ma la sogs de// dngos grub kun byed dge ba yid// dpal rtse
93a1(rgyud): // ka'i nges par brjod pa la sa dpa' bo nga mkha' 'gro thathams cad kyi gnas gsang pa'i dkyil lakhor gyi cho ga'i le ru ste la ni 'gyu brgyang pa lo// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ga//

93a3(rgyud): byang kan la sogs// de ltar sna tshogs pag dag ste// sngags 'di dag tu shes par bya// mtshan nyid ji kur gyur ba dang // 'di rnams las ni bshad par bya// skye ba gcig dang skye ba gnyis/ gsu
93a4(rgyud): mam pa zhi'am la nyid dam// skye drug dang bdun gyung ba// blugs rnams cani godo mig/ gang gi Sha mi grini ma ning // mig mi 'dzum par rnam par blta// bden par sgra nang mthong na dka'// rtag tu
93a5(rgyud): dgar 'gyur zhing // rang gi skye ba shes pa dang // lus kyi drini rtag tu shes// mtshan nyid 'di dag ldan par ni// skye ba bdun du 'byung ba yin// de ni bos pa tsam gyis ni// lha yi gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ 
93a6(rgyud): mnams pa 'am theg pa tsam gyigyes sam// gang zhig cig le byed pa de// mdo la 'grub par 'gyur ba skye// 'di ni rang dag re gzugs 'chang 'gyur// de'i snying ka'i ro can// mkhas pa yis ni grangs na min// snyi
93a7(rgyud): sngags ni thams sa//  'i yig byab yis// sems cad gang da gang gin// gshas du byed par 'ad pa na// ded ni migags sa// mig ses 'gyur ba chos sad// masapas zhi

93b4(rgyud): bdud pa'i sgrub par bya ba'i gzugs yongs su le ci'i cho ga'i len ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa mo// / de nas sbyin pa sreg cog ni// nges par dbang du byed 'gyur ba// yang dag cog gang gis mi// srung du das ngas
93b5(rgyud): ur bshad// g.yangs ni myos byed bsre// lag pa g.yon pas sbyin bsreg byas// sangs rgyas kyang ni dbang 'gyur ra// phan tshegs mi ni smom ci dgos// Sha chus deng dag dang re// de banin rang gi lus mnyes

93b7(rgyud): las grags pa 'am// mkhas pas rang sras sbyin bsreg bya// nem pa'i shing larab kyang ra// yod pa dbye bar 'gyur ba yin// mnyam par 'anag pasad dung me// yungs ma can de bsgres pa yi// dgazhan
93b8(rgyud): pas smin bsreg byas// 'phral du 'che ba'ang spad par 'gyur// nyam dang mag la 'dug pa dang // zas dang sbyor ba sogs rnams la'ang // mkhas pas rtag tu zhes byed na// de la bgegs ni yod ma yin
94a1(rgyud): den bkrag byed// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du ni// sgrub pa po ni thun gsum byed// ma lus sa rnams smod pa dang // zla 'jug gis dang nga 'gyur// tsam 'gyur mkha' 'gro ma de la// chal srid sar bar ga
94a2(rgyud): ma pa// lha rnams thams cad snyoms nas ni// rdzun gnyis par du sbyin bsreg pas// rang ge lus ni de nyid kyis// mkha' la 'gro ba nyid thob 'gyur// gas su ga chang gas// phyi ngang ga si

98b6(rgyud): pang dag 'byung / 'di ma tshig mchog yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyim gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje ga cha zhes bya ba'i rdo rje dam cheg gsungs pa 'dig ste/ rnal 'byor kya dbang phyag chen po rdo rje sems dpa
98b7(rgyud): dal 'byor kyang bang phyug chen ngom par sdang mdu rjod/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phrag ched po po la grar gyi dbang phyug dang / rnal 'byor nyi ba phyug chen po rje he ga dang / rnal 'byor kyang dbang phyag chen po
98b8(rgyud): dag khyor bye bang phyug chen po rkom chog dang / reg mi dran po na yan lagad dgod pa ste/ zung bganyim du na pa'i dpochag nam chog don papas dang shes rab gnyis du red pa las kyang ngo // 
99a1(rgyud): can po ma cho ga tugs bslus pa bshad par byaste/ deng bang byug cher mo rje lag mo dang/ do dbang phyug can mopo yin dang / do dzu nga phyug chen po mongs byed pa dang / do bang phyu
99a2(rgyud): mog po byed pa dang / dorje dbang phyug chen mo skrag byed pa dang / de bung thug can mo Ni ka b+he/ 'di sam ya nas mtsha 'ams dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa'i sa
99a3(rgyud): cho ga yang dag par bsrung ba'i spyod pa'i thugs gas pa chen po ste// de lta bu sna chags du pa'i rnal 'byor pa rang gi lag pas phrag dron mo mchog gi mchod pa byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ mas pa
99a4(rgyud): gis spyi bos gtugs so// da nas dang cho ga chen pongom par 'phrul pa rdo rjesna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi ba spu'i drug nas sems dpa' sna tshogs smos te
99a5(rgyud): ngan mo gdus pa dum la thabs sno tshogs pa sams ga dus pa med pa'i cis gyi byings yongs su gang bar byas te// ba tshogs pas bdud byin ma mapa'i yangs su gang bar mthong ngo // bcom ldan
99a6(rgyud): 'das kyis rigs sna tshogs pa'i snying rje chen po'i khro bo'i cha lugs 'dzen cing sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i ro dga' ba sna tshogs kyi cho 'phrul rdul snyed dang mnyam pa bstan
99a7(rgyud): khams gsum gyi bdag pos gsungs pa/ chu dang / me dang rlung dang / dbang chen gyi steng du sna tshogs pa'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab sna tshogs pari po che sna tshogs pa'i gzi brjid kyis mdzes pa/ de'i nga
99a8(rgyud): dpal rdo rje sems dpas chos kyi dbyings las rdo rje khro bo chen po phyung nas spros te/ rdo rje chen po'i gzhal las khang dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyal por sprul pa la kun du bzang po chen po byung ste// ra
99b1(rgyud): dang lhan cig zung nas brten par bzhugs so// phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ rdo rjen po che'i rgyan gyis srud pa/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i mdog ltar sdug pa/ dril bu dang / rngaya ba dang / rgya mtshan
99b2(rgyud): g.yer ka' dra bas mig pangs ris su bris pa/ rdo dum tshig gi srang na chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa'i sna stsogs pa/ sna tshogs pa'i sgra dang / k+Sha dang / gnod spyan dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / ye dwags dang
99b3(rgyud): ba dang / smyo byed dang / rjed byed dang / grib gnon dang / ma rus pa dang / shin du gdug pa dang / ro langs dang / ro dang / ro bsregs pa dang / kye dang / lce s+yang dang / lce skyang mo'i sgra sogs pa/ dpa' bo dang / mkhal
99b4(rgyud): kha'i 'gro ba'i sgra me dang / a la la'i gaklogs pa/ dril bu dang cang te'i gyi spogs pa/ mgo gcad pa gar byed pas nye bar brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyog na rdo rje'i spyod pa can/ dge ba'i la gyi
99b5(rgyud): sems can thams cad la snying rje'i ros pan 'dogs pa/ rnam par 'khor bas bskor ba pad ma'i gar gyis gar byed cing thal mo sbyor ba/ g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa lag pa'i thal mo sbar ba/ sangs rgyas
99b6(rgyud): dur bu'i chos kyi mchog pab mo'i tshul dang / khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i 'dod pa son pa/ sku lus chen po 'dzin pa/ zab mo'i sgra sgrogs pa/ rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can/ mngon par brjod pa'i bra ba chen mo
99b7(rgyud): mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'a grola'i spo pa'i rgyal po'i dra ba'i dra ba ca/ chos sna tshogs pa'i rjes su bstan bsten pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs kyi bde ba skyer zhing ston par byed pa sems dpa' chen gyi
99b8(rgyud): legs pa// lagan rje legs par nyon cig/ mngon par 'dod pa rgyud na ma'i blam la kru pa'i le'u ste gnyel ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor byed kyil 'khor thams pad la rdo rdzogs
100a1(rgyud): gsasapa/ ga rdzo na/  /  ga shegs pams dga' sa/ ma gro la// da dgas su kya sa/ 
100a2(rgyud): mchog ni lags par ton// bla ma yi yang blam ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i rdzog// oM swa hA ba shud d+haHsatwa d+hAr+thas shu d+hA d+hA na 'bras b+hA ba A k+ko ha~M/ oM dra shud
100a3(rgyud): dAR+Sha bAdz+ra shung d+ho&haM/ oM log shud d+d+haHsarba d+hAH log shud d+ho haM/ oM dz+nyA na shud d+haHsar+b+ba thA hArA shud
100a4(rgyud): / la kA r+m+ma g+hun dza sa/  pa rdzu /  sa /  / 
100a5(rgyud): shud d+ho te/ oM thA ga bud d+heHsarba tan thAg shud d+ho haM/ oM kA la shud dAHsab tan kA ra shud d+ho hi/ oM drA na a mra ti shud d+haHsa rbad+hathA d+ha na a mra ti tsud to te/ oM n+dan sam pa shungad d+haHsa ma
100a6(rgyud): / oM n+ya nA ya shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA tsAr+ya rA ya shud dor te/ oM hriM yi ge bde byud dI ti sarba d+ha ga'i pog par shud tor haM/ a a k+ki ka shud dAHsarba d+ha rdza.a TI/ ga shung \u0f85haM/ a brang shud d+ha
100a7(rgyud): da d+ho te/ oM sarba t+te nA ga ta e tra la brung badz+ra swA zla ba Ang ko / sa maN+Da la shud d+haHsarba te ma N+Da la shu nor te/ 'a mad+hi pa ti shud d+he sa dran ma drib ti phud to haM/ e r+tha bud d+haH
100a8(rgyud): btsun tshe/ ma mas sa po 6/ 5 shud \u0f7fsa pa sa shu /  ma ta tra pa ga sa te / ma
100b1(rgyud): ga18/ kau a tan sa \u0f7fsa?taHsosau nanas c-isate / oMd+hitsi ta kar shud d+hi/ sa d+ha mang+ga Te ta kar shud d+ha \u0f7f/ a thAb shung rmAHsa rba r+b+bam thAb shun tu / yang bzud dAHsa
100b2(rgyud): haM/ oM A tar shud d+haHsarba rba thA A hApA ra shud d+ho te/ oM thAb+da shud \u0f7fsarba d+ha thAHk+Sha shud d+ho ha/ oM a sa ma he ta shud tAHsarbad+ya rnams ma he he shud korje te/ oM sras ma ba d+han shud d+haHsa brnamams
100b3(rgyud): yid nga cad samau ga shung rgyas N+Da ga su rto/ na thang sta sa mam
100b4(rgyud): mo dz+ra shud d+hAHsa rnam kha 'adz+ra shu d+ho hi/ oM traHkra pa shud d+hAHsab rgya me gra bar / a nA ka nA~M shung k+Shasapa d+ha m-i kini shrid /  sha

101a1(rgyud): / bskur med pal// gzhan du de ny-id ma sun cig/ mngon badzod spyad la bla ma yis// dbang bskur slob ma dag la sbyin// gzhan du slob sa skyo ba dang // brgyal dang rmongs pa dag tu 'gro// mnar med pa g+sa/ 
101a2(rgyud): pa chen po dang // ngan pa der ni lung bar 'gyur// glegs pam bshes min la ster ba// ngan pa de ma thag tu 'chi// phol mig rims dang drug dang dang // mkha' 'gro gdon gyis gtses par 'gyur/ 
101a3(rgyud): srun bgegs dang tshogs bdag gis// gsod cing dmal par ltung bar 'gyur// ji srid 'bad pa thams cad kyis// blam slob mas rim bzhin du// de nyid rtag tu sbas nas ni// myur du sngags kyi dngos
101a4(rgyud): krub 'gyur// blams thams cad rim bzhin du// mngon brjod rgyud kyi rim pa bzhin// lha'i rnal 'byor la sbyong ba// gnyis med pa'i ye shes 'gyur// de ma chag sa byang chub ste// mchog ni nges
101a5(rgyud): par rnyed par 'gyur// mi li bu mo 'di 'dra brang // bdag gi ma tshig mi shes shing // drag cing log gang bzhin dngan// mi kun snying rje med pa dang // banam chags ser sngar ldan pa dang // sbyang
101a6(rgyud): ning ngan la phrag dog can// skyes pa gzhan la chags pa dang // rnam par rtog pa mang ba dang // 'di 'dra'i phyag rgya spang bar bya// sbyor ba'i dngos grub reng ba yin// prak+ka sI ni mdzes srug grangs// gtsus
101a7(rgyud): sdug gzhan pas rnam par brgyan// sbyor ba la ni gcig tu sems// btul zhugs brten shing dam chog shos/ dpal ning chags bral dro che med// nga rgyal med cing ser sna med// sngags pa rang gi
101b1(rgyud): rdzas bza'// thams cad btud bas myos pa dang // ro la gdan la 'dug pa dang // pags pa chen po gos su gyon// nus su mun pa'i baba' ba ba// zhag dang khrag gis ches pa dang // grong ngam dgod
101b2(rgyud): bdag tu yang // gang zhig yul tu 'gro ba na// rtag tu chags pas mi gnas shing // rtag tu ngur khrong spyod byed la// yang na tshing 'dus gnas pa dang // nyan thos 'jig tan sa la med pa'i// mi shes gte/ 
101b3(rgyud): ga gis khyab pa// nyan thos yongs su longs spyod pa'i// gtsug lag khang du gnas ma bya// ji ltar skyes bu dngul po bzhin/ 
101b4(rgyud): rom// ga su dung baphrad la gnas shed// dri che she rab la/ rkyen byed 'dun pa dzan sa// dpa' ba'i gcims kyi dacig pa'i// sems kyis ra gyi ba rdom par bya// phyag
101b5(rgyud): chen po ma rnyed na// g.yeng ba thams cad rnam spangs bri// de ni ye shes 'byung gnas te// shes rab pha rol phyin las byung // gzung dang 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i// gnyis su med pa nyid la gnas// 
101b6(rgyud): ci gcig sems ni byas nas kyang // bsgom pa'i spyod pa la gnas na// bde la dga' 'a dngas su 'gyur// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga drim// phyag rgya ched nges par ro// bsgom pa mngod du gyur pa yis// 
101b7(rgyud): namagrol sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur// g.yon pa'i spyod pa shes rab ste// g.yas pa de bzhin thabs yin no// bsgom par ldan pa'i mthu stobs ci// sum tswi'i dbang /

102a3(rgyud): rlung ni sbom ma dag tu grags// 'o byad mni stong pa ste// de bzhin pa rol phyin pa len// dbus kyi dpa' bo thams cad ni// mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegs phra gsol// gsang ba 'di mi brtan cing / 
102a4(rgyud): 'bad de sra bar bya// de ltar bangarda yis dpa' bo rnams// de dang lhan cig bza' ba bza'// dpa' bos thams cad mnyam spor ba// mkha' 'gra dra ba'i'abed mchog yan// phar tshun nges 'gro thams cad
102a5(rgyud): tshogs pa de bshad par bya// mkha' 'grom yi mtshan nyid dang // ba lta rnams kyi mtshan nyid dag/ sab pa pal pa 'a// de dag thangs padang sha pa bya// rab sa dpa sngag dgas dag/

102b3(rgyud): sngags pas s+ho// tshogs rigs kyi kyad par dang // nam 'bying sa 'i spyad pa dang // mkha' brlom yang de bzhin te// phyi rom ma byag bya ga/  mas ni rigs las byung // dpa' bo

102b5(rgyud): pa'i khyad par dang // skye dpod spyod ba dag la mkhas// rnam 'byor sa mi chud spyod dang // nam byor chud ni rgya che ba// bya ba'i rgyun byed dbye ba'i rig// thams cad drin rnams rnam par shes/ 
102b6(rgyud): bu'i lung dang bstan bcos dang // mdo sde skyes raba' de bzhed te// blan med pa'i spyod pa dag/ shes rab ros phyin la 'azung // the ro la ldad la yongs la mkhas// phun sum tshogs pa
102b7(rgyud): slob dpon 'jog/ sbyor ba'i bsgom par ldan pa dang // yid gnyis med pa nyid can// 'ab pa thams cad 'aza' bar bya// lage brgyabs thams cad du// gsang lugs btan par bsgom la
103a1(rgyud): mgan yin do//  na du khye// de nying rnam ldan te// sos gyus joms par 'gyur bayin// bsgom pa di na mchog paye// 'dod pa das gyu thun ma

103a4(rgyud): ngos zung thams cad dab tu stso pa// bka' me 'dza la ba zung ba lnga// phur bus bdegs med dngom grub 'gyur// bsrung ba mchog ni 'di dag gi// sgrub pa po la byang chub stsal// do zlar thal rab dang
103a5(rgyud): rje'i sa dang dra ba dang // steng gi gur dang bla res yis// gdug pa'i bdud ni bskrad byas nas// me gsod gsod pa med pa yin// gang gis rang sems thul ba yis// bdag gi sems ni bcings

103b2(rgyud): tshangs med cing mi gtsang med// dag pa'i bya ba'ang yod pa yin// dus dang med las rnam par grol// dag pa'i spyod pa rnam par spangs// rang shi shas cu dpyor rashes// sems cad dguran gyi don

105a6(rgyud): dgod// sngo ni daser la de bzhin dmar// khwa ba rbang pa'i mdog can te// dkar zhing nag la gu dum mdog/ rab 'jigs thod pa'i dang rgyad cing / zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// thams
105b1(rgyud): 'khyud// dmar ser dbu sgra dag gis brgyad// mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa car// stag gi pags bgos sum dpas// 'jigs pa'i phreng ba'i rgya car te// des ni bdag nyid brgyad du byab// 
105b2(rgyud): po d+hi mdzad napa par bsto// tho zhing 'bar la g.yo ba dang // mug cing 'jigs pa rnam par 'gyur// rgyun rnams kun gyis legs par gyur// g.yas brgyad pa le gcas pa bzhugs// lcag
105b3(rgyud): nags pa kha n+de 'chang // dril bu rdo rje thod pa 'dzin// mgo yi do shal skul 'chang // thod pa'i phreng ba'i ska rags can// gdug pa thams cad zhabs 'og mnar// thabs dang shes rab rnam par
105b4(rgyud): samasu dpa'i deb chan can// rdo rje 'jigs khyed bsgom par bya// tshun gnyis sornam par bsgom// steng du gtsug tor labar gyur te// rdo rje 'dzig pa byed rnam par skom// yon tu rdo rjes 'og go
105b5(rgyud): dkar la khro ba'i mdog can min// thod pa dang ni n+d+ha 'dzin// 'khor lo dang ni mdung 'dzan cing // nags pa lcags kyu dril dong // galas brlang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// srang bu mo bor dbyas nasas/ 
105b6(rgyud): gas 'dre ras pas so// des byag 'du ba sgo // bgegasan nga mye par gyis// gsang sngags rjems cananas pa// phyogs nadas mnyam par gagyugs// me thugs
105b7(rgyud): gsang sngags rgyal ba 'di yis ne// bgegs kun gyi da pa gang bur bus dag cing banan// lugs su gyud dang zlog pa yi'o// oM g+ha g+ha g+hA la g+hA ta pa/ lab du 'i dz+nyAnan d+hu Ta/ kA la la'i
106a1(rgyud): / dz+ra du tu rlu na/  ga la la badz+ra d+ha ro d+ha pa ya ta kA la ldag tsa d+ha badz+ra kA la ya d+ha phaT// phung pa ring ze bo ru// bltas nas yongs su btag par bya// lugs su gyung nga bag pa
106a2(rgyud): dngos su ngadzirjesu 'ju bar bya// oM badz+ra b+he gradag drA kI la dz+ra kos ma hU~M d+hu phaT phaT// mkhas pas rdordza khro po'i tshig/ gas rdzogs tshig ningag rtsu ba// mal du smri pa
106a3(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM badz+ran lArka badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ro Sh+kaM/ Shabadz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM kuN+Da li badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra lak+Sha badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra ga rA la te hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA ba la badz+ra pU phaT/ 
106a4(rgyud): dz+ra phaT/ e uSh+NI Sha kri bi ti badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra pA tu la badz+ra hU~M phaT// bka' 'de dag ni bslab pa yis/  mthan tu bgegs med 'gyur// mAM sa rkang dang zhag la chu// shu
106a5(rgyud): cig sbyar// rnal 'byor pa yis ri lu byas// bos na dngos grub nges par 'gyur// sre shing ser la lhang khrir// rdo rje hUM mdzad rang byas te// ser zheng gnag la ldang khu dang // dung khA se
106a6(rgyud): dang // dkar ner se ral lda bu dang // dmar zheng ser la ldang ba dag/ de ltar bzhin bdag bzhin// mi bskyod dang rkyen mchog car// bsgoms pasang rje 'dzin pa dgyes// 'di ga
106a7(rgyud): kyang // dmachog las ni 'gal ma byed// 'di ltar tshogs du ma yi// gtso bo bka' de blang bar gyis// rnal 'byor ba re gar gnas pa// bgegs rnams thams cad med par mthong
106a8(rgyud): ma yang rname gcer ba ma// sgra grol thal bas yan lag byugs// 'di ltar de srid mngal bar// 'kho lo dkri ga bzlas pa bya// srong pa'i ye shes so // dadang di
106b1(rgyud): bdag/ a sh+tsa na nu dza thAb sa no rgya/ ma ts+tshan sathA // oM a/ hata 'dus ma kau// mr-i ye shes ni// sems ma na pa par ga/ 
106b2(rgyud): de mkha' dang mnyam pa yin// chos med chos min pa yang med// nam mkha' gos pa med pa ltar// dngos po med cing dmigs du med// gang gi snying gi kha sbyar dngul gnas gsal// phra bar
106b3(rgyud): nga blang myos pa'i sems 'jug pa// khams gsum ma lus gnyis med par ni nyer 'gro ba// gsal ba chos kyi dbyings mchog de la bdag phyag 'tshal// dngos po'i g.yob rta kun nang du nges sbyor
106b4(rgyud): re shes rgyal ba ma lus 'dus pa'i snod gyur pa// khams gsum ma lus gnyis med par ni nyer 'gro ba'i// mthong ba mkha' dang 'dra bar dri med dpal du gyur// sangs rgyas rjes dran ral 'byor gyis// 
106b5(rgyud): sa ni rjes su dran pa sgom// chos rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// chos kyi sku ni rang 'byung 'gyur// dbus na gsal byed rnam par shes// ye shes mchog ni shes rnams kyis// shin du bsgoms
106b6(rgyud): bi'i goms pa las// 'bar ba 'di ni the tshom mang // rtag tu snying pa gnas pa yi// thig le gcig su le ge med// skyes thos de ni bsgoms gyurar// ye shes skye bar gyur ba mchog/ sems dpa'
106b7(rgyud): drananal 'byor kyis// sems dpa' rjes su dran par bsgom// sems dpa' rjes dran chos kyis me// chos kyi sems dpa' byed par 'byung // bdag ni snying rjes par 'dogs pa// smon lam dang
106b8(rgyud): sa /  sa sa//  ma sa pan skye // ku sa da nga//  pa nas so// 
107a1(rgyud): ra ma// tshigs lang ya sa /  / nanas so/  na s+ho/ nga tu san// des // ma
107a2(rgyud): mchog dam pa// klu gsum pa la dmar pa'i mdog/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'ab rabs khyab// nyi ma bye ba 'od mtha' las// rdo rjes mchad pas bsgom par bya// de yi steng du na nyid de// yi ge ba mchog sa
107a3(rgyud): / du shar yi mdog 'dra ba// zlab la 'od zer phreng ba can// de yi steng dus dkyil 'khor// lo las byung ba ser po ste// zung bzhi pa la rdorje sa mtshan// 'od zer ser po khyab par 'khrigs// rnal
107a4(rgyud): daste bsgom pa ni// nga rab lhun po mchog gyur pa// zur bzhi pa la ri chen bani// rtse mo brgyad kyis rnam par mdzes// yi ge suMlas legs par byung // 'od zer gami brji mchog dam pa'o// 
107a5(rgyud): / dadu bsam pa ni// buM ni dkar po las byung ba// de steng 'khor lor bcas pa dag/ khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bsam// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// dra
107a6(rgyud): dkyis mengs shid // bad byeng bas rnam par btud// zud kyi ma ni thams cad dang // rgo sgo kyang mtshams rnams pa// ngo rjen chen gyis brgyan cing // phyi yi dkyil 'thongs grags
107a7(rgyud): le nang du 'kho la ne// brgyad po dag pa' mngag car la// de yi dbus su pad ma che// sna tshogs 'dab ma brgyad pa la// lte 'gas gyis khyab ba// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus bran/ 
107a8(rgyud): mas dpe ga // / sa par ba bad te// dbang dang nga sanas panas// gzheng nod dang khrob dang // dab par 'gyur ba shes 'jigs/ 
107b1(rgyud): nam par ldan// mdung dang dgrad cang te'u dang // gra gug cad pa/ brtag// tshangs pa bags pa gos sumanapas// zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dag/ bya ni bcu gnyis de bzhin te// 
107b2(rgyud): dpa'i skyil mo krung ngu zhugs// da can thod pa'i cod pan can// rgyun rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// dpe byad mtshan dang yang dag ldad// thugs kyi ye shes ma drug car// cod
107b3(rgyud): rje'adzin pa yin// de ltar thabs bzhin shes rab de// phyag rgya lnga po byid gyis brlabs// rigs kyi dbye bas phye nas ni// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyag mchog/ bde ba chen po'i mangs sbyor
107b4(rgyud): sku ni gnyis su med par thim// mnyam pa nyid las byung ba'i sku// mkha' 'gro'i 'khor na dpa' bo dang // rnal 'byor ma dang bcas par byung // g.yas pa nus g.yod brgya batshul gyis 'azhugs/ 
107b5(rgyud): dkar sngo sa dam pad la mdog kyi// 'khor la dril la chud pa'i phyag/ sngar gyi rdo rje sems sogs pa'i// phyag mtshan rim pa 'dzan pa yin// thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyad dang ni// mgo bol
107b6(rgyud): brjod pas srung // zla ba med pa rab 'dzed pa // zhal bzhi mche rnam par gcig sa// spyan gsum pa phyag bcu gnyis pa// tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnapas kyis gnon pa shA ra'i rus pa'i
107b7(rgyud): 'bru gyis 'khor lo 'dzin pas 'khyud pa/ dran pa gnyis kyis 'brel ba/ bede ba dang dkyim pas stsol ba// khams dang phung po dang / skye mched rnams byed gyis brlangs te ba zhesas del
108a1(rgyud): ra// chu ma paN+DIgaso par rnyernamam// mam na 'dugs byed pa'o// dz+ha nas ga sa saso// mam na 'a ma
108a2(rgyud): sngo dang / dmar ba dang / du pa dang / sngob 'o// gzugs kyi phung po rnam par snang ma nga/ oM mdog dkar po// tshor ba'i phung ba ring ched te a gser btso ma'i mdog lta bu/ 'du shes ji ste pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug
108a3(rgyud): 'dre da rdo rgyal po sa ha/ da/ rnam par nas brdoHsapas dpar snye dkang po// de ponan gshegs pa rnams cad byed 'on nyid de pa le na kya gi mngog nag go mag bu sre ga gdong dkar gon 'du

108a5(rgyud): oM ste sngon po'o// de ltar bul dag yad gsung bye ba byin gyis bad+ma cid dmig po// del shar gyi 'dab ma'i ma pa 'bro mni sumadog ldon 'o'o// khro phyogs kyi 'dabam la bcwa ni ldang cu ste/ sngosangs so// nub phyogs kyi 'dab ma la du
108a6(rgyud): mdamar mo// byang gis 'dab ma la gzugs ca ma gser gyi mdog ser smug la gcig pa/ phyag bzhig spyad dbu ma ga/ sa grol ga phyonas kye gos 'chang ba// gapas brkyang pas gnas pa/ 'jigs pa'i rnam par 'gyur

108b1(rgyud): dang sa/ rgya pa yadas pa'i nga dos / marar 'gro a lus/ ma dgu du la can 'das ra pa pa / da thal du rgyu na pags dug dang / thams cams

110b4(rgyud): ririgs chen mong mar po// mu sa tri sha ku ni dpa' bo chen po dang // rlung gi shugs can mnag go// lho ru ko sa lar rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / char 'thung ma nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs/ me'i phyogs su

110b6(rgyud): par mig se bzang dang bya gdong sa nam mkha' ltar rdzo bsangs so// gsung ga 'khor los la spyod pa'o// sgra gu can li sogs pa'i dpa'i bo ni zhal cig pa/ phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum pa ral po

111a1(rgyud): // rab ti la sogs pa/ lha mo rnams ni phyag gnyig pags gcig bzod pa dang ldan pas 'argyad cang pad ma dang ldan pas bsngags 'dzub byed pa/ mgu rgyan dngag/ yang dpung rgyan dang na
111a2(rgyud): dang tshangs pa'i spyad pa dang ldan pa'o// thod pa'i phreng bas mgul brgyan cing / g.yer ka sgra sgrog sku rags ldan// khra gdong la sogs dbye ba yis// sngar bshad sgo bsrungs la sogs bzhin/

111a4(rgyud): / yi ge rnams ni dgad cing bsgom// thugs ni AHste dmar po yin// gsung ni oM sta dkar por bshad// rdorje sun du yin te/ nam mkha' rnam

111b2(rgyud): phaT/ oM su b+ha ng+ge Ta/ a d+ham hA b+hai ba ts+tshi ts+tsha hUM phaT/ oM ha ma kate hu~M hUM baT/ oM d+hi ma bi ru bAk+Sha hU~M baT/ e kha na tshul a~M \u0f89\u0fa4kra s+ye ng+ge bru~M / oM u lu kA m+be d+he d+he baT/ oM shwar su~M
111b3(rgyud): mu ka rA b+he hU~M hU~M ba ku se la mdu d+hi hU~M hUM phaT/ oM yam du ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM la mdaM Sh+Ti hu~M hUM laT/ yo la ma mtha ni hU~M phaT/ rdo rje dam tshig gis mchod nas// bzlas pa'i chon rab tuH// dgug pa da na rgyas nad
111b4(rgyud): chags las ni 'dzub par 'gyur// chos can yid 'ong gyur pa ste/ ngag ga dngos gung 'bru gyur/ mchog dang bar mthams cad dang // tham thams cad mthar gnas la// de la thams cad gnas pa ste// sna tshogs gdul

112a1(rgyud): / nyar pablar min dang / skem brda'i chongs kyad ma dang / rma bajug mo byed ma dang hU 'dra smag sa byed/ phaT ha pa d+ma na rtaka ste/ snying gdang mgo dang skye gtsug dang mig dang chos kyi mtsho rang rna
112a2(rgyud): // dmar ba dang sngo ba dang dkar ba dang ser ba dang ljang khu dang / dud pa'i mdog can no// bzlas pa'i'adus su dadod pa ste// ji ltar bde bar spyang par bya// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// go 'bang gnas ni bcug pa pa
112a3(rgyud): yed// mnyam par bzhug pas drod 'byung ba// rtseg cig dmigs pas drung bya ste// gsung ga rdo rje mnyam pa nying // rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// cos rnams thams cad rab tu brtag/ rdo rje chu dang rnam snang dang / 
112a4(rgyud): dartsi mar dkar lhan cig sbyar// muM yid mchod sbyor ba yis// snying po'i ye shes de nyid do// bdag po dbu rgyan sa bsgoms lo// ci bde bar ni bana' ba 'azal// lha yi gzugs su gar nas su// 'dod
112a5(rgyud): bdag por ste// bda' ba'o ma'i btung ba yis// nad dang rga ba rnam par spangs// sems can rjes su chags pa yi// lha mo glu 'dis bskul ba yis// byang chub chos rnams thams cad kyi// sems
112a6(rgyud): nI med mdzod// brtson 'grus pa rol phyin pa yis// thugs rje bskyed cing bstan par mdzad// gsang ba'i chos ni stan nas kyang // dag gi dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub// sems can kun la
112a7(rgyud): 'phyir// ji lta bar ni bstan pas grol// de nyid rnal 'byor mas bskul nas// sna tshogs du ma mang po yi// dam tshig mchod pa ngo mtshar rmad// mig phye nas ni bstod pa ni// A bar ru sa ra
112a8(rgyud): ma tas khya la/ lam ya ma mato// suraHsa rgya rjelamapar// sug tasan tam ma tha'i bu ba'i kung ba/ rba cad la badrang ga tha 'i ngas pa'i ma pa/ lung to yul ba dra ngag
112b1(rgyud): rlug lus ngan bkya la/ thangs mang sur tam 'i ma to// nga la ma hA su ma yang du / thar zhes sul ba hU~M bta b+hUdzamra gru rdzam tang ra/ d+hAn ba
112b2(rgyud): hA ho ho su ra to tA rA lA su khar ti rIdzin par ma shri ra ti ho// bar ma he tu ma hA su kha ho// su 'am ru po na bar me shwar to/ 
112b3(rgyud): car dri bar ma ma hA la to// su'am du phre to// pur te ung tams ni mu'i a mA romig am hA ru 'bri to// klu 'di da'i drungs ci gyis// dga' dong bde ba yang dag 'dug// bde ba chen po
112b4(rgyud): / dngo grub kyang ni 'thob par 'gyur// 'khor tshogs chen po byin brlabs nas// dkyi ma por chen po dgyes pa che// pad+ma dra ba'i sdom pa yin// nges par 'arjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las gsung gi sdol ba'i

113a1(rgyud): 5// bcom ldan 'deb chen pa ni// 'khor dang bcas pa mnyam par bzhengs// thugs kyi 'khor lo zhal bzhi pa// phyag 'acu gnyis bzhapas brgyad g.yon bskum pa rnabs kyis bzhugs pa/ 
113a2(rgyud): gsum pa/ mche ba rnam pa ra tshigs pa/ sngob dang ga ba dang per ba dang dmar bechen pa/ dwe rje dang dris bus 'byung pa/ khyab 'ju ni mgo'i phyag na bsdams pa// khyab 'jug ga pags pa rlon pa bca na phyag gan

118a1(rgyud): ga yan da gru/ nas ba mas /  sa gyur /  dpa pa cwos/ mama'i mdon dpe dang /  ra na

118a3(rgyud): pa la drag po'i gzugs// skyil mo krung ni phyed par bzhugs// phyogs kyi gos can mchog yin no// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// skra grol ba yis rnam par brgyan// lha mo phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing // 'dod pa'i rnam

118a6(rgyud): dang gcug par bya// yi dang g.yus la bkod nas ni// go'abang mchog ni bsgom par bya// hUM AHmau ni rnam par bsgom// gsang sngags de bzhin bzlas na ni// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// oM shrI badz+ra hi he ru ruka
118a7(rgyud): hUMg kA n+ti d+hi la mthur swA/  che la/  po da snang po'o// ma rnaM rnaMs gyu samams sa rbA shi ni seM hU~M b+hU po rgya mthum na
118a8(rgyud): ya~M re he huM hUM phaT/ o ga hU~M phrub su khro ba'o stsal pa smos nas ni/ 'gro ba gsum po rdzogs par byas// bsgom pa bzlas par ldan pa la'o// bdagags spong nga ba sdu bar bya// khams gsum ma lus kun du
118b1(rgyud): / lus pa su rtse da na// dam can kya rnams yangs nasas/ sagatam po bzhapa / a dzasam gapas ma nam ma tha ma ma la tun sha dab
118b2(rgyud): / sa te pal sapa 'dang snyed sus pa nyes pa'o tu ma des ga la'o mchog sde lan lagasam bar gyi zhom 'o// ma bar rdzabag mas lta mam// nyi ma ma su sbeng gas mo//  mdzangs byed pa
118b3(rgyud): mgo po la la/ hU~M skrag byed maste spyi cug la'o// phaT phaT oM ni tsan+ti ka ste yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o// 'di ni dam tshig ngo bo ste/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin no// sngags dbyibs chos bdag rnal 'byor
118b4(rgyud): chos su sna ba yas/  sna bde pa spyod ba dbya/ mang ba rjod pa'i rgyud blam las gnas kyi ma pa ste le'ung rgyang pa'o//  rjes gnan yang sha phya gdab pog cig rngu chog ni/ sngags padu lte bar rnamams ma pa
118b5(rgyud): re yeng ngas su ne// de'i steng du sa tshogs 'bru de'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor// de'i steng du stod pa ye shes lnga'i bdud kyis gang ga/ de'i dbus su A le kA la yulas su 'byung ba dang / lugs las bzlog pa'i tshul du nyas ldan
118b6(rgyud): dkyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba dga' zhing dgyes pa las byung ba ni dpa' lugs rje'i bdag nyid te rug chags pas rnam par 'khor bar bsgom mo/ de yang zhal pa ni gzug bcu gnyis gzhabs ga pa pa nga
118b7(rgyud): jugasag mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ spyan gsum gzhal rnam par 'gyur gcod pa'i phreng ba can/ dpa' bob phyag rgya drug gis sgra lus phyag rgyas btab ga 'jigs bye chen po dag du mtshan te kyi mgo dang ya na gzhag ni
118b8(rgyud): 'bral ga ste re ros la gdo bun mo gyud pa'i bye gnyis gdo byedagu pa dang de phre su khya gagazhanaganyi 'jog pabye dag pa'i bag pa'i rtobs yin gzham sa 'i tug gsus padorje du napas bya gyul pa padzang
119a1(rgyud): du 'jug pa lardo Ta/ rgyan na mo pa'i gsum pan pod ba nangadags yongs sug dag rnam myong byam chod phyir rdzogs dpa do rje rdzun/  cu ma pa'i 'jo ram 'jabs 'i 'dzi dril
119a2(rgyud): 'phyang ba/ sna tshogs pa dan rang tu sbyangs pa/ dbus su sna tshogs rdorjes mtshan pa/ 'og nas ngo rje rtse gcig pa/ ba pa la rdo rje nags pa/ sngapa la tshangs pa'amanobo// rdza kha lang krus bsnams pa la
119a3(rgyud): mdag 'o 'di/ ser bdang dmar ba dang snang lung bad+ha 'dags su rung ba// sgeg pa dang / dgod pa dang / babyad pa sa can dung thugs pa'o// de'i mdun du thal salas byung ci'i bcom ldan 'das mngo
119a4(rgyud): 'byung nas bzhugs te/ sku mdog dmar po/ byug bzhi pa/ zhal bzhi pa/ sun gsum pa/ dbuskra grol ba/ gcer bu ma phul ska dal can/ phyag g.yon pa na thod pa/ byang chub kyi sems dang gdug pa'o// 
119a5(rgyud): kyir k+tas/ yongs su ga ba/ g.yas pa'i sdigs mdzab can la rdo cig ge gzigs pa/ phyag gzhan gnyis la rang te'u dang // ba T+wAMg bsdams pa/ bzhal pa'i me lta gas parji rgyan/ !
119a6(rgyud): khrig la gal/ byen pa gags mnyam par bsnol la/ 'di can cam/  re gad ma dpa ba nga gA dang / se sa / bdun ca jigs par mang pa'o// bcom ldan la
119a7(rgyud): zhel dang na mdog de ltar phyag dang sku mdog kyang de ba nyi du che/ di ma rnal 'byor pa mchog gis nang gi gnas la sogs pa'i dam par dgad // pu suM zad pa'i dum bu dang / rabag tums ni mgo la'o// 
119a8(rgyud): keng rul chen po dang / gtum ma'i chog can mni skye gtsug sa la// u ste keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma nan pa g.yas par ro// a ste mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma mo spyi bo'i rgya bdugs
119b1(rgyud): dang dpa' bo'i ro gros ma ni dpa g.yon par ro// ra ste smid mi'i dbus su ni 'od dpag mad dang / ma'adzung // de stemag gtas su ni ngo rje'i 'od dang / lang ka' dbang lag ma'o// ma ste dpung rdar ni rdo lus dang / shing
119b2(rgyud): pa'o// nye ba'i gnas te thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam mkha' la sod pa'o// ka sA mtshan lung gnyis phun k+Sha ra dang / sa bsrungs ma'o// e sta nu ma gnyis sun rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo ste ning
119b3(rgyud): stelte ba'i dbus su stobs po che dang rlung gi shugs can ma'o// he khyer ni rdo rje hUM mang dadang / chang 'jung ste ge bi zhing ngo // ka ste kha la ni rab bzang dang / sngob sangs lha mo'o// la ste mgrin par ni rdo rje 'od dang / 
119b4(rgyud): rab bzang maste chen dronga'o//  sme sa ni rdo rje le gas byed dang / te ma'o hi / ba shang grol myig ming za dang bya gdong ba ste ge pa'i tshan ngoga'o// dadung gi 'khor los la spyod pa'o// khre snyem ma pa lan
119b5(rgyud): stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs ma'o// gri ste gzhang la ni rdo rje rin can dang / dum skyes ma'o// 'dus pa can ne sa sa brla gnyis su rta mgrin dang / chang 'tshong ma'o// su sabyen pa gnyis la ni nam mkha'
119b6(rgyud): pa dang / 'khong mo 'o cha ma'o// nye ba'i 'dus pa can no// na ge sor mo rnams la na dpal he ru ka dang / shin du dab 'a mo'o// si ste rkang po la gnyis su ni pangs gar gyi ba thug dang / stobs chen gyi'o// 
119b7(rgyud): do// ma stemathe bong gnyis la ni rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor mos bskyar ma'o/ gu ste pus mo gnyis su rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo'o// ke ba'i drung drod de sru ba khor mos kyi
119b8(rgyud): 'o// mtha' 'gror na / la ma mchil bu/ dus skyes ma dang / gzugs can ni gang ma che'i phags pa 'dzin pa le 'du/ wa gdong mas rdo rje mdug/ drag gdo pa'i gas kyi// khyi sa dong ma mams
120a1(rgyud): // phag gdong ma ni cang te'u/ gshin rje sreg pa ni thod pa'i kha T+wAM ga ma/ bshin rje po nyam mi nags pam/ gshin rje mche ba ma ni tshangs pa'i mgo bom/ gshin rje 'joms man dgra snga ma/ 
120a2(rgyud): kye sems kyi snod ni zhal bzhi'i ngobo// si'i khams ni 'bebs ma/ chu'i khams ni gsod ma/ me'i khams ni 'gugs ma/ rlung gi khams ni gar gyi dbang phyug ma/ nam mkha'i khams ni pad+ma
120a3(rgyud): no// gzugs kyi phung po ni rnam par snang mdzad/ tshor ba'i phung po ni de ji nyi ma/ 'du shes kyi phung po ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyag/ 'dre byed kyi phung pon rdo rje rgyal po// rnam par shes pa'i phung poni
120a4(rgyud): dpa' pe/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de khon nyid ni dpal rdo rje he ru ka'o// mig gnyis ni gti mug rdo / rna ba gnyis ni zhe sang rdo rje/ snun sar sna dang / pab ni 'dod chags dang / reg tu
120a5(rgyud): dag da / skye mched thams cad ni dbang phyug rdo rje/ yid ni mi 'khrugs pa/ ngag ni tshe dpag med/ lus ni rnam par
120a6(rgyud): gtsug la ba drag bye ra bya'o/ gongs te dbyung ba gnyis skye // hUM mig gnyis su ni nye ga pan te yin lag thams cad mchog ni ma'o// yo bal ba la rdo
120a7(rgyud): hapaM stang pa ya mda'o// srem mang mongs byed ma'o// rbo tso ni mgo la spyong byed mal// dz+dza hUM sI gtsug la smug byed pa'o// phaT pan tsi N+Di ka ste yan lag thams cad kyi go cha'o// mdzub mo mang
120a8(rgyud): mosapar gyur// mi bo dnganganan por rab tu spar// de yi dbul ba'i dbus su rab pani gnas/ sor zhing bsno bas kun du bskor bar bya// nang man cing ldeng du bal/ 
120b1(rgyud): shi // phyogs cur 'dzin na mas bzhugs pa'o// dab dzin la 'byor pa rnams 'thugs// rba hrIH hoH/ don lugasasu ma sogs pa'i sbyar bapa dgug cing mang tu gzhug sa bcing sa dbang du ba'o// 
120b2(rgyud): 'dod nas 'byor la des ma pa'i dkyil yongs su gang bar mthong bzhin du rtsod pa bdudu rtsi las yongs su gang bas spang 'am pas dang bcas pas dbang bsgyur dab lo// ci ltar bsams pa tsam gyis kyang // decin
120b3(rgyud): gshegs kun khrus gsol ba// lha yi chu ni dag pa yis// de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o// mo sarbata thA ga ta a b+hi She g+ha sa ma la shrI ye hUM hUM/ rlung dang mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du thod pa/ der yi de ma bskyed pa la/ ye shes
120b4(rgyud): 'i bad kyis yongs su ga ba/ zlab 'i bcu drug pa la la ga da A oM sa byin gyis bcwam / migag mam tsam mo 'i tshu lo ga sang 'byung ba rlo mo// chosam bya shud d+haHsa~M d+ha/ samal
120b5(rgyud): bra yosacas cad kyi bcud mnyam por gnas par thayim mo// ye shes su mi stong bamis/ rdo bdud phyi'i bu rkyang //  'dzas khri ma.ud ga/ yu ma hU~M so// ye shes parnas pa'i sgo
120b6(rgyud): yis// 'khor lom chog ni rnam par s+ho// drang cher phreng ba blang sa rang mi// de nas dal bzlas pa bya// rang sro rgal ba byas nas ni/ bsgoms pas de sa thag tu bar// o bcwa shrI hi ha~M dru hU~M hU~M phaT/ oMn+da kon
120b7(rgyud): / nga / mam na AH/ oM sa // ma zhi gakau/  sa par ma m+b+ha
120b8(rgyud): sur bzlas nang bas theg tan gyi// ngam par gyur na nam dag canas// des bya ba'i byin sa kyi chos bus bu rtsa bdur ti nas/ srim can pa nyesar gzhag pa nims 'akrom mo// ra barba pa nye ba gsas
121a1(rgyud): // pa ni lA ma'o// chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni dum skyes ma'o// sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni gzugs can ma'o// 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni rab tu gtum ma'o// brtson 'grus kyi rdza
121a2(rgyud): dang ba ni gtum ma'i mig can ma'o// dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni 'ad ldan pa'o// sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni sa chen ma'o// ye shes kyi pad+ma rnam par spang ba'o// dad pa'i dbang po ni brtan pa'i
121a3(rgyud): brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni mi 'thung ma'o// drang pa'i dbang po ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni shing grib ma'o// thugs kyi 'khor lo rnam par snang ba'o// shes rab kyi dbang po nas
121a4(rgyud): ma'o// da pa'i stobs ni 'jigs byed chen po'o// brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni rlung gi shugs can ma'o// dran pa'i stobs ni chang 'thung ma'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni sngo bsang lha mo'o// shes rab kyi stobs ni
121a5(rgyud): nga ma'o// ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ri t+ta rna ma'o// brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi ya lag ni chang 'tshong ma'o// dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma
121a6(rgyud): snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni shin tu dpa' mo'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba ni stobs chen ma'o// yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni 'khor los bsgyur ma'o// yang dag pa'i ngag ni dpa' mo chen mo'o// sku'i
121a7(rgyud): rnam par gang ba'o// yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' mekha gdong ma'o// nga dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni 'ug pa'i sodo can no// yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni dri'i gdang can no// yang dag pa'i dran pa ni bag gdong ma'o// dam pa
121a8(rgyud): rab sani 'i sgo'o// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin de bcom ldan 'das dpal he rugs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes
121b1(rgyud): skyed pa ni gshin rje ba sreg ma'o// dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par bsrung ban gshen rje'i pho nya ma'o// mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par spong ba ni gshin rje mche ba ma'o// mi dge ba'i chos ma
121b2(rgyud): sa pa rnams me bskyed pa ni gshin rje 'joms ma'o// dam tshig gi 'khor lo rnam par sbyang ba'o// 'di ltar ma lus par bsgom pa na/ sgrub pos nges par 'grub par 'gyur// sems can don du rnal 'byor bdang
121b3(rgyud): nyam nyid dam tshig dam pa'o// 'khor lo lnga po so so yi// cho ga so so'i dbye ba bsgom// mngal skyes so so'i dbye ba dag/ 'khor lo lnga yi mchog nyid can// rnal 'byor ma sogs gtsong bsgom pa// so so'i
121b4(rgyud): 'idabyed yin// ji ltar rdo rje he ruka/ de bzhin lha mo'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma sbyar ba// rnal 'byor ma le 'khor de bzhin// dorje su yi dpa' bo bdag/ b+hag dbus su rnam par bskem// de ltar
121b5(rgyud): do pa'i rim pa yis// de ltar 'khor lo gsum du sbyor// b+ha ga lnga po bdag gis bsgom// dbus su mkha' 'gro ma sbyor dang // pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma'i skor dang // 
121b6(rgyud): par logs / 9 drug ni mchog nyid bsgom// da mi tshig la dzir la gyi snyoms pa la// da mchen mi nga 'gro mi dkyil 'khor//  shes mtha' 'gro ma'i dkyil la ra// sna tshogs pad+ma las sogs dang
121b7(rgyud): shes 'khor lo'i sbyor bdag/ de 'di blaga'i dbus dag tu// 'khor lo la bdag la bsgom// dpa' bo gcig bu he ruka/ de bzhin phrag mad bzhin du// snga mdog zhal dang phyag dang mtshan// de nyid sna tshogs pa
121b8(rgyud): ga/ da pa ng+gA dbus dag ste/ na ston mtshas nyid bsngal/ khad ba lhan cig sanyam pa ra// khwa li ba bdag sor te// rnal 'bar ma yi rim pa bsam// ngag 'dizhes parnam par mi pa// 'khor ba bdag po mamang ma ga/ 
122a1(rgyud): 'azhud pa yid phyag rgya can// dpa' bo 'khor lo del bsam// rang ba ga ni rdul 'byur ma// snying dusmras pa rnam par bsgom// tshogs kyi 'khar mam sa 'byor mo// phyag pa rnams na rnam par mdzon
122a2(rgyud): gnyis ni 'khyud pa'i phyag yin te// gzhan ni sna tshogs mtshan ma 'dzin// phyag gnyis dag ni dbyung ba dang // de yi b+ha ga'i dbus drid// dpa' bos bsgom pa ma mthong ngo // kun rdzob skyes pa'i sbyor ba ni/ 
122a3(rgyud): sgom pa'i mchog kyang ma mthong ngo // sgong las skyes rim sbyor ba'i// bsgom pa'i rnam par bsgom pa ni// lnga po 'dul pa rabasam pa ste// sgong skyes mchog ni bsgom pa'o// 'khor lo'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yis
122a4(rgyud): celtar bsam pa'i bye brag gis// de ltar 'dod pa bsgom pa'o// bdag po'i dbye'i dbye ba yi pha/ rigs kyi dbye ba rnam par bsgom// lha mo'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yis// bdag po la
122a5(rgyud): rnam par bsam// ming ge dbye ba'i dbye ba yis// mkha' 'gro ma li sba la spyor// yang na sku gsum dbye gang gis// de ni bdag por daphyag yin nabadag po la sogs dbye ba yis// 'khor lo'i dbye ba bya ba 'i
122a6(rgyud): shes kyi dbye ba thams cad kyi'o// dpa' bo la 'byor ma yis dbye// mang po skyes grwa yi skyong ba gyis /  sgos pa rnams ni yongs su brtag/ spyad skyes grwa ni med pa ste// sgra dang sta nyams spangs pa'o// 'di na
122a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal 'byor ba de ba'i mchog dmang // kha cig dag ni rnal 'byor 'dod// kho ga rnal 'byor 'dod min te// khru sbal sogs spangs pa yis/ gangos pa med pa'i gob bar zhugs phra ning mi za dngos po med// gzu
122a8(rgyud): 'arnam lus 'o// sgral sogs bcas pa 'o// ko mang sartso ge 'ongs spyod ni// klu mA la logs spangs pa'i// ngo sa po med pa'i go mang bajugs pa sa ni ba da mo po med// gzung
122b1(rgyud): pastsa 'o// gong ba mchog gi yongs spyod na// glu skal legs bcas pa'o// 'dod pa'i yon tan thams ca kyang // ra pa b+hab byer bdag nas 'aza'/ sems mngon la brtson pa yis// bzod pa bco
122b2(rgyud): mchog dam pa// rnal 'byor pas klu mi dang cing // mkha' 'gro mas ni phar par dkye3/ ho srid pa gsum na bde brnyes gtso// al la la ho// rgyal ba 'de car phreng ba'i chags/ pad+ma ma na rdo rje rol/ 
122b3(rgyud): de gshegs bral ba'i ba'ang las grol// bdag po dgyes pa kun gyi bcud// chags pas par tu gyes mdzad cing // srid pa gsum na tshogs kyi bcud// a la la ho// dgyes pas mngon par grol ba po// bas
122b4(rgyud): las rab grol yangs// a lI las ni byung ba yis// pad+ma li ni rnal 'byor bas// ku la rgyal po 'ad byangs pas// rdo rje la 'byor ba ra// pad+ma dra ba las ladas 'o// dus baphrul ba lani mgon po mam/ 
122b5(rgyud): chen pa de phyir gnal yas nas// sangs rgyas sems cad pa'angs 'thungs te// rtsi la 'am lus skye bar 'gyur// grwa dang bcas pa'i ngos po med// skong skyes cha ni spangs pa yi// de 'i gzugs nim mthong
122b6(rgyud): med cing sdug bsngal med// gnyis ma med cing dngos po med// brtag pa'i spyod yul rnam par brtag/ chos dang chos las rnam grol zhing // sdig pa nyes pas mi gos so// thams cad gnyis med rnam gro
122b7(rgyud): dang la dang bcas sa//  ba las sa byas pa// tshang babs mas da do// shAs nga so gyu phyis/ ma snyen do dus nas so/ nga skyes rna sa
122b8(rgyud): pa byor ba de zhir // legs skyes lham skye lha'o// mi snang mkha' spyod ma de bzhin// mami'i skye 'amachog nyid de/ ad mo sna chog sadas pa yin// dzum cu pi nim pa spyod// sa'i na spyod pa gan gnas/ 
123a1(rgyud): // sman mo dang ku mo dang // maru kyi ma drin mo// lha mo thams cad sngon grub dang // gzhan yang bdeg shegs bsam pa can// dkon mchog gsum la bdag dga' ba// thams cad phyiyi dkyil la
123a2(rgyud): 'o// tshogs blani cir spyod cing// ga du gA'i drang ba ga// tshogs romamed pa yis// lha mo mkha' 'gro'i gtso po mchod// drung shi dkyil khor la gnas nas// skye 'khor lo rnam par bsgom// mthas pas
123a3(rgyud): las rib gnas nas// gang ga myal la bar rnam par bsgom// me yidakyil 'khor la gnas nas// thugs byed kyil 'khong bdang che// dbang chen kyil 'khor lo gnas napa// dam tshig dkyil lakhor mtsho
123a4(rgyud): dam pa// ye shes dkyil 'khor de nyid ni// de la bsam ning rnam par bsgom// b+ha ga'i dkyil 'dor dbus su ni// sna tshogs pad+ma rnam par bsgom// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// dpa' bo gcig pu rnam pa
123a5(rgyud): bskyor// 'khor lo bad+ma'i rdo rje phreng // 'khor logasum po yongs su bskor// tsa ltar du mtshi mchog 'khor lo// sna tshogs rdo rje phreng gis bsngod/ li dgas rnam pa lnga de bzhin// byi ngos dkyil 'khor yongs
123a6(rgyud): bskor// phyi rol du khrod ma rungs pa'o// sna tshogs mdog can mchog dam pa// sna tshogs shing ni nyams dga' ba// kyi dang lha sdang 'jigs pa dang // bya rog lug ba chu sngur dang / bya rnod dang mi mi mig/ bsreg
123a7(rgyud): sa yang de bzhin te// keng rus gsal shing bskyon pa dang // rag rog bsregs pa rnam par byang / de bzhin phyed tshig phyed mchog/ mag po thod pa rje dar dang // khog pa lag pa mgo bo dang // lce spang d+hani phyogs papa
123a8(rgyud): sal ni sna tshogs dga' bar gnas// seng ge phag dang stag dang ni// rang lug kyang de bzhin 'a// yang po med yo so sogs bde ba'i mchog/ bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang // chang gi btung ba'i
123b1(rgyud): namus dang // dpa' nga 'dus par mchog dag dang // rnal 'byor man mchog sa chags// dag ldan nga ces// gzugs bu chog dmas dang// tshogs ska yang dag dang // domachog pa ba chag / 
123b2(rgyud): tshogs num bya ma le// ku sha ye cho gdam bdag// de la bu mi du thod du// gdod sbyin do sangs sreran pol// gtor me la skyed bya zhing // he rug yi gzugs rnams bsgom// cang te dro dril bu da // sem
123b3(rgyud): bair rnams rab tu bya// phyogs kyi gos ca phyag d+ha stor// hUM btsatsa tse'i na 'byin cing // zhabs g.yas brkyang ba'i sbyor ba yis// 'bar ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas su// Sha ni mchog gis bkang nas// 'dis
123b4(rgyud): sa sa/ []na sa pa pa snang bya// 'di na bdag sum / yang sa dus bya/ lams su byu di gyo pa ga/ da pa na
123b5(rgyud): lalang sbyin// rdo rje phal mo gyon phyengs// 'di la gas sags gdang par bya// oM/ laT khA hi ShA hi/ sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa b+hu ta pre ta pi shA tsa/ ud mAd ma basmA ra Ta ki nI
123b6(rgyud): ma las thas rgyan rgyal l-i la yam ny+dza/ b+hu ShA A/ matitham tha/ mams pa kAr ta la sa dasu 'bi shud pA pa sa hA pa ni bla be su dr-i hU~M sa pAhA/ chog 'dri 'i ma 'i shis// dun mtshams pan
123b7(rgyud): par bya// gcig pu bde bar gnas nas su// ma hA menas don bya bstar// rnal 'byor mnyam par gnag nas ni// 'di la thams cad bza' bar bya// ngas par 'arjod pa'i spyad bla ma'i bla ma las gnyis su med pa
123b8(rgyud): 'khor lo rim par bye ba bstan pa skye du su 'o// dadas 'a nan yang bshad byab// dang ma ga sa kyichog ste// gsang pa'i 'og gapang na// mang chu'i ma byung po tshen// gsang sa gas pa
124a1(rgyud): // / gan sbyor ba// dngos grub thams cad stsal ba na// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dbang gag ca po ro 'khor dang / mngag gzhug dang bcas pa pa' mnamangs
124a2(rgyud): gas rnams dang / gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams rang gi bdag po la phyag byas te gsol pa// e ma'i bde'i'i sems dab 'byor// e ma'o bde'i yis/ 
124a3(rgyud): 'gre ma yi gsang ba mchog/ rang gi dkyil 'khor ba shad du gsol// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor rnal 'byor cha// rdo rje rnal 'byor mchog kyang la// rang gi gsang ba'i dkyil labar gsungs// 'ang ga rte ba
124a4(rgyud): ba 'byung // rdo rje rin chen pad+ma che// sna tshogs sbyor dang sna chags gar// rang gi dkyil 'khor dag pa gsungs// rdo rje rnam snang las 'byung ba// gzhal pas zur bzhi rab tu mdzes// sgo bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ 
124a5(rgyud): na rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// dkyil 'khor bde ba lam byung ba// de yi dbus su 'khor lo gnyis// thugs dang gsung gi 'khor lo mchog/ rtsibs brgyad pa la sngo dang dmar// rdo rje pad+mas rnam par
124a6(rgyud): rol 'khor los bskor bar bri// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog gi ni// phyi rol rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs// glu dang gar gyis rnam par rol// phyi la yi dgas phreng ba yi// sna tshogs mngag ni mchog

124a8(rgyud): /  ngas lda/  ma zug sa thu pa// mas pa sa sa// rna ma gyi 'a / 
124b1(rgyud): dbye' ba'ang bzhin dag par bya// khabs da nga ba ma na rnam me// mugasu rgyags sa rnam par bgyi// lha ma 'bri gzums can// phyag kyi chen po pades ses// sge mags 'o/ 
124b2(rgyud): 'khor dbus dag tu// haM gnyis dang ni bcas pa ru// sngon du dngos grub rje dran nas// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// de ma thag tu su mo le// snying ki ri gsang ba'i pad+ma la// chags par spyod par gyur nas su// mgon po
124b3(rgyud): chen 'o chags pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba ches// de dang lhan cig rol pa ste// dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba kur// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// yid ni dag bar gyur nas su// dga' ba yi ni bsam pa yis
124b4(rgyud): cang te'u'i sgra yis bskul na ni// mnyam nyid dga' las bzhengs par 'gyur// A li kA le mnyam sbyor ba// bde ba chen po dgyes par gyur// de nas nam mkha' dang chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar gtugs pa thams cad
124b5(rgyud): kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gsang ba'i dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas pas khyab pa/ byang chub sems dpa' tshogs chen pos mdun du bad ga ma lus sheng
124b6(rgyud): pa meng 'i mtha' 'gro dang / mtha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dang / phyi'i rig ma'i bdag nyid po nya dang / pho nya mo'i tshogs rgyache ba rnams ngo mtshar du kur nas mig gis thal shing mnyam par 'gyu dang / gar gyi rnam par 'phrul ba yi/ 
124b7(rgyud): da/ ma chen pos langs nas ne// ste bor la mo sbyar byas sa// byin kye sa rlabs kyi me dkyil ba yis// mgon po chen po dgyes pa ye// ka de dag gis bstsal bar bya// mi mtsha mtshan rmad kyi chos/ 
125a1(rgyud): / ngo mtshar rmad kyi lugs// e ma 'ong mchar rmad kyi gsang// ma ma bde pa las byung ba// e ma'o kun tu babang po 'don// e ma'o bde ba yang dag 'dus// a ma'o bde chen dag pa ste// e mdzo
125a2(rgyud): dpa la la thog/ mags sa sto pa/ ma dugs kyi spyos te// memam nyam nyid kya ca dun// emathar ba dag 'byung // sem pa po smin pa yig/  gas
125a3(rgyud): rjerdorje chags pa// e ma sna tshogs las chen po// ye ma kha sbyar gsum dgapa// e mardo rje ma'am la spyor// se ma pad+ma rnam 'byed pa/ e ma dbang po gnyis mnyam ldan// e marma byung mnyam pa ste// em
125a4(rgyud): dag pa'i gar chen te// e madri med glu raM legs// e ma rol mo legs sbyor ba// e ma lar kyis mun sil ba// mes me tog na para' mdzes// e ma bdug pa g+hA ti sdug/ e ma sgron ma gti mug sel// e

125a8(rgyud): dada' chen 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni// skyil krung byed par yang dag gnas// spyan gsum pa la rab tu gzhang // ngag cing 'jigs la ngam pa dang // snying rje gar gyi rnams cacad// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ 
125b1(rgyud): bzugs// yang dug yas brkyang gnas pa yas// rnal 'byer 'byung na bsgral// glam kyil 'khor dbus sun// su chags pad+ma khang zugs// sa ga pa/ 
125b2(rgyud): ngas ni rnam par brgyad// dro zhing ljang la ser ba dang // dmar deng dag pa sanapa ste// thed pa'i phreng yi shu h+yan can// sangs rgyas gzugs kyis rnam par mdzes// dzarje dral bu masham bar drad//  me
125b3(rgyud): tshar ba dang // tshangs pa'i skud pa la na mdzad cing // drug po'i 'jigs byed lags pa ni// rker bar 'ching zhing zhugs pa yin// khong gabaT+wAMg 'dzin cing // ral gyi chu rdul 'dab bsnams shing // rgya ga
125b4(rgyud): pa' bcang ta ru// mgo bo gzhu yang de bzhin no// de yi sku mdog phyag mtshan bzhin// rdo rje phrag mo chen mo ni// chags pa chen po'i ga 'phang gnas// byid pa gnyis kyimi legs par 'khri// dbang ba chen po yi

125b6(rgyud): mkha' 'grod pa'i pas// sdom pa sdom pa'i mchog yin no// sog mthugs kyi 'khor lo ste// shang phyogs kyi rtsibs su bu lI ra ma la yan thod pa'i dum bu dang / rab gtums ste/ dkar ba dang / spob dang ltung
125b7(rgyud): // byang phyogs su dza la dA ra na keng rus chen po dang / gtum mig sha ste/ ser ba dang sngo ba dang ljang bu'o// nub phyogs su e tsA lI Na na keng rwas can dang / 'od ldan ma ste dmar bang sngo ba dang ljang gu'o// lce

130a2(rgyud): dngadangul las byas pa ste// sna tshogs gas kyis mdzes pa dang // me tog phreng bas rnam par brgyad// 'chi med lnga mis yongs su bkad// rnam lnga srin dang yang dag ldan// rin chen lnga dang bcas pa dang //

130a4(rgyud): tshul ba// sna tshogs rol mo'i sgra dag dang // sna tshogs yi dgas phreng ba yis// dkyil 'khor phyir la yongs su bskor// de mi phyi rol mu khyud kyi// dbus su mkha' 'gro ma yin te// phyi ro ba ska rags kyis
130a5(rgyud): sbyor ba// dur khrod rnam par 'jigs pa dag/ sna tshogs du mas rnam par mdzes// mdun du ye shes dam tshig gi// dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong nas kyang // mngon brjod dam chog de bzhin mchod// rim pa
130a6(rgyud): zhin du dbang yang srung// mkhas pas lus la bkod nas ni// gcig tu bsdus te thi ma nas su// dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma// phung po khams dang bye mched gnas// go cha gnyis po bgo bar bya// 'jo
130a7(rgyud): thams cad rnam bsgoms nas// phung po khams dang skye mche dang // lus ngag yo la rnam par dgod// ye shes sems dpa' snying la dgod// sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba yis// dmachog lha'i mchod pas
130a8(rgyud): mdzod// ye shes bzlas pa'i bya ba dag// grangs med pa ni dam par smos// dang chen phreng ba blangs nas su// mnyam par bzhag nas bzlas pa bye// de ni ye shes 'khor lol// mkhas pas mchod pastod
130b1(rgyud): brnam pa bya// mas can dmasal phan pa'i byer// rnal lhor las smon pa ma gdag/ tshigs chen po chos rnams ni// rnal 'byor pa yas rgya bar grug// yo 'dzugan du sh+ya shwa DA ki nA dz+wa las ma
130b2(rgyud): stong po/  rje can me ba spya mo sa zar b+huHkinI m+bu swA/ lham shing po na ci zhing pa la/  t+te/ 'i yin gas/ 
130b3(rgyud): k+Sha hA/ a tham ga/ oM ma d+ha kang kAl kus lu hU~M hUM baT swA hA/ oM sa hU~M d+hA raH A hA/ i dang kA' ban gyi hU~M \u0f7fswA hA/ oM pra brab ts+tshi ma swA hA/ oM bi kaT de N+Di ngas
130b4(rgyud): hUM hU~M phaT A hA/ a ma hA des rba~M hU~M ye swA hA/ a su be Nik+Sha~M T+Ta ya NA~M b+ha ya hU~M hU~M k+ShaT swA hA/ oM hrI ra ma ti huM hUM pha ba T+Ta swA hA/ oMHma tA d+hihU~M dz+dza hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ A 9 hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ A~M dz+raH
130b5(rgyud): rbahu~M hrI~M Ta swA Te/ oM / shwa n+ya t+tA ra AH/ oMbadz+rad ti matsu hU~M paM At+ma oM badz+ri ma nA ma buM hU~M Ta swAhA/ skye med kyi ga pa tu chub swehA/ aM meng ga ba A ng+ge/ oM bad+hi rjel
130b6(rgyud): na te hU~M hA/ oM ma bye ba ra swAhA/ i ma sna rje pa ca ba tu d+ha be swAhA/ oM mub go hU~M A hA/ oM badz+ra thAk+Shad+hab+h+yaN+Da b+h+yak+Shabs kyi man thamA lwa pa ma ni du N+ye m+b+ha/ oM su rgya
130b7(rgyud): tA la? te/ 9 bi pA gr-i p+ta l+yA pA t+pal gu rgyu gams rnamu ba tu smra sa hU~M Ta swA hA/ shrI de hU~M phaT swA hU~M/ oM badz+raHpras+yA kar+b+ha A kar+b+ha hU~M hU~M Ta A hA/ oM su b+ha d+hi hri~M tre+e pra sa
130b8(rgyud): ni rgyu sa nyi sa /  na / mi zhin tu ni mim /  than tu rdzus smra / ma/ 
131a1(rgyud): swA/ skye sa hA/  sas swA/ oM sa shu / sa lta sa
131a2(rgyud): ga gi kail hU~M Ta swA hA/ oM su nI hu~M hU~M la ts+yai swA hA/ e bad+man ti shwed mi mo sil du hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM ma hA pa le hu~M hU~M ba AhA/  Sha can ho ma la d+hi hrI sa AhA oM tsa sa du
131a3(rgyud): / e su lu hU~Mdz+dza satwa~M/  kan gyi shri T+Ta swA hA/ oM mam trA~M Ta swAhA/ oMm hr-I shAg+sa/ yom mi du ra

131b1(rgyud): skyoba'i mchog min no// mngon par 'arjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i blam lang dngos grub kyi gnas kyi ma pa'i ma'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// de nas sbyor bab shud bya'o// 'dod pa'i 'dodan kun su ba byed pa// dram las cang
131b2(rgyud): / 'khya kros 'jom// sa dag ma chen po// dpe byod ma yis legs ba sgrubs pa// 'din ku cinas // na khyo rje 'argyas /  ba brjid mkhrig/ 
131b3(rgyud): tshogs mdog can mchog dam pa// lte ba ge sar bcas pa la// thams cad yongs su dag pa'i gdan// de yi dbus su zla ba'i cha// de bzhin dag cing dri na med// de steng mA li kA li sde// dbus su baM gis rnam par
131b4(rgyud): rgyan// deng sa lha mo bzhengs pa ni// rdo rje 'ag kho rnal 'byor ma// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bcu gnyis// spyan gsum pa la zhal rnam bsgyur// skyil mo krung ni phyed par bzhugs// gar gyis rnam par leg / 
131b5(rgyud): rgyan cing // phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// phyed ni bud med dbang phyug zhal// dkar la dmar ba'i gzugs 'dzin cing // thod pa'i cod pan rnam par brgyan// rdo rje dril bu phyag na 'chang // pad+ma 'khyil bas
131b6(rgyud): bskor cing // dpral ba yi ni phyag rgya'abar// gnyis kyis me yi pags pa mnabs// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'chang // nags pa lcags kyu mchog kyang 'dzin// cang te'u mi gug tshangs pa yi// mgo pa gdong ni bzhi
131b7(rgyud): pas// sngo zhing ser la ldang ba yi// zhal gyis lha po rnam par brgyar// zhal gdong mche ba rnam gtsigs sheng // rla ba phyed pas rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs rdo rje dbu rgyan mtshan// dngos grub thams cad rab tu
131b8(rgyud): s+ho// phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab cing // lha mo du ma bu'i zhe gas da // g.yang dga'i ska rags sgra dang ldan// nang mdu bdag gis legs par brgyan// dpung rgyan dgags rnam par mdzes// dpral ba
132a1(rgyud): // lan da nga phreng // rdo rjes ma chan pa'i phyag rgya drun// spu lus mdzes shing yid 'phrog pa'o/ shwar gyi mda' mar mkha' 'grom// seng ge'i gdong su rnam par 'jigs// g.yon du bag gi ga
132a2(rgyud): te// 'byor lAm rab 'jigs pa// nub tu lha mo glang po'i gding // dum skyes ma ni dbang mo'o// lho ru la mo'i chul can ri// gzugs cad stan yi ga dang // spya dgasam pa la sna tshogs gzugs/ 
132a3(rgyud): zod pa kha rjeg 'dzin ci// mgo dang khre zhug bya ba na bsnabs// gcer bu dbu sgra grol ba la/ grar gyim kyang ni legs pang mangs// yi dag pa rgya ba pa skyel krung byed// bzhin rnams par ning rab tu
132a4(rgyud): 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ lha bang zhabs kyis 'og tu mnan// me chags ma tshams ni bzhi po la// byang chub sems la sogs pa'i snod// bum pa'i stang du rnam par dgod// dung dang kun zla ba'i
132a5(rgyud): mdog/ 'khor lo rtsibs ni drug pa bri// mkhas pas de dbul bre ba me// ma mong regs ni bzhi pa ste// mAm ki dang sman dang ni// bu mo sgrol ma gos dkar mo// sdong du dag dang mar ba sa// 9 rigs dang
132a6(rgyud): phrag/ dkar dang sro ngang dpar ba'i thapa// su mo rtag pa 'i rigs yin no// lnga dang dkar dang dmar ba la// lha mo las kyi rigs yin no// dmar nga ser dang ljang gu yi// nga po ba d+ma'i rigs yin no// !
132a7(rgyud): la lha grol zhing// phyogs kyi go mchog 'dzin pa yin// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan// khod pa dang me na 'dzin// rang gi phyag mtshan bzhi pa ste/ 
132a8(rgyud): tsha lo kur ngo // badrang mar po mchog dpag// khams pa dang bzhin pa la mdzan// yod pa 'khyil bas rnam par bsrod// 'dud bzhinapas kyis rnam mnan cing // gang dang gra yis pa nang pa
132b1(rgyud): das// sna tshogs pad+ma nA dbus bzhugs// rigs kyi dngos grub bster ba'o// rgyan naman cang bru bsnams// rdo rngon gugags rnam brgyan// thong pa'i'aphreng ba'i bcu rgyan can// mdo yi phreng bas rnam par
132b2(rgyud): brgyan// zur gyi tshan thams cad du// gnas la sogs pa'i rnam pa dgod// shar tu rtsibs drug 'khor lo lo// ji lta'i rjes 'brang lha mo dgod// thog mi'i thur la pu l+lIr// mal la na rab gtum ma'o// gnyis
132b3(rgyud): dza lan d+ha ran gtum mag ma'o// gsum pa mo byin na 'od ldan ma'o// ban pa ar bud nas chen ma'o// lnga pago dpang na dpa' ba'i blo gros ma'o// drug par me shwa ri nga mirje thung ma'o// gnyis pa byang gi 'khor lo
132b4(rgyud): khas drug pa dang pod we kon+dan pang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// gnyis pa ma la be na shing grib ma'o// gsum pa snga ma rUb nas srung ma'o// bzhi pa oM drin 'jigs byed chen me'o// lnga kyi shrI ku nen rlung gi shu
132b5(rgyud): drug bgos lan che 'thung ma'o// rab kyi lakhor logs ma pa'i rgyab brdzun ni shang tu g.yedun spobs pa 'o// gnyis pa lam thagan dbab pangs mya'o// gsum bya'i dzin tan ma'o// 
132b6(rgyud): pa nyi ma la la nab gapong ma'o// mA ba be tabu na 'khor lo'i shags can ma'o// drug pa phred deb 'du ba sus ma'o// ma tsha lo bzhi pa'i rtsibs dran 'a ba la sor ldan chang rtso pa'o// gnyis pa ra
132b7(rgyud): sub tu pe na la bar ma'i gon mo// gsum pa na ga dan rab tu ba' ma'o// banims don ma rnam // ljom ma dun 'khor los bsku ma'o// drug babul ta rabartsod 'grus che mo la// nam das
132b8(rgyud): dra ba dang // thod pa dang ni 'a rtag/ 'khor lo cang te'u ge gug go// gnyis pa byang ni sdom pa // rdo rjod pa lazlog/ cang te'u dang na kri mun no// gsum bcu ning mang las pa khrod pa dang ni 'theg/ pad+ma cang te'u'i
133a1(rgyud): // kug go nI ba sgo yi bu mon// ser ngamar sna tshogs rdo rdu ga// ca te'u the gug zang pa dang // T+wA~M ga yang yongs su 'dzin// lha mo dag thams cad kyang // phya bud med dbang phag yi// 
133a2(rgyud): gsung pa la phyag bzhi ga// gcer bu dgus grol ba dang // skyil po krung phyed gar bcas pas// yi dgas rgyab la zhabs kyis bzhul sa// khrod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyar cad// phyag N+Da la yis rnam par brtsa
133a3(rgyud): na dz+nyAn dang ni ska rags dang // nga tan rdo rjes mtshan pa'o// 'khor mo mi rgyam du ni// shar rdo rje phreng bas bstod// byang du 'khor lo phrengs ste/ yu tshogs kyi phreg/  ma phreng ba/ 
133a4(rgyud): phreng bas brgyad// zur kyi chen thams cad du// sna tshogs rdo rje mranyam pa // de rgyal yi dgas sna tshogs kyi// phreng bas mkhas pas bskor bar bya// khyo la dbyal khor cu rnams dang // zur gyi tsan
133a5(rgyud): ni po la// mkha' bgro 'dus pa'i gzugs da ni// mnyam par gzhag nas bri zhing dgod// khwa gdong shar du dgod pa ste// sngol dmar dang yid 'phrog pa// 'ug gdong byang sgor dged pa ste// ldang zhing dmar la le
133a6(rgyud): par mdzes/  nga rlos kyi sgrol re// ser ning dang b.rab tu gdug/ phag gdong slo dag dpa ni// ldeng sa pa'i gzugs can no// kun gsum bzhin bsgyur rab gdug cang // dam pa phyugs kyi gos

133b1(rgyud): gas su rnam par zhugs// gamapa ya gang // gdug pa pa rlung to/ sa rab tu bzhugs// gan rje 'a ngoms mnam gdang //  dag chags pas rab tu skyes/  rab can can// sA
133b2(rgyud): gas gzugs can yid 'phrog pa'o// gcar bus rmel la// sis ku da bang gang dang bcas// mche ba rnam par gzigs pa'i nal// sman gsam pal go yo babasdu// sna cho gang pad+ma'i nyid bus
133b3(rgyud): lcug rjes su chags pas myos// thams cad ye dgas seng na ba zhugs// 'khar lo sogs pa'adakyil 'khor rnams// sred pa la T+wA~M ga jun cing // gra gug dang ni mgo de chang // phyag g.yas dag na

134b6(rgyud): mchog gi bzlas pa bya// bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs nas ni// zhi ba'i 'dung ba mchog kya brgyad // chos rjelas thams cad rings nyim pa'i// mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog yin no// de bas de bsgoms rnam

135b1(rgyud): rgod shu lan zhugs ras kyang//  po ba phrug na // rnal 'byo ma ni 'argya byas// sra skyes mchog na btung bar dbya// bsnun pa de ma tshas nan/ sangs rgyas phru rgya ga nan du min// mngon par 'arjod pa'i gyu/

135b6(rgyud): su dums sa 'a rnam pa lenapa/ zham mngam sa me rnas par bags 'gas byed da ni sul ba 'a nadu thob bsasamamatshan gdas/ 'od pa'i the tsa'i tsa ma
135b7(rgyud): dpa 'dzin pas mdzes// sna tshogs rje rje cod pan can// ral pa'i dbu rgyan dngul 'ched// phyag rgya drag zhes rgyas btab cig/ ga la rdo rje'i tan gyis spang // rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// bde ba chen po'i bde
135b8(rgyud): rtse gsum nga 'bya ma// nga brig ga pa ra te// ngag mtshangs pa'am ga/ dgra sa dang ban pa'o gas pa sa bangan man gyi phyag la na// nAr the pags pa gos rgyam pas// zhabs gnyis
136a1(rgyud): // bar 'bral pan// phags las ma bsur byas// dmadag phyag dang 'dzugs sangs can// dbu sgra gral na gcar rus// sugs lags pa gas su mnapas// dum thu nabyas ska rags can// dra/ 
136a2(rgyud): 'i zod pa'i phreng ba can// thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos// shar gyi 'drab la mkha' 'gro ma// byang du la ma mkha' 'akram// nub tu du ma skyes ma yin no// sme ru gzugs can mkha' 'gro sa// nag
136a3(rgyud): zas ya mar med bya// phyogs kyi gos 'chang galas brgya zhugs// da ci'i phreng ba su rgyan cam// bra gro la gnyis su med pa s+ho// khwa gyitshan 'ams cad du// byang chub sems gyi snod kyang banag/ 
136a4(rgyud): Ang+kA dris rbang// tsi ny+tsa mi zugs go tshogs// zhal gsum spyan gsum bzhin rnam bskrur// drag po chags pa'i chags pas myos/ bcom ldan pade bal gzigs na sem// pa bachel rdeb su chags/ 
136a5(rgyud): 'dri gal 'chang ba yig// te sa nenam par bsrog// 'di ltar rdzu brag dbus dkyilas// mchog dadag kyang bsgo par bya// de la shar kyi mi du migril bu s+thi ma la ya thod pa'i dus bu dang / rag ga tham ma che// 
136a6(rgyud): se po// byang du dub stan ke dus chen po dang / gtum mig sa skye sngon po'o// nub tu N+Di pA Na ke dus can da yod ldan ma ste kur ba'o// grosas rjid na ma che rnam par gcags pa dang / sna chen
136a7(rgyud): k+She lung du'o// me'i phyogs su gong ba dzin lta gra dang dpa' ba'i blo gros ma snyed dmang pag// bden bral dun me shwa ran 'ad pag med dang/ miru krung mas bad+ma'i mngog can no// klu phyogs su de bi ko d+han rdo rje'i 'o
136a8(rgyud): sa rdzu sa ma sa zas te pas sa sa /  rdzo ma lus du lo// de rgya ga nyis yini phyi / 
136b1(rgyud): ran dam nga su mtha / da/ rlu shugs can paste ldan pa'o//  phyog gas
136b2(rgyud): khar dzi mang dang / chang 'thung ba sted dkar po'o// ma phyags du/ yang gan rab bzang dang / snga bsangs lha mos nam mkha' ser skya'o// bden bral du lam bkan rdo rje bzang po dang rab bzang ma steng mar po'o// 
136b3(rgyud): kyig 'asul po can 'jigs byed chen po dang / tarnam su sar po'o// dbang ldan du kyi ma la ya midam bzla dang / bya gdong bste sbyin pa'o// khad+ha dang pral 'dzin pas bsgyung ba'o//  mig gsum pa'i shar
136b4(rgyud): gsu na skabs po che dang 'tshar lo'i shugs can ma sten ma mkha' dang skyer sAl khyang du gri nyid bAH dro rje'i 'od dang / dum skyes ma ste ser bya'o// mul/ ser tha na d+ha mgron dang chang 'tshong ma ste dmang po'o// 
136b5(rgyud): phyogs su partad pa na nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor la 'go cha ma ste sngon po// mi 'phyags sun gyur na dpal khrag 'thung dang rab dpa' mo ste rung ba'i mdog can no// bden bral du si nAn pad+ma gang gyi dab ga
136b6(rgyud): da spobs chen ma ste ljang bu'o// rlung gi phyogs ku ma ru ta na rnam par sdang ma dus 'khor los bstar ma ste sngon po'o// dbang ldan du ku la tA na rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen po snyi dkar po'o// 'khor lo dang
136b7(rgyud): dod pas sug pa'o// gzhan yang song pa dang ng+gA gangs pems kyi 'ug nga man na / byang rdzunag/  la gsapa paste// 'an man garjes 'azung bas bstan/ sman gsum gam
136b8(rgyud): bas gzugs pa/ phyag rgya la yis rnam par bstan// sdug gi lags pags su mnapas// mgo bo 'phreng bas brgyan pa ste// tsad pa'i phang ba'i cod pan can// rdo rje phreng dang pad la bar lo// ji lha'i rim pas
137a1(rgyud): ni rnam par brgyan// dbang byed kyis maN+Da ga/ dang dang phreng bas rnam par brgyam// 'kho lo'i gzugs cad la bkod nas// ci ltar mdzes par ra tu brtag/ 'di ltar phyi la 'khor lo yi// de la zhe sangs
137a2(rgyud): rnams kyi rjod/ mtshams dang kru ma mornam pa// mkham sa ma bri bar bya ba ste// chog tho ma min 'bad pas gcig tu bsdus pa yin// shar kyi sgong de la gdong po// zhal gsum pal drug drug gi/ 
137a3(rgyud): galas dang g.yon gyim la gdong ni// b+harag tu sbya ma payin//  'asrung la mi sdug nas/ khyang ga khro na nga// lag pa du la ma mangs nagayas dang ga yin can ma gdo na/ lte ba spyod 'dzin
137a4(rgyud): pa'i gzugs can ga// mung tu b+hal gnas pa/ kye dang se gos gdong pan// g.yon pa dang na g.yas pal// su bskyod shin tu mtsham pa'o// lho phyogs su 'dzin lha mon// phag gdong mata'i gzugs can
137a5(rgyud): / zhalas dang ga son kyi gdo mi/  ga jigasu po/ sa ka gang shes byag// gnyis pa jus bya ba de/ dag su gyi mi mdzod can pa// pan pa dag n-i dad // sod du da/ 
137a6(rgyud): ga dong // ldang zhu seng po dmar pa ste// ser ning dmangal sngo ba'i nam// dkang nga srod po bu'i mdog/ dang po min sa dbang ldan par// gshin rje phrag mthon mo// ne shin mches
137a7(rgyud): sa/ nga sa//  su / sa sa ste// de napa ga a// / da// rgyam gams pa rgyang 'jugs
137b1(rgyud): gyogos 'chang gsum pa 'byangs/ dbu sma dag ni grol ba ste// phyag rgya lnga yis rgyas brgyab cing // 'khor lo dag ni thams cad kyang // yi dgas steng du rnam par bzhugs// sna tshogs brgyanyi ma dang // zla ba'i dkyil la/ 
137b2(rgyud): dgal bzhugs// thod pa dang ni ba T+Teg/ zhags pa lcags kyu ba te'u dang // mgo ba kyi mug phyagan 'chang // thod pa'i phred pa pa rnam par brgyad// dka' zhid dgyes pami rnam par myos// rjes chags par/ 
137b3(rgyud): ri// 'jigs pa'i sngang mig 'gyur ba'o// de nas gshin rje sregs sogs sgo// khra gdong la sogs mtshams su ste// rang gi thabs dang mnyam par bzhag/ sbyor ba'i rim pa bsgoms nas ni// 'jor
137b4(rgyud): lo dpa' bo thams cad kyang // ji bzhin rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste// snga mra'i rjes su thams cad kyang // mkha' 'gro ma sogs kun de bzhin// ji bzhin bla ma 'a bka' bzhin du// ji ltar 'dod pa gnas de bzhin// ji ltar sems kyi/ 
137b5(rgyud): khyad par gyis// rnal 'byor ma yi dkyil 'khor bsgom// bum pa sna tshogs sbyor ba yis// thod pa yis ni yongs su brgyan// ngoms bkang ba'i thod pa ni// bum pa'i steng du bzhag par bya// phyi rol yongs su bskor ba/ 
137b6(rgyud): // sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma gnas pa// glu dang gad ni nyer ldan pa so// sna tshogs rol mo rnam par sprul// me tog bdug spos mar me dang // dri dang gos mchog dam pa ste// sna tshogs dam tshig ro y-igs// 
137b7(rgyud): tshogs bza' ba chang gis mchod// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mchog dam pa// phyi rol yi dwags kyis yongs bsko// dngos dang dngos med rnam par bsgom// bla ma'i man ngag bka' bzhin du// rdo rje bang skor 'khor lo
137b8(rgyud): re// zung bzhi bar ni rab tu gnas// mtshams su rdo byed pas mtshan// rdo rjeg pa'i mdun dbus su// re 'u mig rdo rje ldan par bya// sna tshogs pa yi cho ga mchog/ gnas sogs rim pa dgod bar bya// khams
138a1(rgyud): / phung po pazhin te// ched ga kyang rnam par dgod// ye shes do rnam par bsgom// sku gsung thun pa su stong ba yis// ye gas 'byor mo ma mang ma man zhabs tshas la dganas mchod// dmatshan/ 
138a2(rgyud): tshogs mchog dam pa// tshogs pa 'i khyad bar gyis// mangs gta gag sa mchod// gcaganyis po skyong ba yis// byag rgya ye shes mchog dam pa// rogacig sa lus bsgoms sa ts+tsha// ye shes 'khor/ 
138a3(rgyud): rnam par bsgom// reg pa yi ni khyad par gyis// mkhas pas sbyor ba gsum du sbyar// bsgoms pas rnam par dag pa'i don// mkhas pas sum cu rtsa bdun te// ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// dam
138a4(rgyud): chog gsum gyi mchog gis bza'// spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// bzlas pa'i bsgom pa rnam par bsgom// dus bzhi dag tu dmo chag can// gnas sbyar mkhas pas bsrung bar bya// sa steng du ni mthong ba kun/

138b6(rgyud): dugaphung/ oM yam mthar cu hUM le/ rnam byo chog dra tsam kyis// dorje sa sug cang gnas nas su// 'ikug cing rab du g.yebs// lus las 'od 'bar dged pa dang // de yi me gan 'ab ba dang // tshig
139a1(rgyud): // btam bad 'ab ba dang // rnal 'byed pa san bzlas tsam gyis/ ngordul gru bamazang ba dang // sngags pa mnyam pazhag basmras nas na// dmatshig spyod pa ldan byas nas// srog da rtsol ba bsdus byas / 
139a2(rgyud): gsal byed du nas kyang // chos kyang dbyings susmra par bya// sems cad kun la phan pa dang // gdul dga' ba dag gdul ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas chos rnams mdun du sro// khra bo'i ge 'phang de mthong nas/ 
139a3(rgyud): 'as gsum dgang bsdu bar ba// lus ga yid pa 'dug nga kyang // sa ste du ni srid pa drang / mnyam padag min pa'i rnal 'bar bas// snying rjes brla pa nyid shes ni/ sems can thams cad mthong ba/

140a1(rgyud): 6// po'i pags pa'i gos mna'as shing // rbag rnon 'dzan parab gsol te// thod pa dang ni/  'dzin// mdung dang sra lug lugs kya nga // nags pa na m-i ga yong ru// gdug pa gtum nong ca te du
140a2(rgyud): mdung ni 'bar ba'i phyag rgya can// dpral bdag tu nye bar mdzes// de lta'i phyag dang spu mdog bzhugs// dbuskra grol cing gcer bu ste// 'di lta'i phyag rgya rnam par bsgom// dum bu'i ska rags kyis brgyan cing / 
140a3(rgyud): phag mo yang ni 'di 'drang ba sgom// rnal 'byor som nyi srungs nas ni// thabs dang shes rab mnyam ldan pas// thugs rje chags pa'i bde ba yis// sems can dron gyi phyir byung ste// snying rje chen pos brlan pa yi//

140b5(rgyud): 'jigs byed chen mo ste nam mkha' ser skya// tri sha kun na 'jigs byed chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma ste mdog ser/ ko sa lan rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang 'azung ma ste 'dog ldang ru/

141a2(rgyud): baji lta bar// sgornams dag ni brabaste// sher du la gdong ma/ byang du drug gdong ma/ nub tu gyi gdang ma/ lho ru bag gdeng mnas dang ljang gu dang / dmar pa dang ser po'i mdog can no// me phyogs sugashin
141a3(rgyud): grags mdog dmar po// bden bral gyi phyogs su gshin rje pe nyam mdog sngon po// rlung gi phyogs su gshin rnga mche ba mdung khang mchar sprin la mdog lta bu/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su gshin rje 'joms ma

141b1(rgyud): nga bti nang lag pa byang// smrams la gas shing gdang yang bsgrub/ gas nas bcwag// sang du bsgrub par ma nas nas// gang nang sa 'ad pa don// ngas su rgyags pas nas nyid ma/ 
141b2(rgyud): rdo lta bu 'i gsam pa yis// rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom par bya// bong ga rtag 'dzin cing // tsa ti'u gi gug ma go ba 'chang // dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kun// yi dwags la ni bzhugs par bsgom/ 
141b3(rgyud): mkhar 'gro'i tshogs kyid kyi la 'khor la// ke bzhinings su rnal 'byor te// dpa' bo'i yan lag sbyor ba yis// bsgrub pa lhag pa'i snyoms par 'jug// sen me dang so dag ni thod pa'angam pa'o// sra dang spu
141b4(rgyud): da ni nga rdus cher pong // pags pa dang drim dag ni keng rus can no// shan mche rnam par gtsigs pa'o// rtsa r+d+ha sa ni snyad pa'o// rus pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o// mngal ma gun rdo rje thod // swai ru
141b5(rgyud): // ma gdod gan no// mthus pa ni rjengal pa can no// zlo ba ni dpa' gro chen po'o// d+ha ma ni dzi hUMmadza ngo // gnyes na rab tubapa ba'o// skye ba na rdo rjebazang po'o// gang ni rigs kya chen

163a6(rgyud): rdo rjes mtshan pa ste// sngags pa'i gtso bos gsang sngags ni// 'di ltar cho ga'i snying po shes// phag mo bde bar gnas pa ni// rgyal ba'i pags pa rnam par spangs// phag mo rgyal ba'i mtshan sogs las/ 
163a7(rgyud): ca te'u gri gug rnams kyis brgyan// bcom ldan 'das ni lte ba'i dbus// pad ma 'dab brgyad yid 'ong ba// sna tshogs pad ma mdog mdzes la// thams cad rnam dag mchog dam pa// shar gyi 'dab sogs
163a8(rgyud): ga la// mkha' 'grol sogs pa ni pa dag // gang du ba sakra ma dag ci/ byang ma de bzhin te/  btu dum smras ma yord no// sgo drug zugs cad ma yin te/  dang ser dang de bzhin dam pa/ 
163b1(rgyud): bud ni ban pa'o// nam ni pa la phyag brgyad ga/ snyan gsum drag po gzi brjed can// skyil mo krung ni byed par bzhugs// sgra grol ba de yi 'ong la// phyogs kyi gosas nam go yi phreg/ phyag tu lnga yis rnam par brgyad// 
163b2(rgyud): zodapa/ kha dz+ra ga 'dzin cing // dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang / de bzhin gzhu dang mda' 'dzin cing // rdo dza mdung mchog phyag na 'di de// sngams pa'i phyag gis gar bdad cing // thugs rje chags pas rnam par byos// sde ba dang / 
163b3(rgyud): dpe ba de// lung su myong shin pa dag ro//  ldang ba dang / phreng gag pa gdang drug la dpa ma/ dam nga sdo dang ldang bdang / skyed zhen pa de dgapal //  dang dmar dang tho ba dang / sreng gin la ni se
163b4(rgyud): tshag/ bdud pazhi po de zhabs kyis gdon// bcom ldan 'das la gdong gis lha// bur gyi char ni bum ba dag/ ye shes pa rtsi mtshangs gang ba// de 'i steng du zad pa ni// byang chub 'oms rang bkang ga phyi rol
163b5(rgyud): tshag gsul 'khor lo//  ba brtsegs pa leg pa par mdzes// shar phyogs su no / ri ste// byang du de bzhin rtse reg/ su tu rab rmongs ma yin no// lha ru yang ni raM langs ma// me la spos byed ma yin/ 
163b6(rgyud): na a ne ma//  byugs ses nyid men/ da sa// de bzhin napa // dag ma // rnam byed dam sa so ldang / 
163b7(rgyud): tshangs pa ni snga sar ltung // re langs pani dkar sngo langs// sros byed pani sna tshogs mdog/ dmar dang sngo dang ljang gu'o// gtum mo yang ni ljang sngo ser// swa pa yang ni dung sngo lang // he
163b8(rgyud): nga dbar// 'di ltar de dag thams cad kyang // sman gsum pa las grol ba// phyogs kyi gos 'chang gar dang bcas// ye dgas gangan la legs par bzhugs// phyag rgya lnga las rnam par
164a1(rgyud): brgyar// khar+d+ha mod pa dril bu dang // nga te'u 'gas pa sngags bya thogs// thams cad thod pa'i phreng bal brgyan// mi bskyod pa yi cod paran byas// 'di ltar gnas dang nye gnas kyi// das
164a2(rgyud): grub thams cad rab tu stsol// 'di ltar thugs kyi 'khor lor ni// lA me dkar ma la sogs pa// rnal 'byor ma ni rab tu bshad// bsnyen pas bka' dren stsol mdzad de// thogs pa med pa'i 'bras bya jug
164a3(rgyud): lA lo ba las spyod grub nas ni// mkha' la spyod pa'i go 'phang rnyed// de'i phyi ros gsung 'khor lo// shar du pi wang stangs stabs pa// byang du gling bu'i sngangs stabs ma// nub tu rdza che stangs stabs// nyos nga/ 
164a4(rgyud): stangs stabs te// sngo dang ser dang dmar ljang gu// me sogs rdo rje band ma ste// rdo rje sgeg ma rdo rje klu// rdo rje gar te dmar ba dang // sngo dang ser dang ljang gu'o// de nas zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// gcer bu dbu skra dro
164a5(rgyud): ba dang // thod pa yi ni phreng ba can// spyan gsum pa la yid ngong ga// med pa dang ni kha n+da 'dzin// tsham ngar lag pa'i stangs stabs kyis// rdo rje dril bu stengs stabs can// ma grig sa mnyam par byas nas ni// pad pa
164a6(rgyud): bskor ba'i glengs sngabs can// nong nga nye ba'i ded dang ni// tshan do dang ni chen doto// de dag 'ad pag med dbubargyan// sru le 'khor mamig ni// me tog ma byang 'dug pa ma// rub tu mar me lho che/ ser
164a7(rgyud): dang dud 'dam dkar po// me long ngo dang reg bya cos// me phyogs la sogs mtshams su ste// zla ba'i mdog can dmar ljang dkar// de dag spyan ni gsum pa ste// gcer bu dbum grol ba dang // zhabs
164a8(rgyud): / phyag ma sa no// da ga tsug da cing/  napa cwam // med pa yin tha da// yod da 'dus dag 'i ma du rjod da/ 
164b1(rgyud): so ga per te/ rab par snang ba da ba rgyar byas// smo pas da lugs kya dang// rdo zhugs pa rdo zlog do// dril bud bzhin te//  dang ljang dang dmar dang ser// shar dang byang dang de// sgra la phyogs kyang
164b2(rgyud): mel sogs pa'i mtshams su ne// gshin rje sreg la sogs pa dag // dmar dang sde dang dung kha ser// thod pa dang ni laT+wAMg/ rang gi mtshan pa cang te'u dang // gri kug dang ni mag pa 'am stan gsum dbu lnga grol ba
164b3(rgyud): / gcer ca kar kyis gnas pas bzhugs// thams cad daphyag rgya lnga pas brtan// thod pa yini phreng ba can// rang gi rigs kyi cod pan car// ji lta'i rim pas rjes su gnas// de la snying kAr ye shes sem
