164b7(rgyud): sa/  cing sa tha sa no// sa sa kru smra hA/  hA la tu mas pa ma
165a1(rgyud): / dzag tsa la migs ma dz+wa la gas gan gas na ne sa hu~M hU~M phaT/ o ba zhin ba / ma bad pa she rna pa srid ge na mi 'dza ladas kyi rdza
165a2(rgyud): hu~M hUM phaT/ aM badz+ra pre te Te p+da phaT oM badz+ran t+ye hri h+ne phaT/ aM badz+ra ba sleT hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra d+ha pe hu~M hUM phaT/ oM dz+ra dA pa hU~M b+he phaT/ oM badz+ra gan d+ha r+tha hU~M phaT/ e rU pa badz+ra tsi d+ha phaT/ oM ras rje
165a3(rgyud): na dz+ra dz+ra d+de paka narma hA cu brjoT dz+wa phaT/ ma~M badz+ra la dku shAdzaHhratrA~M phaT/ oM badz+ra pA shaM thuphaT/ oM badz+ra d+pa tsa nu pa/ oM badra a be sha~M \u0f7fhi hu~MhU~M phaT/ oM la ma N+Di rdza ba
165a4(rgyud): dut+ya huM hUM phaT/ a~M la mdza ts+tsha huM hUM phaT/ oM la ma ma tha ni huM hUM phaT// da mchog can gyis tshig dag pas// mos pa'i yid kyis rtag tu bzlad+ma// nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas// shes rab thabs kyi bdag
165a5(rgyud): // rang gi thabs dang rigs pa'i lus// gnyis su med par mnyam pa'i bdag/ khro bo sprul pa'i tshogs spros pas// 'gro ba gsum po bcas par ne// he ru kar ni byas nas kyang // sa rnams gas
165a6(rgyud): ma gus par// thams cad der ni bsdus nas kyang // sku gsung thugs la rnam par gnas// 'di ni rnal 'byor cho ga ste// 'khor lo bsgom pa'i bzlas pa'o// rang gi lha yi sbyong ba yis// rgyu dang mi

165a8(rgyud): yid kyis pa ya// langs spyod las ni blang ba // rang rmongs ma yis bsnyen byas nas// bde ba'i sbyor ba la bzhugs te// ra mnyenang Tan su ra A ma phA lung bar dza i ni ka ya la su hra/ a la la su
165b1(rgyud): u t+ya madz+dza/  sa ma rdza mad dal la to/ A m+b+ha/ a Ar to// a ru ha~M b+ha ru phub pan+da ta/ su mas su byed ta bar in/ dra la su drabs pan ta re ka pa de ta ma hAs tra ma/ mu mo k+Sha ba lak+Sha su/ dA d+ha sarba/ 
165b2(rgyud): i su tA/ badz+re u mu ru su hA/ i na a dra/ khe la Tha i ma khu su hU/ bas a pa ka u madz+dza ta ru na ba rAba.a pad traM/ b+hU dza ta ru muny+tsa ma hA suhA/ a la da ra ba la/ A ma hA/ a ri bI a ga a po u ra su/ 'di las pa

165b4(rgyud): pad ma yid 'ong ba/ sbyor bas dngos grub thams cad 'grub// dgyes pa 'di yis bskul nan// bdang chen po stsol ba yin// sbyor ba yo na dus dag na// rdo rje can las rab tu sbyar// thag pa dbus dang mthar

165b7(rgyud): ga.a nur kro me b+ha ga/ su pe Sh+yo le b+ha ga sa rba sed dA me pra lar+tha/ sarba karma sats+tsha be/ tsid+hashr-i yaM kur h+ye/ tahaho/ b+ha ga bAn badz+ra he ru ka/ mA ye luny+tsa he ru ka badz+re b+ha ga/ la hA sa ma ya ba k+Sha aH// 'dis ni bcom ldan kur

166b1(rgyud): rab long ba gzugs bzhin 'bras bu mad// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud thar 'abla ma las sku gsung thugs kyi gnas kyi rim pa'i leru ste te shul pa 'o// de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba// thod pa sangs rgyas mchags

168b5(rgyud): mnyam stong// sdugasung thugs ni bri ma/ raM ba brag rgya shes // lce ba'i dbras su rnam par bsam// si las blag ste/ byang chung thub dri ma med// suni snying gar bsam pa ste// e ni mgol
168b6(rgyud): mam par nagan// en skye gtsug dag tu dkod// oM ni mig tu dgod pa ste// oMn go char byas nas su// a ni mdun gyi mtshan cha'o// laM las lam sbyin yin te// raM las dam tshig sgrol ma yin/ lI las lha mon
168b7(rgyud): dgapa po// dra las rin chen yang dga'abyung // rin chen sman dang ye shes sran// dkar zhing gaku na yi mdog/ dmar ning 'dzam bu chu bo'i mdog/ nal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsum dgyes pas nga// 
168b8(rgyud): myos// thams cad phyogs kyi gos can te// rang gi thabs dang mnyam par ldan// 'khor los tshogs rdo rje dang // pad ma dmar po rin chen dang // rdo rje dril bu klan cig sar// 'dod pa thams cad rab tu so/ 
169a1(rgyud): pra mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin// gtsun 'gugs pa 'dzin pa ste// mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// thod pa yi ni cod par can// sna tshogs pad ma'i dbus su ni// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung
169a2(rgyud): du 'jugs// de dag sgo ru dgod pa ste// dbus sug che ba'i zla ba'i gdam/ zungs mchod la dam pa ba ni// phyogs kyigs can sa bral ba// nas gsum pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsumathong pa'i phreng ba can// me lo
169a3(rgyud): dang ni pi wang dang // dril dang dung dang bcud kyis len// chang gi btung ba lag pas mchod// gnan du de ltar bdag po bzhin// dran rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// sprul krung phyed par legs par bzhugs/ 
169a4(rgyud): lag bstim pa'aphal mo yis// mchod pa lag tu thags nas ni// 'di lta'i tshogs thams cad mkhyen// A li de nyid dri ma med// gsang ba mchog ni rnyed dka' ba// rdo rje sems dpa' bshad pa yin// sngags kyi
169a5(rgyud): nyid dog dag/ su gsung thugs su yang dag sbyar// mai shA ba thA sa la gangs Amra/ a trU~M kan+na dA las ma badzis tu/ oM sid d+ha mo can lasaT hU~M swAt+ma/ i sa ma ya tA re tad+ha re be na hU~M swA hA/ oM pad ma
169a6(rgyud): be pa tA ra bA sa ni lA AHhrI sA dA/ oM dat+na dz+wa le ni dI aHhA~M swA hA/ oM dA pa badz+ra D+haM// oM sha t+ta ma dz+r-i dz+raM oM gan d+ha badz+ri la~M/ oM ras dz+ri hrIH/ thams cad mkhyen pa dbang sdug mchog/ lha ga'i dbus su gnas par/ 
169a7(rgyud): so/ a mdo rjegs bas/ sems chen kun gyi snyings pa nas/ gang gis dngas pa kun gsang ba// de migs bya shad pasten/ na kAr byor ba yis ngas pa'i dra/ bzlas dang bsgom par ldan par bya/ 
169a8(rgyud): ma nye thams cad spangs nas ni// sems dpa' chen pa brtson 'grul ba na// ye shes 'khor lo mthong nas ni// dam chog can gyis mchod dbang bskur// de dag gcig tu bsdams nas su// sgra dang bsdul
169b1(rgyud): sno tha mas// khams gsum dgan ma lus pa/ thams cad rdo rje 'dzin ldam// 'das pa dang na da ltar dang // pa 'ongs pa yi dus gsul po// da ltar sems can gsum po la// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang karal// lhan
169b2(rgyud): dga' dag pa'i 'ang/ son ma med pa'i mchog yin no// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa'i le'u sa nyi shu rtsa bdud pa'o// de nas mchog gi mo ga bshad// langam pa'i 'a
169b3(rgyud): sgrub pa ni// maM gi ye shes las byung ba'i// 'jam pa'i rdo rje bde ba che// zhal drug phyag drug zhi ba ste// sku mdog dkar po dri ma med// snyan gsum rdo rje skyil krung can// phyag rgya drug ni 'bar bas brgyan// mi bgrod
169b4(rgyud): btsid pan can// yod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// zla ba rnyed pani pa 'dzin// ral pa'i grong tshugs bcings pa ste// dkar dang snga dang du smrig nyid// ser dang lnga bzu bzhin te// steng gnas ni na ba ste// lha ma
169b5(rgyud): 'bras 'a grol// rdo rje dril ba mnyam par ldan// ral kri ba te 'dzin pa ste// ut+pa la dang lcanas gnyid// ye shes lus can rnam par bsgom// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po ni// 'khor mo'i dbus su rnam par
169b6(rgyud): sgom// sngar bshad gnas kyi sbyor ba yis// de ltar rdo rje sems dpa' ltar// gsang sngags 'ang ni rjes sa dran// 'jam pa'i rdo rje gsang ba ni// gsang gsum ye shes dam tshig can// dpa' bornal 'byor
169b7(rgyud): sbyong ba'o// a shrI ma rdza sa la man+ta badz+ra a rma dz+nyA nA ken+da dz+wa la sam par yad+ma/ rang gis dbang bskur byas na pa ni// brtul zhugs chen po gsang sngags pas// gsang gsum 'khong la spros nas ni// khams gsum
169b8(rgyud): dag ni bsdu bar bye// 'di mi mchog tu gsang ba ste// gang gis su la'ang bstan meH// mngon par brjod pa'i chud bla ma 'dra ma las 'jam pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa'i le'u skye nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// 
170a1(rgyud): / pa shad kyag// leg dgu ba bsgrub paste// kA la la shas las byung ba// gdug pa thams padan byed pa// byed papa'a'agro babya ci // ma rtog zas cang bdabang byed// mkha' mnyam snang ba las

170a4(rgyud): ral ba lanan// phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyad// das kyams pa rnam par gtsigs// 'jigs byed par cher 'jigs shing // sA dang du la ldang su dang // dmar dang lta ba ser pa'o// drug pa dag ni bong bu

170b3(rgyud): g.yas ca zhal// 'ug gdong na la ya nga de bzhin te// gsum la khyi yin pa gdong yin// khan pa phag gnal gdong ste// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i nal gdang de// drag par gzugs can chag bzhin/

171a1(rgyud): srog dang rtsal bas gas sngags pas// ra dgas 'bapar zung byas nas su// gsang ba gsum gyi ye shes s+ho// yi rbA k+Sha Na ki na na las mabar na pa swA / lag mang gsal byed ming dang smram //

171b4(rgyud): gu de bzhin te// nags pa 'angs pal mgo ba dang // gra gug dang na 'khor lo nyid// snying gar rtsi bas ni bcu gnyis pa'i// 'khor lo'i rgyal po legs par mdzes// de la lte ba'i dbus su ni// ya shas mkha 'gro

171b6(rgyud): mchog ces bya ba la mkha' 'gro ma yi ge AM las byung ste bzhugs pa'o// nub phyogs surnam ma kha'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge e dang sbyar bar bya'o// lo phyogs su gnas kyi mchog ces bya ba'i

172a2(rgyud): mchog ces bya ba 'i mkha' 'gram dang // yi ge ri las dung khrod kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'grem dang / yi ge rI las rnal 'byer rgya mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / yi ge l-I las gtum po ma

174a1(rgyud): kho mkha' 'gro ma bzlas bya// gsal byed rang ming gnyis dang / mthar ni phaT dang sbyar bar bya// gsang gsum labor lo bsgoms na bzhi// gsum po bsdu zhing bskams nas su/

174a7(rgyud): ldan mtsha' 'gro bil pa// rnal 'byor man te pi la// thabs ni bi la bar shes bya// shes rab nye ba'i phel ba// grong khyer mthar ni pa la nyid// grong gi mtha' ni nye pa la// rwa ba nyi ma mnyam skyong ba// pil
174a8(rgyud): dnga'i nye pe med// sad cig sang po phel la// dga' ba nye ba'i pil ste// mthu spobs du ldan par ni// sre ba 'dil 'grub pa yi// pa shuthams cad bapa' bya yin// sna ba shos dag kyang de ba'i
174b1(rgyud): bsgrub// dpa' bo mtha' 'grem 'dus nas// dus la 'thun pa 'dus byas nas// glu dang gar dang bza' ba dang // 'dus pa mchog gis mchod par bya// rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs nas// dam chag ga ni spyad
174b2(rgyud): // mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsal byed mkha' 'gro'i bsgrub pa'i mtshan ma bstan pa ste le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// de nam gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dngos grub sbyor ba'i
174b3(rgyud): // mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro sbyor// dam tshig mchog gi sdom pa yin// chos rnams kun gyi sdom pa ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi bde ba che// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa// dkyil 'khor dam
174b4(rgyud): chog dam pa// de yi dbus su 'khor lo che// dkyil 'khor lnga lis rnam par brgyan// dbus su nyi ma'i gdan yang mdzes// A li kA li mnyam par ldan// sul cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan// dpe byad
174b5(rgyud): brgyad cus brtan// byin gyis brlab pa byas nas ni// rang gis bon las bskyed de// yi ga ti las yang dag 'byung // dus mtha' me ltar rab tu 'dzegs// zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// spyan gsum
174b6(rgyud): sngags ni bskyod pa'i nal// gdug pa thams cad zhabs 'og gnon// glo ba dang ni bzhad pa'i zhal// bskal pa'i mthar yang 'khrug pa ste/ ral pa yin dbu rgyan can// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhu
174b7(rgyud): meg pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// 'jigs byed chen po'i pags pa yis// rked par sku dgas bcings pa yin no/ rje grong ba'i bu rgan can// sna tshogs rdo rje bu byed 'chang // dpral ba la ni rdo rje
174b8(rgyud): lo mthong nas rnam par brtag/ lha rnams thams cad tshar yang gcod// keng rus can gyi 'artul zhugs 'dzin// 'chi ba 'tshe bar byed pa'i mchog/ gdug pa thams cad bes thar gnor// phyag rgya dreg
175a1(rgyud): // sku lus brgyan// sna tshogs brgyan gyis spud pa ste// phyag drug pa la nal lnga pa// sna tshogs ro yi bcud mchog can// sngo dang mer dang de bden dmar// ljang bu dkar po na pa ste// rdo dral bu mnyam ldan par// 
175a2(rgyud): pag ma yin spu lus byab// lha chen lpags pa 'dzin mjed cing // bla tshul du brkyang bar mdzad// thod pa dang ni kha nAM 'dzin// dug pa na ni cang te'u dang // nabs g.yon du ni dus mtshan mnan// g.yas pa ma
175a3(rgyud): 'jigs byed de// nabs kyis 'og tu mnan mdzad cing // rmongs shing ra du mos par mdzad// rdo rje phag mod mdog can// sA grol ba dang gcer bu ste/ thong pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ dum bu'i rgyan
175a4(rgyud): rags can// byin pa gnyis kyis lags par 'bri la// mgul bas 'khyud cing myos pa ste// de la phyag mtshan phyag rgya bsnams// gri gug cang te'u mchog kyang 'dzin// dug pa la ni tshangs pa'i mgo/ 'di
175a5(rgyud): rdza mkha' 'gron// mkhas papa'i tshu ga dbus su dgad// gar du sangs rgyas ma' 'gro ste// brang du las kyi mkha' 'gro yin// nub tu bad ma la mkha' 'gro ste// lho dro na chen mkha' 'gro yin// dkar dang
175a6(rgyud): dang dmar ba dang // ljang khu dang ni ser po'o// 'khor lo dral bu mnyam par ldan// g.yas brkyang ba yi nabs kyis bzhugs// k+Sha bu ser po dmar po sngo// dkar po steng lus dril bu dang // sna tshogs rdo rje
175a7(rgyud): 'gyur// g.yas brkyang pa yi tshul gyis bzhugs// dmar sngo ser dang ljang gu dang // dkar po yang ni de bzhin no// pad+ma dri la bus snyoms 'jug cing // lha ma'i num 'tshar ba'o// ser po sngon po de bzhin dmar/ 
175a8(rgyud): lAs dkar pal ma dog so// ran te 'dril zas sas ka las padang ba le thabs kyis b.lags// de dag ma'a' 'grol yin te/ sdol balnga yang demed de// me dang bdan bral chu
175b1(rgyud): deg dbang ldan den la ne be ra// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro las mkha' 'gro// pad ma'i mkha' 'gro na chen mkha'// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// sman gsum pa la snga grol ba// zod pa'i phreng bas rnam
175b2(rgyud): brgyad// rgyan rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs// phrag rtsa la yes rnam par brgyan// phyogs kyi gas can gar mchog can// mgo ri brang bas rnam par brgyan// zod pa dang ni khan 'dzin// de rje mdal
175b3(rgyud): segs pas brgyan// nags pa lcags kyu phyag da mdzes// 'dod pa thams cad stsol mdzod cing // thugs rje'i ren yang dag rdzogs// thugs rje'i 'dod pas rnam par myos// cung zad do
175b4(rgyud): can// dgyes pa stsal pas bde bste// de ltar sna chags du ma yim/ dkyil 'khor rnams ni yongs su kyag// da ma gzugs dang gzugs sdug pa// rdo rje mchu dang 'od byed pa// rtagador dang ni drag po'i
175b5(rgyud): rdorje rdzog mo stan grags ma// rdo rje po nying rjes na// rdo rjeg non grus de bzhin// kam po ci yang de bzhin te// rdo rje ro langs ma dang ni// rdo rje ma mo di de bzhin te// dr-i can ma dang 'jigs byed na la// zla ba'i
175b6(rgyud): debazhin te// srog nye can dang sna chags gzugs// rdo rje kr-i gug de ba' te// rdo rjel su rgyad dang ni// sku 'chub lha mo grags byed ma// na lar gi dang ser skum// rdo rje 'bar ma thal sbyar ma// rdo rje 'jigs byed ma
175b7(rgyud): dekyi 'tshar 'grub pa'i mjal gram// ma' 'graman de dgas na// spyan gsul pa lan la nam sbyar// gsus pa 'phyang la sgra grol la// me pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// can rnams thams cad yang
175b8(rgyud): rdzogs// phyag tu la yis rnam par btun// phyogs kyi gos can ga mchog ste// mag tha'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// khams cad ngo la gdan la bzhugs// sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'phrog pa// 
176a1(rgyud): / lAShA n+d+ha ga 'dzin cing // zhags pa ljags su phyag na bsnams// rdo mchog na gsor mad cing // dril bu dang na ma tsha' mchog// zhal gsum dpa' zhing sreg pa ste// 'gas rje nyams ni yongs su
176a2(rgyud): rdzogs// sman ni byid kyis gzigs mdzad cing // dgyes pa'i phyo pas g.yo ba ste// dngos gru' thams cad stsol mdzad cing // sprul pa po kun rjes su chags// rlub drug gis srub pa po// mkha' 'gro ma 'i
176a3(rgyud): lo 'grub// yid gnyis med par dngos grub mchog/ mkha' 'gro thod par byed pa yin// dus 'dir de ma thag tu la // mkha' bstod par the tshom med// nang gi pho brang de nyid ni// re'u mig dgra sogs sgo dang
176a4(rgyud): cas// s+pho ru l+h+wa ma bani bkod la// mkhang 'gram ni dngos grub sted// phyi rol dkyil 'khor lha mo bri/ snam bu'i mtshams pa nad du ni// ma te gu god kyizhing /  kha' 'gro ma sogs phyogs mtshams
176a5(rgyud): // lung bzhi pa la sgo zhi pa// phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag tu brtag/ sgonams su ni lha mo la ni// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster// rtababs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// bur gyi cha ni thams cad dang / 
176a6(rgyud): dang sgo/ yud mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan cing // phyi rol dkyil 'khor theg gdab po// de yi nang ngu 'u mes dang// sgo rnams kyang ni bya ba ste// 'di ltar mkha' 'gro mkha'
176a7(rgyud): draba'i sdom pa stong pa ste// byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun// chos kyi rnam par dag pa yin// dbus sus ni bcu gsum ste// phyir ba gnas dang nye ba'i gnas// dur khrod dang ni nye dur khrod// 'di
176a8(rgyud): sbyar sbyor bas rnam dag par// sdom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya// de ni thugs kyi ye shes te// ye shes mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma'o// phung po khams dang skye mched la chag gnyis pa sta ba bya// 
176b1(rgyud): shes mchog gi sdom pa ste// gsang ba gsum gyi 'khor la dgod// byed dang byed du rnam par dgad// mkha' 'gro gsum na 'khor lol dbus// dpa ci kan la 'byor 'byung ba'o// ye shes mtshal
176b2(rgyud): ni// rnams pasil byas nas gzhug par bya// ye shes rgya yis da'ang bskur nas// gca po dag ni rnam par bsgom// bdag med chos kyi ba kun gyi// dam tshig mchog ni dri ma med// pa lu
176b3(rgyud): da las// dam tshig gsang ba gsum smos nas// sems can ma lus dam chug gi// mkha' 'gror ni rab gnas bya// 'bad pa yis ni bsdus nas kyang // gsang ba gsum du gzhug par bya//

176b8(rgyud): yod pa ni nad med byas// de ltar bsgom pa byas nas ni// las 'dir the tshom med pa yin// nang ge bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas// bsgom dang bzlas la dga' ba dang // dam tshig ras la dga' ba ni
177a1(rgyud): zigs pa med par cha lang brtan// 'di ltar rang gi tshogs bzlas// sangs rgyas gnas su lags par 'jug dang ni dam chag 'bar lon// mkhas pas bsgom mched bzlas 'bya// gsang
177a2(rgyud): sngags 'di dag bshad par bya// maM prA badz+ra nA ka ma d+hi hUM/ nA ka n+di drA la sa m+bar du mAM phaT swA hA/ e shrI bud+ha DA ka a s+t+raip+tA R+tha ke rA dz+wa la sa mA ra hUM hU~M phaT swAt+ma/ oM thA ka ma Na ka a kha~M trU~Mn+da kai rI drA la sa

177a5(rgyud): sa nas ni// snying po'i gsang sngags sas yin// i shrI badz+ra bA rA grIb tu hU~M phaT sAhA/ oM hrIHkin rje hU~Mdz+dzaphaT swAH/ oM shIl me mA hu~M hA phaT swA d+ha/ oM k+She bad+har t+ni hU~M bru~M phaT swAt+ma/ oM hrI \u0f7f

179a3(rgyud): phyag rgya lnga yis su lus brgyan// bod pa'i phreng ba'i dgra rgyan can// bzhad dang ni dang snying rje dang // sgeg pa dang ni ngam pa dang // drag cing khro ba'i nyams can te// bzlas dang bsgom ba sgo nang bsdu/

185b1(rgyud): ga bang yin// dbang bskur dus sun la 'byor pas// kha dag pa med sbyin par bya// dbang bskur ba ni mchog yin te// dam tshig mchog ni shes pa dang // ma cheg can gyi mchag dus// dmatsha
185b2(rgyud): lo'adus pa dang // dad pa rnams la sbyin par bya// ma dad pal sbyin me bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las bad ma ste lus r+thas brgyad bya'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byo
185b3(rgyud): nyid ni// gang gis shes pa tsam gyi ni// sgrub pa po yis dngos grub 'thob// bud med pa rtsa lbar dkar zhing // pad ma'i 'ad ba ltar dgras ring mig/ rtag tugs ni dkar la dka'// tsan dan sar pa'i dri dang ldan/ 
185b4(rgyud): 'de gshegs 'dus pa nyid la dga'// da rig las blang shes par bya// bung bang gtso mo'i gser 'dra zhing // dmar dang ser pa'i gos la dga'// dzA te tsam pa'i dri dang ldan// de yang bzar po'i rjes 'grang
185b5(rgyud): 'grar// thams cad ut+pal ltar spo bsangs// dri dang gas ni sngol dka'// srat+pal sngon po'i dri yod pa// de ni dpa' bo bzang rjes 'gro// bud med par dkar 'dra mdog gang // rtag tu pad ma'i rtsa ba dri// de yang de
185b6(rgyud): dpa' mo ri sh+lo// dmar zheng ser skya'i bud med gang // gzugs bzang gos ni dmar ba dang // ma la ki dang ut+pal dre// de ni 'i rigs byung yin// ser zhing ldang ba'i bud med gang // gos ni dkar la dga'
185b7(rgyud): dang // mgol me tog dri dang ldan// de bzhin gshegs rigs rjes 'gro yin// bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar// de yi mdog can kos 'chang zhing // rtag tu ga bur dri dang ldan// rnam snang rigs kyi rjes la
185b8(rgyud): rnam khyor ma yi rigs rnams ni// de ltar bdun po ngas bshad pa// g.yon pa'i dun spyod la rtag dka'// rang gi mngag gis rigs drug ldan// rigs kyi reg pa'i yi ge yang // kha dog drug tu 'gyur
186a1(rgyud): // rang she sa'an 'chang ba dang // rang gas sa byang cag tu smra// g.yan las 'dra ba'i bung ba dgapa// rnal 'byung ba la sa yanas tag/ lag pa sa man gyis mtshan pa dang // g.yon da khas
186a2(rgyud): rnam par blta// lAn rnams dang gang smra ba// de ni dmachog ldan par bshad// bud med gang byas danyan cing // rigs kyis bon rab tu smra// rigs kyi bya ba'i spong ste// rang gis bstan bshad mi 'dong la/ 
186a3(rgyud): rang shi rigs kyi rig pa zlos// de ni mchog ldan par bshad// phyag 'tshal ba ni gang 'ching ba// g.yon pa'i lus kyis rtag tu 'dud// lha mo rnams dang kun smra ba// de ni nges par bde bar 'gro/ ma
186a4(rgyud): bong g.yon pas sa la ni// rkang pas ri mo 'dri byed cing // mgo ni 'phrug par byed pa dang // zur gyis lta zhing lag pa ston// bsgrub pa po la khyad par du// de yis rang rig dran pa dang // 'khur ba 'am
186a5(rgyud): dag dang ni// sna dag tu ni thal mo ston// zur gyis lta zhing lan cig bsngags// zlos shing rigs la rnam par blta// bden par 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma// nges par dmatshig can yin na// de nas
186a6(rgyud): dal 'byor ma// de bzhin mkha' 'gram rnams kyi// bdud rtsi lnga rnams yang dag 'byung // ya ma~M ni dang skrag byed ma// 'dod ldan phag mo 'jigs gzugs ma// kun tu spyod pa bsung // rdul
186a7(rgyud): rnam pa bdud// mdor bsas rang mtshan bshad pa yin// gzugs can ma dang rnam pa'i ka/ lam yongs sur byis bcas so// mi ldog e hi ka lha mo// mkha' 'gro ma ni mdun du bshad
186a8(rgyud): par med pas bal ba dang // smin ma 'dags par gar byed cing // sngon bzhin gzugs ni srad byed la// phyis ni 'jigs par byed pa dag/ gzugs can ma ni yin par bshad// 
186b1(rgyud): med dpa' bos bsnyen par bya// thug pa'am yang na mi sdug pa// byis pa 'khyud cing tsum pa na// de ni tsum pa gir shes bya// mkha' 'gro mchog kyang de nyid yin// zas mi lta bar zur du blta// srog nyer dang ne
186b2(rgyud): dag dang // smin ma sbyar zhing sdigs mdzub dag 'di ni gzhan yang dbugs mi 'byin// 'jigs par byed pa gang yin pa// de ni lA ma yin par bstan// phag dang dred dang byil dang // lce spyang rigs dang sna
186b3(rgyud): dang // thams cad dor ni 'jigs byed pa// yongs su gyur par de bshad do// shin tu dga' bas rgod pa dang // song nas slar yang mi ldog la// rjes bu chags pas gsal bar rgod// dum skyes mar ni
186b4(rgyud): yid ni kun tu skyo ba dang // rkang pa lag pas bong pa 'am// gos mtha' 'am yang na shing dag gis// des reg pa ni 'tsho mi 'gyur// mi ldog par ni shes bya ste// bsgrub min par ni de bshad do// mkha'
186b5(rgyud): 'gro ma yi rigs phyag rgya// dpa' bod bsnyen cing mtshan ma bsta// thod pa dgra snyamache ba dang /  la gri kun tu skrag byed yin// rdo rdza da ni du nyid dang // rigs kyi phyag rgya yin par bshad// mngon par
186b6(rgyud): brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan ma'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o// 6// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni// gang zhig yang dag shes pa yis/ 
186b7(rgyud): gro gnas so// dam nengs pa'i skye ma dgang // bad ma dzi rnam pa gtag/ gangs rang zhin nga // zhen pa ba'i rjes 'apos// zung ma dag
186b8(rgyud): sen mo dmar// mig ni kun tu zhan pa dngag kyis du ba ma 'dre ba ni// pad ma ga dbang rigs 'brang yin// sbed ma'i dbus na rtsegs pa yang // lus ni spo bsangs skya ba dang // rtag tung rje rigs bsgom
187a1(rgyud): pa// gang ga sum du dzadra// rtag tu mtshad pa byed pa yi// mkha' 'grom de dpal ldan no// he ru ka pi rags blang yin// gang zhi dbus par gyi gsum ni// mdu thung dkan snang 'gyur
187a2(rgyud): mig dam mdog ni dmar ser ngang// de bzhin rkang pa lag pa dmar// daskyes kyem bya dag la yang // rtag tu med ni dkar 'gyur zhing // de 'i rkyem du rdo rje mtshar// rtag tu ga sheg mchod byed pa/ 
187a3(rgyud): rigs 'byung ba// mkha' 'gro yin par gdon mi ba// 'khor lo gang gi dpral ba 'am// lag par yang ni snang 'gyur ba// sprin sngon dag dang 'dra ba ni// rtag tu dpral bar 'chang byed pa// skal pa chen po ku
187a4(rgyud): tshogs // / mchog tu bden pa gang yin dang // khyim du 'khor lo 'dri byed cing // rtag tu de la mchod byed pa// rdo rje phag mo rigs 'byung ba'i// mkha' 'gro ma ni stobs kyis dregs// gang zhig mig sman
187a5(rgyud): gnag 'dra da// so ni dkar zhing mtho ba dang // rtag tu gdug par gyur pa dang // sems stobs ldan par gyur pa dang // rtag tu khrus la dga' ba dang // mang du sra bar mi byed cing // khyim du rdo rje 'dri ba dag / 
187a6(rgyud): ga tu dge bas mchod byed pa// rdo rje phag ma'i rigs 'byung ba// stong phrag bcu dang lnga pa yin// ser zhing gser gyi mdog 'drar snang // mig mi g.yo zhing kha spu ser// rdo rje gang gi dpral ba 'am/ 
187a7(rgyud): lag pa yang de ga// ga la ze dag gnas// rnams shing badzin par sgru ba dang/  ga yon krung zhig/ ga gi kyim pa ni// ga tu 'dun sa mchod pa// dus rgya
187a8(rgyud): 'a la 'khris// rangs kya sa sa phrug // gang ni gtag pa la pa/ ma thegs gan // dkyi // ga ga
187b1(rgyud): las pa dka'// rtag tu durang khrod dag tu 'gro// 'jigs pa med ceng rtse med cing // gang gis dpral bar thig le dang // khyim du thong ba 'dri zhi mched// dpal ldan ha ru ka de li// mas 'gro'i rigs la
187b2(rgyud): pa yin// srin gyi mdog 'dra'i bud med gang // so na ma mnyam par gnas shing // rtag tu gdug pa'i las la dga'// g.yon gyi mche ba gtsegs pa dang // ngos kyimadu ga sta ni// dri zhing rtag
187b3(rgyud): byed pa// rnam par 'dran pa'i rigs 'byung ba'i// mkha' 'gro mar ni the tshom med// mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs 'di dag/ shrI ha ru ka'i rigs la srung sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// mtshan nyid yang dag bsha/ 
187b4(rgyud): pa yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i kla ma las mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcwa pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sgrub pa po yis lA ma yi// mtshan nyid kyi ni khyad par dang //

187b6(rgyud): 'den par smra ba dag/ 6dam pa'i chos la dga'// dpa' bo phreng mo de shes bya/ bi ma'i phyag rgyar sbyin bya ba// yang na dra sbal phyag rgya bya// pags pa bum pa lce blugs nyid// phyag rgya'i lan du shes
187b7(rgyud): par bya// den ces pa 'anges sa la// khyim dub ma 'dri bar 'gyur// lA ma la ni bud med kyi// mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin// gsus pad+ma zhing yig dkyus ring // mi ga ning ma nang ser snar
187b8(rgyud): gnas// lhag cing zhal bzang dpal yin can// se zheng tsam pa lta khur snang // shin tu ring min blang ba'ang yin// sna tshogs pa mi gos la dga'// dpral bar ri me gsum yong cid/ 
188a1(rgyud): mams kyi rgyan du bltas pa nas/ rgod cing dga' ba nyid dag dang // la ma ni rnam par gnon cang gnas// sung du che ba rnams kyin// gtam dag la ni rtag tu dga'// de lta'i ra
188a2(rgyud): dregs mthong na ne// mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya// rkang pa g.yon pa bskum pa yis// bdag nyid kyang ni bstan par bya zhe g.yon pa dag ni yangs bzlog pa// phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad
188a3(rgyud): bcu bzhi dang ni tshes brgyad ni// de ni dus tshigs yin par bshad// khyim du mdung rtse gsum pa yang // bras la de ni stag tu mchod ka/ 'jig rten dbang phyug lA ma yi// mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin
188a4(rgyud): rang gi khur tshos dag tu ni// khur bur snang ba gnas gyur cing // de bayin na rtag tu dmar zhing ser// mig ni ljang ser dag tu snang // sgra ni de bzhin dbyil ba dang // mgo dang dbul bar dar bcings snang // 
188a5(rgyud): rimo gcig pa rab tu gnas// de bzhin mgrin pa ring ba dang // rtag tu gos dmar la dga' zhing // rgod cing glu ni len pa nyid// ldan 'ga' zhig ni khro ba dang // sems ni rnam par g.yo ba
188a6(rgyud): cod pa la ni dga' ba ste// 'di 'dra'i rab dregs mthong na ni// mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya// gnyis pa nyid ni 'bad pa yis// dril bu'i phyag rgya bstan par bya// g.yon gyi phyogs su ldo/ 
188a7(rgyud): pa ni// phyag rgya'i lam ni yin par bshad// thung zhing byin pa sdom pa dang // rtag tu gos ser la dgal zhing // phrag pa dag mgos kyang 'chang // de 'dra'i bud med mthong na ni// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bstan bya
188a8(rgyud): // 'bad pa yis na gnyis pa yang // dung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya// g.yon nas yongs su bzlog pa ni// phyag rgyu'i lan ni yin par bshad// bcu bzhi de yi dus yin te// de yi khyim du

188b2(rgyud): deng kha dog nag/ mig zlum sA ni nyams pa dang // rtag tu glu ni mkhas pa dang // sprin gyi mdog can yid 'phrog pa// 'di 'dra'i rab grag sa mthong na ni// glu yi phyag rgya bstan par bya// gnyis pa
188b3(rgyud): 'bad pa yis// mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya// g.yon pas yongs su bzlog pa ni// phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad// tshes grangs bcu gcig de yis dus// khyim du mche ba 'dri bar byed//

188b5(rgyud): 'gro rnams kyi brda rnams te// gang gis spun dang sring mo ru// yang dag shes par 'gyur ba'o// gang zhig lag g.yon ston pa ni// gsong por smra ba ston pa yin// gang rdeg srin laka ston ba
188b6(rgyud): bor pa lar 'gyur yin// gang zhig lte brdebs pa ni// bdag ni bkres par ston pa yin// gang nig dbul ba ston pa ni// nam mkha' las ni 'ongs zhes pa'o// gang zhig khar ni song mo 'dzu
188b7(rgyud): zos can nas ni mer// nga dag lce ni bstod pa dag / ba'o zhes ni k+Sha ba yan// gang zhig pus mal reg pa// ngal lo zhes ni ston pa yin// gang zhig sor so me la reg/ ngal sos ni
188b8(rgyud): yin// gang zheg so de bye pa// sharang nas ni smra ba yin// lag pa g.yas pa son pa che// 'di ltar gyis shes son pa yin// gang de gzhag nyer ljon pa 'i// bcings so zhes
189a1(rgyud): / nga nagapa lda ldan pa ste// grol lon sa ni ston pa yin// gang shegs ston pa'o// de ba yin pargyas bya/ dgang nig rdzun don pa la// rnam thas blang ba bltas nas ni/ 
189a2(rgyud): kan de la bstan// gang zhig yan lag ba skyod pa dang // de la mche ba bstan par bya// gang zhig lag pas lag pa ston// gtor ma za zhes yang // gang sreg lagal g.yas pa ston// de ltar
189a3(rgyud): shegs pa yin/ gang zhig rna ba la reg po// gnas par bya zhes ston pa yin// gang zhig sen mos sen ma rag/ shi yis khyer nas bya ba na// gang khrigs 'dri dkyil 'khor dusade ring
189a4(rgyud): smra ba yin// gang zhig nu ma la reg pa// bdag gi bu ni srungs zhes bya// ga zhig mchog yanas la 'dra// gnyen dag srungs shi dang dra sa dz+rag kang zhig min ni rnam 'dzums pa/ rbe b+ha ra bya zhes
189a5(rgyud): // gang dag chags la rag byed pa// bde ba ba' des smras na/ nyam ni gang yang rung // de dag kun gyis yang dag spya nan mngon par brjed pa'i klung snga ma'i bla ma las ba rda'i la'u ste bzhi

189a7(rgyud): par bya// gang zhigs ni ston pa la// de la ldani bstan par bya// gang shegs su ni snod byed pa// de la dpung pa bstan par bya// gang zhig nas rgya pa// dal la de bstan par bya/ 2
189a8(rgyud): byed pa// de lags ka bstan par bya// gang zhig lta bzhin byed pa// de la lta ba bstan par bya// gang zhig gas ba sar byed / des yi ga sta par ba// 
189b1(rgyud): ga ni bstan par bya// gang zhig pus mo ston byed pa// de la byin pa bstan par bya// gang zhig rkang pa ston byed pa// da la rkang mthil bstan par bya// gang zhig sor tshigs ston byed pa// de la sen mo bstan par

190a8(rgyud): ni/ dbyangs pa la tshwa pa zhes kyi'i 'dra'i 'is bya ba yi /  ba'is bya 'ani ba ngaras bya ba yir no// de cishes pa pa rtsegs shes bya ba byed no// bres sadas pa ba rebs
190b1(rgyud): // pa mnas su pan b+ha ga // mar/ shes bya ba na spang nan// sman d+hanas byang na ka na kaDa// shir na brdzudan na// gang na sa rang// ba nes la// thar mtshan rnapa'o// a rba ta snyan bsrungs pa / 
190b2(rgyud): ma ga ma ni ma'o// ta li ka ni mkha' 'gro ma'o// na ra ka ni dkyil 'khor ro// a ma ka ni dur khrod do// ka li ka ni sgo'o// shwa sa ni bram ze'i rigs so// ba ri d+hi ni rgyal rigs so// pi ra ti ni rje'i rigs

190b5(rgyud): dApa ni bdug pa'o// sa ru ni ri bo'o// sa ri ta ni chu bo'o// a ku li ni yan lag go// ba dan ni gdong ngo // dzA ti ka ni lce'o// an tan ni so'o// Shak+Shi ni rgyal mtshan no// tshon do ni phreng ba'o// tsa la ni rmA

190b7(rgyud): ni ma bza' ba'o// ha ni rnam grangs so// ad+h+ya ni rgyal po'o// kha la reg pa ni zos so zhes pa'o// lce la reg pa ni ngoms so zhes pa'o// na sti ni snying po'o// hri ni ngo tsha'o// mi thun gyis shig pa'o// 
190b8(rgyud): b.ru la reka pa ni stong pa'o// steng du gcig go// 'og tu med pa'o// phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan no// dpa' bo'i gsung gi gsang ba'i brda'o// mngon par brjod pa'i rkad bla ma'i bla ma las
191a1(rgyud): 'bo ma'i bad chaga'i se smye na banan lta ba'o// / de nas rnal 'byod rgyud du de// da dag da la cag yas bshad// skyes pa'am bud med ga yo nas lo// 'dod pa'ang
191a2(rgyud): grub ster bar byed// khyi mdang nang du rnams gnas pa// shin tu rang yang shes par 'gyur// he ru ka las skyer gzhan med// slob dpon rnal 'byor ma nyid ni// rgyud 'ang dun sgrub pa la// legs pa
191a3(rgyud): ra pa nyid yin te// brnyan mi bya dang spang mi bya// nus pa yis ni mchod par bya// pho nya mo brgyad 'di dag ni// mos dang dad pa 'phel byed pa// rtag par dngos grub rnams kyi rgyu// dmachag rnams
191a4(rgyud): song ba'o// lha ma gzhan dang kun sbyor ba'i// 'dod la rmongs par gyur pa dang // gnyis su med dang thogs med dang // dam tshig spyad par spyod pa dang // bud med dbang phyug shin tu sbyor// tshangs par
191a5(rgyud): deb ni dag de// 'o med rgyan ma kun tu spyod// 'di brgyad dam tshig kun spyod yin// sgrub pa la ni gnas pa yi// srab pa po mam nyan shes su// rgyad kun gyi na thun mong ste// tu med pa nika na
191a6(rgyud): ye bya// dad pa nyid kyis 'ang bya yi// mag dong lag pas ma yin no// gsang ba 'di ni mi bstan cing // rab tu 'bad de sre bar bya// blo ldan pa chung bskyed par na// pho nya mo rnams yang dag dadas// 
191a7(rgyud): dag dang ma dag 'dres pa ste// bsgrub pa po ni gsum du gnas// mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang // gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i ma'o// yul yul du ni dka' thub can// pho ta'i gzu
191a8(rgyud): tshan ma rtag/ po nya ral gri mo 'dra zhing // dag byed bsed nams 'phel byed yin// de bzhin pa nya legs 'dres pas// sgrub pa po yang ngos grub thog// bzlas mchod bsam gtan med
191b1(rgyud): yang // skar banyid du 'grub par 'gyur// sngags dang phyag rgya srab pa pas// mtshad pa nyid la rab tu 'jug// 'di las gzhan pa'i mchod med de// de ltar bstan bcos nges pa yin// po nya'i lam lang
191b2(rgyud): ba dang // ra~M sgrur pa ba ni dngos grub bcan// rig sngags phrag char yang dag ldan// bsal rtag tu smad par bya// sgrub pa pon legs par du// mnyam par bzhag pa'i rigs rnams na// kun la nye
191b3(rgyud): spyad bya dang // baba' min par ni me rtag ga'adi nyid duni dbyer med// po nya ma yi bsgrub pa nyad// dngas grub chog la spyod cha// po nya gcig pu la na yin// byang chub phyogs kyi dngos grub na// bsgrub pa
191b4(rgyud): nye ba dang // lngab rgyud rib kyis thob pa'i// dbang bskur bas ni sngags legs ldan// po nya rnams su yang dag bshad// phyag rgya legs sbyor dang tshul dang // chags med gtong dang tshul khrims
191b5(rgyud): ye nas u skyes yang dag rdzogs// sems kyi bdag nyid nang bar langs// lus kyi bya ba kun byas te// lus la shin tu mtshon chan// lus la gnas par kun tu smad// dag byed byas pa'i las kyi

199b3(rgyud): dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' nyid// dam par dga' dang lhan cig skyes// dang po 'dab ma drug/ cu bzhi// gnyis pa brgyad pa mchog yir te// gsum pa'adab ma bcu drug pa// bzhi pa sum cu

203b3(rgyud): de zhin te// nyis me gzugs can bachom ldan 'dag// tanagadapa' rnam par shes// na dadapa la rnam me// ma na marnam dag pa// gis sa byed pa ra da de//  mas
203b4(rgyud): dag re// rtagadang mni gang yin pa// chos rnams seMs yang dag rig/ rdo rje drag mo la papa 'grom/ des tshig mos yang dag reg/ gas mdag car kyi mkha' 'grem// spobs pas so yang dag se/ 
203b5(rgyud): namod dag 'dab ma'i dbus// rton pa rnam pa ban pa me// dwe leg ni den la rlon pa ste// ru tsa gi no chag thu ston pa yid// rubag ma la ni ye nas son// keng rul mdi rnam shes rton pa yid// shar dang byar
203b6(rgyud): ni// / phyogs kyi ni 'khor la la// chos kyi mdoni bzhi pa dgad //  na 'du byed thams cad 'i rtag par/ pa tsa ni 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal pal// Da mngonachos thams cad 'dag med par/ 
203b7(rgyud): med pa na // nga ldan pa dgas/  sas// se la gas pa mkhas pad rtogs pa
203b8(rgyud): mad shes sa ldan palal// tsas rnams daldan pa ma 'jigs pa med pa me na pa ma sa gan/ ngas par byung ba'alal la' dgapa la 'jigs pa med pa ni gsus 'bya 'o// 
204a1(rgyud): gas pa bad panas la/ mas su dargyas mang man// 'dams na nirnam par dag/ ska ba zhi dag tu snyam na// gtum byed ma smad da par da'ang bar/ 
204a2(rgyud): rnams ni btsan 'grus gyi da'ang ba'o// 'bar mchog sa ni dran pa'i dbang po'o// rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o// dpe byed bzang po brgyad du ni/ bcom ldan 'das dpa
204a3(rgyud): // sum na ca gnyis mtshan rnams ne// 'phags pa shes rab sa bamam ldan 'das// rdo rje phagam nyid yin no// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud rdza ma'i bla ba las yi ga nye su rtsa gnyis kyi
204a4(rgyud): sa 'as bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dkyil lab dag ni rnam dag pa// 'byung ba kun gyi spyan yin te// rnam par snang mdzad theg tu grags// rtags
204a5(rgyud): 'i rib pa ni// mkhas pas dkyil 'kho mig tu zhes// dus ni sna tshogs rigs su shes// mchod pa sna tshogs chog bzhin// bu l+le ba 'dam ma ma// dzAb d+hang thugs 'khom la//  rkyen gsung
204a6(rgyud): sos+ye// a rbu da ni lha'i 'khor lo// so dra ba re zung bani ba// ra me shwar me phyogs so// de'i ko ni 'den bram yin// ma ma pani rlung gi zung // babadz+ra k+Sham du ba ste// grwa bani rnam par dag pa ni// 'di la che tshos
204a7(rgyud): 'ayin// mdza dag che ga kyi sgor// tri shag ne lho phyags so// gos sa ni nub kyi 'o// ga la rje ne byang gi ste// shar gyi rta babs la swA na/ Sh+T+r-iH me ba zhes yin// ta ma la ya nub phyogs sa// rba ta
204a8(rgyud): // me nyi blta la / sa da chenas/ la mtshan pa na no// sa dzarje thig ma / na med do// kuwa ta na de/ dang // ran
204b1(rgyud): tsa// thog thun med pa yin// rlung ban pa la sgri ba ni pa// rta babs bzhin rnam par 'gyud// drabang byed ces 'argyan nang // dar dang phreng bas rnam par bcan// zur rgya chen thams cad dang // ska
204b2(rgyud): sgo kya ma thams rnams sa// de rje rin chen gyis brgyan zhing // sku yi mang mo'i sku nyid ni// don med byas pa rnam par byed// gsung gi 'khar lo 'ad dpag med// zhags kyi 'khom ma mi bskyed pa// pad ma
204b3(rgyud): dbu ni rin chen 'dzin// phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshul can ne// rnam par snang mdzad rnam par bskam// tshor bsku yi la dzer lo ste// 'du shes kasung gi 'khor lo yan// thugs kyi 'khor lo 'du byed de// dram she
204b4(rgyud): pad pa gdon men// rim lnga pa mchog gyur pa// de yis rnam dag rang 'azhin car// sa dang ri tshethams cad kun// dpar 'os yongs su dag par bskum// ri mo nyi sh+tsaHbzhi pa// de dag dpa' bos rnam par dag
204b5(rgyud): tshal pa' 'gra ma yis dag/ lte bar phag mo'i sa bon k+ShaH// he rug dpal mchog yin no// 'da' ma mala' 'gro ma'i sa dag/ dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog dag na// sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag
204b6(rgyud): kyil la bar snying po mdor bsdus na// dkyil 'khor drang pa phyig ste// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa phyags tshan yin// gsum la lag pa'i phyag rgyar bshad// bani pa gzugs su gyur pa ste// lnga pa me ta
204b7(rgyud): pa ye// drug pa tshogs kyi dkyil lab nyid// dbus ni rab tu dka' ba'is// parna ma'i lte ba dang gzugs kyi char mo de ma med// gsung gi mtham pa 'ang byed pa// sku yi 'khor ma 'od 'phrog
204b8(rgyud): yin pa ne lung dka' ba// reng du song bsgo bzhi yin// zur gyi cha ni mi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros rdo rje'i theg nams kyi spen ni rta ba bas yin// 'di lha'i dkyil 'khor byis nas ni// rtag tu bsgom ring mchod pa
205a1(rgyud): na 'thob par 'gyur// ma pa mamadza ma snyam pa pa// dkyil la ba mtshan na cad ni// he ga dpal che shes ma // thaka' ba dam 'a kyil la dzin/ 
205a2(rgyud): mchog kyar pa// den dkyil 'bar 'dus pa so// dkyil 'khor ba de chen che ba yin no// dkyil 'khor dpa' brdal 'gyur ma// gnyis med la sbyor dkyil 'khor yid// bdag gi de nyid te 'dzin yin
205a3(rgyud): nyid na bzhin te// sngags kyid nyid phyag ma yin// de ga'i dkyil labar rnam pa'i mchog/ yan lag kun bsgoms las 'das shang// rtog dang rnam rten rnam par spangs// phyi mo bag tshilas 'das
205a4(rgyud): shing // de ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no// ches rnams thams cad brtag tu med// chos dang chos min rnam par spyod// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa ni// rnam dag nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa// chags dang
205a5(rgyud): chags med chags par mnyam// pad ma rA ga tu mnyam byung // rang sems chags pa dmar po'i mchog/ de dag dkyil 'khor mchog yin te// yid ni khams rnams thams cad de// gzug sa dang gzugs
205a6(rgyud): med dri ma med// bskul zhing sad pa yid yin te// sems ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil 'khor lus su bshad pa ste// dkyil 'khor thAg med par bshad// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems yin te/ 
205a7(rgyud): rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba// sa 'ogs steng bas blar khyab// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dkyil 'khor gyi bsgom pa bstan pa'i le ru ste lnga 'acu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nasags
205a8(rgyud): bshad bya ba// sems can kun la phan stsol ba// A le kA le las byung ba// chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer mchog/ dra badra phyed kyis brgyan pa// dang drang byed byas rnam par brgyan// de yang byas pa che// 
205b1(rgyud): pa bzhi pa la rnam par 'gyur// de la lce ba'i dbus su ni// sna tshogs 'khor le lte bar bcas// thugs kyil kho lo 'chad pa ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus sun// khor lol lte ba'i dbus dag tu// snga cho
205b2(rgyud): da pa 'dab brgyad pa// sna tshogs rdo rjes rnams 'dres pa// lha yis bzhugs gnas nyi shu pa// le bar dbus su bstan pa ste// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// hU~M las he ru kar byas te// zhal pan pa la phya
205b3(rgyud): brgyad pa// spyar gsum sku lus dkar po ste// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas// phag ma yin kuna'ang 'char// sngagag pags pa gos su mnapas// phyag rgya drug gis sbrul brgyan// gdug pa kun gyi
205b4(rgyud): pa la// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis mnan// 'jigs byad dang ni dus mtshan dag/ brgyal zhing rnam par myos pa yi// klad pa la ni zhabs kyis mnan// gcer bu dad 'bod pa mnan// rgyal ba'i pags pa
205b5(rgyud): steng du ste// lcags kyu'i phyag gis 'dzin pa dang // gzhan yang cang te'u de bzhin te// thod pa kha T+wAM ga yang 'dzin// gzhan du yang ni mgo bo 'chang // sna bogs rdo rjes dbul mnanA// zla ba phyed pa dbul 'chang / 
205b6(rgyud): 'i phreng ba redab rgyan car// me baspyod pa yi spyi gtsug brgyan// tshangs pa'i do yul 'dzin pas// bdag gi khro bo bdun smos nas// je lur bcom ldan mdog bzhin du// phag mo mchog dang de bzhin te// su lus nag yod
205b7(rgyud): ba'i mdangs// gze khyen ma dngas kyis mdzes pa// kri gu gzod pa kha nag/ dril bu car te'u bdung dang ni// lcags kyu nags pa de bzhin no// lha mo phyag ni brgyad pa ste// dkar zhing sngol ldang ba'o// seng ge
205b8(rgyud): dbang po mdzes// g.yas dang ka yon gyi nas pa dang ni// ser zheng ltung ba'i gzugs can te// gzhan du bdag pa je bzhin su/ 5 ma yang na bamed sa pa/  prang+ga ni grol pa du
206a1(rgyud): // ska rags can// padam pa nalam2'am// zur mthul payod pa ste// thugs kyi 'kho sa sngar bshad pa'o//  pa' pa da// gsung dang stsal mtsha la gtas//

206a3(rgyud): gnas kyi rjes rim pa// sngar bshad snga tshags rigs rnams ni// rnga ltar 'dod pas bsgom par bya// gzhan yang zhal dang mdog rnams ni// mkhar 'gro ba yi mdog bzhin dang // phyag mtshan phag
206a4(rgyud): bshad bzhin// gnas mig par ma par de ltar dag // trar bshad pa'i chag bzhin// gsang sngags nga bzhin rim par dgad// sum cu rtsa bdun nam dag don// bskam pa la chag de 'grel par bya//

206b1(rgyud): nas gcig pas phyag ban pa// bcom ldan ma gon po zhal len pa// zhabs pan pas phyag 'azhi pa// med pa dang mi kha T+wAM 'dzin// dril bu rdo rjes legs par mtshan// mod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// snasnga tshogs rdo rjes pa

206b3(rgyud): gyur cang // gcer bud bu sra krol ba la// spyan gsum pa la legs chags 'grel// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gnyis// zhabs kyis rnam par gnon pa ste// g.yas 'byung ba yi gnas pas
206b4(rgyud): bzugs// sa lus phyag rgya drug 'dzin zhing // mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang // thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos// g.yas pa dkar shing g.yon ljang gu// steng ni sngo skya su lus dkar//

207b1(rgyud): gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba pa shes ma chog gyur pa// rigs lnga gsang sngags rgya che ba'i// bsgob pa bdag gis bshad pa yin// mog pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can// gang la'

207b3(rgyud): gnas pa yin/ lkug cing glen la sdi gangan can// byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can// sems can yongs su ma smin dang // phyi rol bstan bcos kyis 'chal ba// de dag kun gyis mi shes te// mi shes mun

207b6(rgyud): namakhyen bstan pa shas// mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // thos pa dang ni dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur ba/ de ltar de ni the tshom med// lha rnams bzlog ste dkod pa dang // sngags kyi
207b7(rgyud): bzlog pa dang // dkyil 'khor kun yang bzlog pa dang // so so bskam pa'ang mi bya ste// bzlog pa'i yi ge btus nas ni// bsgom pa gsang ba bzlog pa de// snying pa thams cad bsgrub pa yin// ga/

208a1(rgyud): 'byin gsungs pa ni// dag pa'i lus ni skyodan med pa// bsod nams chung ba sngags pas kyang // ngadaga' bas na rnyed par 'gyur// de ni srung med 'aza' ba med// dkyil 'tshor dkyil la
208a2(rgyud): bdag po med// bzlas dang btum zhugs sbyin sreg med// mdor na sems bsdus tul cad yin// gzung byas rnab shes ye shes na// thams bstan las brtson las te// phyi rol gyi ni bstan bcos
208a3(rgyud): 5// la mde shin tu ring ba yin// rnal 'byor pa rnams thabs kyis de// bla ma'i bsnyen bkur la brten pa// ston pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang // dpa' bo 'di nyid bstan pa yin// skad cig rnam par rnal gyi
208a4(rgyud): bdag/ skad cag rnam par phrag rgyar ldan// kun nas thams cad skad cig ste// skad cig gis ni gsang sngags brjod// pus mo sa la btsugs nas su// bdag nyid kyis ni gsol ba gda'/ 
208a5(rgyud): ba ldan sgo mas zhus pa de// go'apar rgya cho gnyis med pa// 'di ni 'byung ba kun la gnas// rgya ba dang ni mi tshu ra la// rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa ni// ci rigs pashad kyis legs par can/

208a7(rgyud): lte ba'i 'khor mo che// thabs cad mkhyed pa zhes byar bshad// rnga rdza cad de der zhugs pa// cha yad na ni rnam spangs pa// lus can rnams kyi nangangan rol// lus lapa 'das shing gos pa med// 
208a8(rgyud): la lar gzugs can dag tu bzhugs// la lar sdangang ngag dka dang // la lar ra bar skra dag dang // la lar dri chen rdo rje chu// la lar tsha bar bcas pa'i sems// la lar srom dang la lar bkre
208b1(rgyud): lam sa da mar no// ma mar ba sa rnam par gachags// la la thun mad 'dod chags te// ma lar gsad dang 'dzabs pa ste// ma lar rol mo brdung bar mdzad// la lar me tog 'bras bur gnas// la la
208b2(rgyud): cing spyod par 'gyur// la lar srog tu rnam par gnas// la lar sa dang du dang ma// pa lar 'byung ba chen po lnga// la lar rigs kyi bye brag gis// bram ze pa de gdol pa dag/ la lar ma dang phreng mo ru// la lar
208b3(rgyud): chu ma bu mo ru// la lar tshangs dang dbang ldan dang // khyab 'jug dang ni nyi ma nyid// la yar kla ba skar mar bcas// la lar nyin dang mtshan mor gyur// la lar khams gsum pa rnams kun// byed pa po dang mi
208b4(rgyud): rgyal// la la zhi pa'i dbang gis zhum// mi gsal spong pa'i rdo rje can// la lar byang chub chen por gshegs// la lar pha rol bdud las rgyal// la lar byis pa'i rang bzhin nyid// la lar rgas shing
208b5(rgyud): pa'o// la la man chen gyis zin pa// kha lar rgyu dang mi rgyab// kha lar sngo dang le ba rgan dang // kha khar dkar dang ser ba'o// la lar sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad// la lar sgrol pa gas dkar mo// la la
208b6(rgyud): spyan dang ba k+She// la lar dka' bzlog ni ba me// la lar 'dab chags mkha' lding dang // nam mkha' dang ni mkha' 'gro nyid// la lar klu dang sbrul chen po// la lar smad 'tshong spre'u dang ni// la lar dri lam
208b7(rgyud): mtsho ba dang // ma lar gnyid kyis log pa nas// la yang rlung dang mkhris pa dang // la lar khrag dang lags par 'gyur// la lar bye ngan dub dang // la lar sreg pa'i medag yin// la lar ma
208b8(rgyud): nges skye ba ste// rnab par 'phrul pa 'di sa za// thams cad bdag nyid 'azhugs 'dis// lhag pa ninal spangs pa'i// de yi sa pa'i sa tshogs 'di'o// rtags len pa mang car// gzugs
209a1(rgyud): / med par ni phrag le dang // skye ba'i dpan 'dama'o// bcu drug theg shes thig gdab par// pagadang yang mnyam skyer pa / bslang byab byas pa lan// dadabus rtag tu gas 'a /

209a3(rgyud): bdag nyid rtag tu 'jugs// thams cad mkhyen pas 'di bshad la 'am// mi 'gyur ba'i lam bshad paganakA li nyags pargya yi man mchog gis gzugs can bsam pa ste// steng pa ma yin

209a5(rgyud): sam byang da ma /  sa gas kyi /  sa ga mam sa gas

209a7(rgyud): / dang nan gshes pa / la bal pa khams na na pa med/ malal da gas dpa/ 
209b1(rgyud): // khyo pa 'gyur rab / da'ad khyod do//  ldan pan pa gnas// da nyad 'a sa to//  gdang ma ma ma shad/ sa rnamams sa ta/ 
209b2(rgyud): gang ba'ang 'dzin pa yid// nas rtag tu 'byung //  gsas rnams dang / da mtshas dag de la su dang// rig byed gru thar gnas 'anams// 'jig rten 'di dang
209b3(rgyud): dag tu// dmed par ni 'a gru ba mi 'gyur// ga pyad grub pa'i mtha' rnams na med na sted ba tu na ga 'jug dang chus nyid dang ni/ 'jug pa gas pa na gas dang / byin kyis brlas pa dang dbang

216b3(rgyud): sbyar// phyi mo gnyis pa nyid kyang ni// ya ge drug cu bdun dang sbyar// gdug pa'i dngos ka ba kun 'grub cing // sgrub pa po la dpal yang stsol// dbyangs kyi yig pa ni pa dang // yi ge 'dun cul dang sbyar// thig le

216b6(rgyud): byar// thig les kyang rnam par btun// rgya ma ba ni gnyis pa yang // yi ge bdud cu brgyad dang sbyang // theg pas gnyis kyis rnam par btan// phye mo yini gnyis pa yang // me ge bdun cu

235a5(rgyud): bram dang // ral pa'i tse tshugs kyis brgyan cing // lham ni dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nye bar brgyan// rgan la ni ning g.yas dkar min// de bzhi ni gzhan yang g.yon pa dam de// rgyas
235a6(rgyud): rnal se rab gser sregs 'dra// thod pal bzhugs gar dang ldan// sum cu gsum pa 'jigs par mdzad// rdo rje dang neral gri dang // dril bu thod pa bsdabs pa nyid// mkha' 'go ba ye 'khor los ga

235b1(rgyud): maspyod// brtan pa dang ni gas ba la// 'grothun g.yan las byung bsan// gzan byas pa'al zhing gas nam tshad \u0f7f// baham gtags zhan rnams la// 'ad ma tshangs pas paphra ma bya// pata ma rtag 'am pa
235b2(rgyud): gyur ba nyid du mtshom med// sab pos mchog pu bang byas te// brdul thugs min sangs brdal thugs rdzogs// dam tshig rigs la stod pa dang // tsa'i bza' ba ldan cig bya// rigs lnga la ni ba kun sdud pa// 
235b3(rgyud): cag nyid du brtag par bya// slong ci khrag dang ga pur bcas// tsan dan dmar po snang byas la// rnga rnga chu dang bsres pa ni// dngas grub thams cad srub byed pa'i// de dag bdud rtsi lngar ni 'gyur// mthe bo bran lag sbyar ba
235b4(rgyud): yes// nab 'byor rig pa sa rtag tu bza'// zhi 'ang btung ba bzhin byangs na// dngos grub rtag par 'thob par 'gyur// 'di dag dam tshig dam pa ste// mdzes ma'i gdong can khyod la bshad// las rnams kun la thabs
235b5(rgyud): bcas shing // dogs pa med par gang sprod dang // rnam par mi rtog sgom pa ni// brtul zhugs rnams kyi mchog gi mchog/ las rnams kun la kun tu na// rnam par mi rtog sgom byed cing // dogs pa med par kun tu

241a8(rgyud): nga la sogs pa'o// srog chags rnam pa lnga tshags bre// phyed pa byar gsogs pas bcar// de nas chog 'di yis ni// reg pa ched daklu brgyad dgod// ska ba ning mgo gnyis bsnol ba la// mjug
241b1(rgyud): kA ni dadakris nas su// shar du ka rgyal mtha' yas ni// 'dab skyes sngon po lta bu'i mdog/ gdengs ka bdun ni bsgyings pa la// klu mo dang ni bcas par dgod// phyag na pad ma bsnams pa'o// byang na nor rgyas ser
241b2(rgyud): boste// nub du 'dzag pa dmar po yin// lhod stobs rgyu sdang skya ste// dbang ldan du ni dung skyo yin// rlung mtshams pad ma badren bral du// pad ma chen po dgod par bya// me mtsham pa su ni rigs ldan te// cho ga sngams
241b3(rgyud): bar bya// klu ni brgyad po thams cad kyang // rin chen cad pan dag dang ldan// rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par grubs// gdengs ka'i nor bu'i 'od kyis ni// mun pa thams cad sel byed pa// thal ma sbyar nang skrag nas su//

265a3(rgyud): de skrag par snang 'a gyur bas// e zhes bya bas nges par ston// yi gi al ba bzung na// rgyal po dang 'ani sar 'gyur te// kun nas nor ni dad pa dang // gang dag bsams par 'grub rung /

271a7(rgyud): de sa yid 'ong bsam// mkha ze na da ma mi ster ba'i// dadam pa'i 'tha bang pa ma/ dza rje sems dpar de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo dzin gyis gsus// 
271a8(rgyud): smad kyirgyal ba chen po dang la dzo ma kha' 'grelas dajim pa'i 'gro 'byung ba'i rim par bye ba ste bcug nyis pal// / de nas yang dag pashad byab// dngom thu ba thamasas der ba sgrub pa// 
271b1(rgyud): ma byas na// sgrubapas dang mab+hab pa 'gyung ba la/ an sna bsams nasas// ban lang par lta bar bsam// dan ma mnyam par snang byas// / rnam ma mal ba mgron// pa
271b2(rgyud): ba rnams su snar// a bad+hU tI'i gnas de bzhin// smin ma'i bar du gzhag par bya// dbyangs yig dang por yang dag ldan// bsgoms na skad cig de la 'bar// de nas 'bar phreng rgya
271b3(rgyud): / kun nas ske'i 'khor lo bsam// lte ba snying ga'i kha dang ni// dpral stang spyi gtsug 'khor po ni// dang po sngags tshogs byin gyis brlab// lta ba snying gar rnal 'byor ma// lce gnyis dpa' bas
271b4(rgyud): / byin byas brlab// dpa' bo dang ni la 'byor ma// gnyis med cho ga ji bzhin du// 'gal me'i 'khor lo la gnas pa// mkha' 'gro ba ni de bzhin 'khor// phrag lta bur ni gsal ba'i 'ong // yid
271b5(rgyud): shugs chen pos rig pa che// lI'i rnal 'byor dus su ni// phyogs bcu rnams su spro bar bya// shin tu phra ba'i rdul tshogs ni// shin tu phra ba'i dngos por bsgom// 'gyur ba med cing snang ba med/ 
271b6(rgyud): mkhyen 'bras bu ster ba'o// me tog la ni gnas bsams te// gang la byin te rgyas 'debs 'gyur// dung dang zla 'dra'i 'od mdzad pa// ltung byed ma yi sbyor ba bsam// bsgrub bya
271b7(rgyud): gnas ni// ldang cing bzlas na ltung bar 'gyur// de nas nyi ma la gnas pa'i// bdud tshul nyi ma'i 'od can no// bskal pa'i me ltar rab 'jigs pa'i// gsod ma bsams te yayid kyis su// 
271b8(rgyud): pabyar ldan cig gcig gyur nas// steng du bltas na 'chi bar 'gyur// de nas rlung dang mo rini// dkyil 'khor la gnas mi stag gi/ phung po 'phro ba dbugs pabs ma// yid kyis bsla bya srung
272a1(rgyud): / zhugs te// depe snyen tunas byung // 'gugs pa re sags pazlas 'akrugs par 'gyur// rlung gi dkyil 'khor sems kyis ni// rlung gi dkyil lakhor ma gnas te// dang mdogs
272a2(rgyud): lte ba snying garnams sun// dbugs mi ga sebs bskam par bya// dang pa rdo rje sems dpa
272a3(rgyud): gnyis pa pad ma gar dbang rgyal// gsum pa rnam par snang mdzad de// de bzhin bzhi pa rta mchog rgyal// lnga pa rdo rje nyi ma ste// drug pa he ru kar ni brjod// slar yang lte ba snying ga dang // de bzhi
272a4(rgyud): dang mgo dang ni// spyi gtsug mtshon cha nyid dge ste// rdo rje phag ma gshin rngam// de bzhin rmongs ma bskyod ma ste// smag ma dang ni gtum ma rnams// drug pa 'di dag rig pa che// pha rol byed
272a5(rgyud): dam pa drug/ de nas dbang bskur bsgoms nas ni// phyi nas mchod pa brtsam par bya// bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas// dpal ldan he ra kar dran bya// dam tshig ye shes gcig gyur
272a6(rgyud): des ni rdo rje can du brjod// rnal 'byor 'di ni mchod chen dang // de bzhin sngags kyi dgod pa ste// de nas dpa' bo mchod shes nas// las ni 'bad pa nyid kyis bya// sngags pas rang dag
272a7(rgyud): phyin ci lag tu ngas par slar// tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pare// las kyi mdog tu rnam par sgom// de nyid dbye bas phye nas ni// tsa ni lam du sbyar bar bya// sbyor ba yi ni don nam
272b1(rgyud): ldan rdo mun gyis gsungs// rlung kyi rgyam pa chen po dpal rdo rje ma pa' 'grolas/ dpa' bo gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa dang / las kyi tshogs rnams 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gsum pa'o// de nas
272b2(rgyud): sa kyi ni// 'khor long gnas pa'i babrag dang // gnas kyi rab tu dbye ba dang // yul gyi dbye ba bshad par bya// gon ma la ya yul te// spyi gtsug dz+wa la d+har yin// ur+than rbab g.yas pa ste// mang bud ni tu 'phyog
272b3(rgyud): yin// gnas kyi ma can rnam pa bzhi'o// gdapar rnagayon te// ra mI shwa ri sman dbus gsungs// mi gan dpe koT ste// dpung pa mal bzhes brjod// 'di dag nya ba'i gnas len te// gnas kyi khyad par
272b4(rgyud): mkha' spyod 'grus kyi 'khor long gnas// kA ma ru mtshan khung de bzhin du// du ma o Ter rab tu grags// de dag zheng ste lte ba ni// tri sha ku naM zhes bya yin// sA yaM tsa mo ka sA la// de dag nye bal
272b5(rgyud): / 'deg pang ga yin te// mgrin pa lam pa ka Te brjod// tshan dog zhes bya bar grags// seng ka nyen gyi zhes byaste// chus ta ma la zhes bya// nye ba'i rol sir brjod pa yin// gnas kyi kyad
272b6(rgyud): sa sred gsung ge la bar lang gnas// mtshan na yi dgas gnas pas// gre he bu bshang ba'i lam// de dag 'du sar brjod pa ste// bdun so d+hanas bya// byen pa gnyis ni gseng phreng ste/ nye ba'i
272b7(rgyud): yin papa/  b.lan med te// du krod can kya ba /  dzem dunas byas// bumam gul bAnas 'dza// nye du mangs don no// hUM le pa yang sang dag panas
273a1(rgyud): skyes pa'i yul 'di dag/ mkhar spyod ma yi gnas su brjod// phyi dang nang dang yang dag gnas// nyi shu rtsa ba ni daphye ba yis// sku gsung thugs kyi 'bar po yan// gnas rnams dag
273a2(rgyud): thams cad du// rnga rnams kun ni yang dgra bshad// yul 'di rnams ni bu mos gang // rtsa'i gzugs kyis gnas so nas// dpa' bo kun dang mnyam skyong ba'i// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// 
273a3(rgyud): dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// slar yang bsdus te bshad bya ba// de ni bdag gis bshad kyis nyon// pul+li dang mal lang zod pa'i dum bu can dang rab tu gtum ma ste// sod
273a4(rgyud): sen ma 'bab pa'o// dz+wa la n+da ra keng rus chen po dang gtum mig ma ste// skra dang ba spu 'bab pa'o// a Ta la ner gang rus dang 'od ldan ma ste// pags pa dang dri ma 'bab pa'o// ar bu de mche ba rnam pa
273a5(rgyud): rang sna chen ma se/ sha 'bab pa ste/ gnas so// god pa der lta'i sla dang dpa' ba'i brom ste/ thams cad du ni rgyas pa 'bab pa'o// rA me shwa rer 'o dpag med pa dang mi 'thung ma gre rus pa'i phreng ba 'ab pa'o// 
273a6(rgyud): bi ko Ter rdo rje'i 'od dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste/ rtag tu mchin pa 'bab pa'o// mal bar rdo rje'i lus dang ljon grib ma ste/ skeng phrug 'dab pa ste nye ba'i gnas so// de ltar bstan pa 'deng
273a7(rgyud): thug kyi 'khor lo mkha' spyod de// skams par zhugs pas yang dag gnas// kAm du bar ni myu gu can dang sa srung me ste/ rtag tu mig 'bab pa'o// o Tar ne rdo rje la pa can dang 'jigs byed chen
273a8(rgyud): mkhris pa 'bab par grags pa ste ning ngo // tri sha ku ni dpa' bo chen po dang rlung gi shugs ma ste/ glo ba 'bab pa'o// ko sa ler rdo rje hUM mdzad dang chang 'thung ma ste/ rgyu ma'i phreng ba 'bab pa
273b1(rgyud): nang ngo // kalang kar na shin tu bzang po dang stobasangs lhams/ rtsib logs kyi sngal ma 'bab pa'o// lam pA kar ni rdo rje bzang po dang shin tu bzang mes/ bang bu rnams lhur lce 'bab pa'o// 
273b2(rgyud): ter ni 'jigs byed chen po dang rta rnam ste// bi shang ba 'bab par grags so// he me la lar ni mig me bzang dang khra gdong ma ste/ mchogs ma'i srubs 'bab pa'o// nya ba'i ralas ro// gsung shi 'khor
273b3(rgyud): los spyod de/ snyoms par zhugs pas yang dag gnas// pre ta bu rin ni stobs po ma dang 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ste/ thams cad du pad kan 'bab pa'o// gri ha de btang ni rin chen rdo rje dang du skyes ma ste/ rtag
273b4(rgyud): gang bab pa'o// 'dun sa'o// sor gyur ni/ ta mgrin dang grang rnam ste/ rtag tu khrag 'bab par grags so// su brna di bar nam mkha'i snying po dang 'khor lo'i gocha ma ste/ de bzhin du rdul 'bab pa'o// 
273b5(rgyud): pa'i 'dun sa'o// nAg rang me b+ha'i dgra dang shim tu dpa' mo ste/ tshi la 'bab pa'o// si na'i yul du ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phrag ma dang / stobang chen ma ste/ rtag tu mchi ma 'bab pa'o// dur khrod do// 
273b6(rgyud): rung rnam par yang mjed dngal bar lo sngar ma sa/ mchil ma 'bab par grags so// kul ter ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang brtson 'grus chan ma se/ snabs gzhon nu 'bab pa'o// nye ba'i dung tha~Mng ngo // sra la
273b7(rgyud): kha sa 'os dog sa sa sas pa rnags shegs pa' 'grog na dang mnyam gang bal// dzam pa' ga bde ba mtshag/  rje sems depa 'di bani na gshegs// bcom pa dngo
273b8(rgyud): gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal pa chen pa pa lang rjem pa' 'grol sa/ dpa' bo gnyis sa med pa' gnas pasan pams pa'i dam par byabs/  // de nas las kyi ba ga
274a1(rgyud): / bkun gyi dam pa ste// gang yang grub par byed pa'i sngags// de yi dbye ba'irim bzhin bshad// yi ge pho nya la sogos sngags// mnga' yi shugs kyis yongs su 'khor// sprul pa'i 'khor
274a2(rgyud): dbus su ni// sde can brgyad kyis shin du bskor// sngags rnams thams cad 'byung ba ste// gzhan yang ci yang rung ba ste// chos kyi 'khor lo nas bya ba// lus can rnams kyi snying dgar byed// sku
274a3(rgyud): dag ldan// ya ra la was rnam par klubs// longs spyod 'khor lo zhes bya ba// ro rnams kyi ni rten rang bzhin// cha rnams bzhi po dag gos ni// kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o// 
274a4(rgyud): na po'i 'khor lo cha// byang chub sum cu gnyis dang ldan// b+ha ba nyam zhes bya ba// g.yon dang g.yas kyi ngos gnyis su// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// 'grod nga 'ong bar nges par brjod/ 
274a5(rgyud): gnyis la ni mnyam par zhen// 'og dang steng du yang dag brtan// g.yon dang g.yas kyi ngos gnyis su// dbyangs yig bcu gnyis steng bltas bris// ka sogs rog tu bltas pa ni// ngos ga
274a6(rgyud): dag tu spel ba ste// dbus su des 'i sbyar bar bya// daltar bstan pa 'di dag ni// rtsa dang smra yi rang bzhin no// gnyis mang ye shes rdo rje ste// mkha' 'gro sgra yi rang bzhin no// ngas 'byung sangs rgyas
274a7(rgyud): mas cad de// gang du ste ba zhes byar grags// shin tu rnam dag ye shes che// lham kun gyi rang bzhin gang // rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ste// mchog tu bde ba brjod pa yin// 
274a8(rgyud): bzugs 'di byed// spod nga srung par byed pa'o// yig pa nya la so gas sngags// der na cha dang bral ba gang // blag dbus su gzugs med pa// de ni rtag tu gnas pa yin// srin dgyi
274b1(rgyud): 3// bcu drug srung bas bskor ba yin// shes rab thabs kyi mnyam sbyor gyis// kha spyor zhes byar brjod pa yin// lag gnyis kun tu 'khrud pa yin// rdo rje phra gu rgyud cings brjod// slar yang rnam par
274b2(rgyud): grol ba lam// 'beb pa'i tshigs ni mchog tu dag la// sbyor ga bsgyur nyid deng ni// rngon na gro rgyu dngu bzhed// rdo rje pad+ma bye ba dang // smon tung spang rjertsi byed par bshad// skar ba gang phyir bstod pa ste// bded
274b3(rgyud): thabs kyis kun rig pa'o// dga' dang bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis// zhag pa pad+mor bcug pa yin// chags pa lcags kyu lon ste// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug/ mi 'khrug rdo rjes dkrug par
274b4(rgyud): de gsal shing zhes byar brjod// de nas chags so/ nyon mongs rtse// bag chags dum bu nyid du bya// shin tu rgya cher dmigs pa yis// kur rdzob de bzhin brdung ba dang // dngos kun rdo rjes med par bya
274b5(rgyud): sabyede bzhin gshegs// ji ltar bstan kyang de dbus su// rtag stod byin dang sdud pa po// de na de nyid ces bya ste// rang 'byung gcig gis khyab pa'o// gang man sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sna
274b6(rgyud): gas pa ste// gsang ba mchog gid gyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid gang gnas pa'o// 'din tshun mkhyen nas bya ste// kun tu 'gro ba pa bshigs pa'o// pad+ma yi na swa rtse ru// chu dang po ts+tsho kur
274b7(rgyud): phyi rol yi ge spangs nas su// yid kyi bzlas dang lnga yang bya// reng pa'i go 'phang rtag tu gnas// bstan pa chos dbyings rang bzhin no// rtag tu phra ba rdul dang bral// ye shes skye ste dri me med
274b8(rgyud): lab chos kyi rang bzhin shes/ mya na 'das pa 'ba' zhig/ yul// phan tshun mdud pa'i gsang sngags ni// bye brag tu ri phye nas su// sa bon phreng ba de nas sgom// hUM gi srud pas bkru bar bya/ 
275a1(rgyud): / bya 'gog par gyur na ni// gom pa gnyis kyang mi 'gro'o// 'di yi shes rab lhan skyes te// de yi gzugs su gyur pas gnas// las kyi rlung gis bskyod nas su// lte ba'i dkyil
275a2(rgyud): 'khor 'di nas 'bar// sku mchen po zhes byar bshad// las rnams thams cad bsgrub pa'o// srartse brgyar gyur pa ye cha// skad cig glog gi 'od zer cani// lha yi rnal 'byor dus su ni// pa sdu
275a3(rgyud): rnams kyi bu ga nas// phyogs bcu rnams su spros nas ni// lha dang lha min kun bsdigs te// snying ka'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni// bsregs te longs spyod 'khor lor song // sna bug g.yas nas
275a4(rgyud): nas ni// slar yang zhugs te sbyin mtshams kyi// mdzod spul khung nas byung nas su// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi// sna skra g.yon du zhugs/ 
275a5(rgyud): das ni// spyi bo'i 'khor lo ba sregs nas su// sngon gyi lam nas sgrar dbyung ste// slar yang spyig tsug tuni grags// bsregs par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// dga' bskyed nas lta ba yi// dkyil 'khor
275a6(rgyud): nisong gyur nas// sngon bzhin du ni gnas par gyur// dus min 'chi ba las rgyal nyid// yon lag kha T+wAM ga dang sbyar// thod pa'i mchod lon snod du ni// zhal du mchod yon nges sbyar zhes// mkha' 'gro kun dang
275a7(rgyud): mnyam sbyong ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rje zin gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mo par 'gro las sku gsum dang
275a8(rgyud): sngags dang rgyud kyi 'byung ba dang/ 'chi ba bru ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba snyed colnga pa'o// / de nas dngos gru ba kun gyi gnas// gsang po mchog ged gyes pa ste// yid 'ong bdud ni kun gyi
275b1(rgyud): sems can kun la bde ster ba// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mi sargyas// bla dam pa khros pas 'bar// 'dab stong ldan pa'i pad+ma che// stong ba gdan la bdugs pa la// deng ni lha mos nus gyur pa// 'khor lo
275b2(rgyud): nges pa dang // dbyangs rnams kyi ni bye brag dang // yi ge'i dbye ba mi 'tshal te// 'khor lo grangs rdo dze ska bu// de rnams las ni tsazhig lags// sna tshogs klu yi sngags dang ni// 'phrul 'khor dag ni mang
275b3(rgyud): bsdus dang // 'khor lo'i dbang phyug dus dang ni// de bzhin dpa' bo rnams kyi stan// 'di dag la ni the tsom mchis// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa// rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa gang // de dag
275b4(rgyud): thams cad zhu 'dod pa// legs so lags so lha me che// blo gros chen mo legs so legs// mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad kyang // be com spyan gzhan ci smos// sgyu ma kun tu rnam 'phrul pa// nyon cig 'a
275b5(rgyud): che// gang rdeg bres pa tsam gyis ni// sprang pos dngos grub thong 'gyur ba/ mdor bsdus nas ni brjod bya ste// de ni bdag gis pashad kyis tshon// gan sa dang dmer bar rtag gyur nas// khyad par du rig
275b6(rgyud): sprin// tsa ru'i baba' ba lhan cig bya// sgrub pa po yis g.yon nas bskor// 'di las sgrub po phun la ni// ma mo dga' gyur the tshom med// de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni// 
275b7(rgyud): brtson chen 'khor lo sgyur ma dang // spobs chen mdang rab dpa' mo// 'khor lo go cha greng snu ma// paN+Da ro ha 'khor lol shugs// phyag dong ma dang rtan mo// shin tu bzang mo sngo sangs mo// cher 'thung mang
275b8(rgyud): gas ma// de bzhin 'jigs byed chen mo dang // sa srungs ma dang ljon grib ma// lang ka bdag mo ma'u thung mo// dpa' bo'i blam sna chen mo// 'od ldan pa dang gtum mig ma// rab gtum ma ste srung
276a1(rgyud): yin// mtha' 'grom ze nyi mu ba ni// 'di dag sngon nyid grub pa yin// rang ming brjod pa'i sngags la ni// mtha dz+ra drwa bcu chub g.yon thams cad gal la byed do// grub gsol 'dod pa/ 
276a2(rgyud): thams cad la// rnal 'byor dam mchog 'di mthong // gzhan dge snying po med du ma tshungs// dpera' bo nyid gur grub pan// dpal lda te drug pa ni// dkyil la por dam pa mthong bas yin// de nas de shes
276a3(rgyud): rtag bsgom pa// dngos grub de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// nyon cig lha mo shes rab can// rig pa'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i thabs// 'khor lo chen po rmad gyur pa// gdengs ka'i dbang phyug ces bya ste// 
276a4(rgyud): thos pa tsam yis sregs byed ni// ming dang ldan par bris pa yis// gdengs ka thams cad smos pa dgos// dbab ldan nas ni brtsams nasas// klu rnamasas bon las byung ba// rin chen dang ldan gdengs
276a5(rgyud): ma la'o// gzhan yang phyogs ni kwin Na bsam// de nas 'khrur 'di ba zhes te// shang du k+Sha maM par drubye// nub te ste byang du // gshin rje hUM zhes bye ba bri// gzeg mi yi dgas sa// srin po kyi ma jiska/ 
276a6(rgyud): / rlung ni si li si li the// me yi phyogasasu de 'i nyid// dang por rab gtam mnas ni// brtson chen ma yi mthar thug pa// sngags 'di dag ni byin gyis brlab// 'khor lo 'di ni skal chen ldan// dgra rnams kyi ni/ 
276a7(rgyud): nad dgacod pa// hUM phaT ces bya spel ba yi// bslab bya de yi dbus su bre// lan cig bzlas pa'i gu gul gyis// 'jug pa nyid du sbyar byas la// kla rnams thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur// lag pa g.yon pa la 'a
276a8(rgyud): dngos su'am yid kyis bris la sngags lan cig bzlas par bya bas na 'che bas dus su zin pa slob par byed do// kar ba ra' mdab ma 'khubs kar bi rar smyug lus bris te/ lan cig bzlas pas reg
276b1(rgyud): nams gang du 'ad padang pheb 'gyur so// ga da kyikyi lagyis// thos dgasod pa gru so//  bgrags pa mags pa ma thangs sa pas de byung po'i nyim 'ded kyis 'khong ba
276b2(rgyud): lan cig bzlas pa des gang la bstan pazung bar 'gyur ro// sa ko ta'i rgyag sus sngags tshogs ma bzhin gyis / tshal ba la mngon par bsngags te/ gang pa bstan bde gapas bzung bar 'gyur ro// 
276b3(rgyud): som pas shing leb bam brtsi ga sa la 'byung po mtshan mo gang gi snying gi ming bris pa de gdon chen pos bzung bar 'gyur ro// bsgru ba bya'i gzugs byas la/ de'i skang kar 'phrul 'khor bcug ste/ 
276b4(rgyud): sdeb tshu ma du banaganas/ a ti sreg tsa thugs pa bdun pasngags tad ma ldan na/ zhig 'dun gyi lan rlung gi thugs kyis ri bar gyu'o// 'khong lo de nyid bye brag da dung khrod kyi sul 1
276b5(rgyud): zag klangs thas las kyi ga gan ci ba sgrub par bya'o// ke gas sa nga gnyis kyi dang nupa lag pa mngon par phyogs te sngags kyi nas bsreg pa me
276b6(rgyud): srid mchog pa dang byu du blangs pa reg pa'i rgyal ba lan bden bzlas nas gang neganan tu la ba rjo na/ de de'i mdal rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur te// skyes pa'i lalam pe la pa la dang ma
276b7(rgyud): gangag ming bris pa'i do dom bcings par 'gyur ro// drang srod kyings sam/ blam tshan gyi ngas la shing sa sho ga'i sdug gus kyu mas spangs pa'i 'khor lo'o bras pa/ de dbus su sngags pas chag bzhi yin/ 
276b8(rgyud): medang spes ba kres na/ mkha' 'gro ma'i byed par sems cid dang / lus sprul po thams cad bcings par 'gyur pa/ zod pa la skyes pa la khrag gis gang gi mi bris la sngags pa khro ba dang bcas pas sngags
277a1(rgyud): / nad de'i grag sa grags par byed la med na padang ldan pas nebs sngags bzlas na sla gtor bar 'gyur ro// 'khong sod nyid zlabs brtan cing gsas khar go ro nas phyogs skangs
277a2(rgyud): bres te/ thad ma gang gis rtagaN+Da bcangs na rig pa'i rgyal ba nyid de sums sa rmugs par 'gyur ro// brad med dang ni ba'i 'dus pas kun tu spyod pa'i mo mchog de'i lag ci lan phod pa'i dpa pa gang gi
277a3(rgyud): rami nus la/ rnam pa de lta bu'i cho ga dang ldan pas ni dngos grub thams cad kyi 'bras bu lte bgang gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di la ni brtul zhug pa da spyod pa bya snang ba dang / chog med par dpang cho ga zhi ba ma
277a4(rgyud): ba'i tshul 'di nyid kyis las thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhir byed do// nam mkha'i dkyis kyi lus pa las la// zla ba'i dkyil la po dpa' ste// 'od zer tshogs ni gsas pa'i mdangs// 'khong ba phreng
277a5(rgyud): ba rnam par klubs// de dbus 'kho ba po rtsibs brgyad dang // pad+ma'i dra bas shin tu mdzes// sla bsapal po snying ra'// dzoHphreng ba rnam par 'bo// sngagasang thugs kyi rdo rje yi// dkyil 'khor dkyil
277a6(rgyud): 'khor lda yin// nam mkha' thams cad g.yog byed ba// rang gi lus las spo ra bya// dkang dang dam brjod paste// kha dogs tshad bye bragahA// / bya 'i chon 'di las ne// dpa' bo

294a2(rgyud): thob ste// dgra rnams thams cad zad byed 'gyur// bgegs rnams ma lus bslad pa dang // 'dod pa kun gyis 'bras ster bar // 'gyung ba 'di la the tsam yang // chog spyod pa de nyid gas// 
294a3(rgyud): rnams kyi bsgrub thabs mchog/ sor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis// gza' rnams kyang ni bsgrub par 'dod// a san ti thin k+Sha tra gra ha mang+ga la bAHswA hA/ gza' thams cad kyi sogs so// oM nas
294a4(rgyud): dang pos// swA hA'i mtha' can byin brlab ces// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam ster ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa'ade bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis
294a5(rgyud): gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las 'byung po dang gdon thams cad kyi bsgrub thabs 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'ang
294a6(rgyud): lham rnams kyis mchod me phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// ye shes de nyid khyad par dang // lus kyi mtshan ma ji ltar lagaso// rtsa rnams gang la rten gyur dang // de rnams dbyeb
294a7(rgyud): 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che// sgyu ma kun tu rnam 'phrul pa// rtsa chen po ni sum cu gnyis// de dag gzhan las shi
294a8(rgyud): gtso// bcu dang gnyis ni de bzhin du// dbyangs rnams 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid de// yang ngomar ngo bya brag gis// nyi shu rtsa bzhir brjod pa yin// dus ni myur nga ring bdag/ yan ngag mtshan ma'i ma
294b1(rgyud): nyid de// gang zhig shes btsam gyis ni// 'chi ba'i'adras la bab pas gnas// dbugs ni rnam par dgod krur na// lus can drug dang gnyis kyi 'che// sA dror ha tA'i dus su// de'i mtshan ma mtshon par bya/ 
294b2(rgyud): ldadung rtsig gi gnas dang ni// 'gram pa dang ni rnapa'i rtsa// lce dang so ma mtsham ma dang ni// de bzhin mgrin pa'i phyi ma dang/ snying ka'i drang lci ba dang // brlad de byin pa de bzhin gzhan// chu so dang ni mtshan pa
294b3(rgyud): bgo dang spyi gtsug gi ni phyogs// dbugs ni chad cing chad gar pa'i// lus kyi mtshan ma myur ba ru// 'chi ba'i dus ni ston par byed// nyi ma'i grangs kyi tshad kyis ni// 'khor los dus kyi bdag nyid brtse// 
294b4(rgyud): gcig nas ni nyin drug tu// gang tshe dbugs ni chu gur pa// yon tan gsum gyi lo dag ni// zhag ni sum brgya drug cu ru// bgos pa yi ni tshad dang ni// mdor bsdus na ya ni bstan par bya// lo gnyis
294b5(rgyud): bdag/ ngas kyi grangs su bstan pa dang // nyin nigadog ni bco brgyad du// de yi tshad ni yang dag brjod// nyi ma dge rlobadud dang mtha'// gal te rlung ni rgyu gyur na/ lo gnyis dang ni de bzhin du// zla ba drug tu
294b6(rgyud): 'gyur nye// nyi ma brgyad du rlung brgyan// de bzhin log nyis zla ba ni// rig byed kyi ni grangs dang ni// nyi ma nyi shu rtsa ba'i ru// 'aro 'gyur dus kyi grangs yin no// gal te nyin dgu rgyu gyur na// la gnyis zab
294b7(rgyud): dang ri// nyan nag nyi ma'i grangs su ni// lus can rnams kyi stong ba yin// gal te nyin bcur rgyu gyurar// le gnyis las ni mi 'chi'o// gal te nyin zhag bcu gcig tu// sgo gcig nas ni rgyu dag/ 
294b8(rgyud): khad gud me nyen zhag par 'chad dag las ni// ma'i tshe mdzes ma khyod la bshad// nyin zhag bcu gnyis rlan ni// lo gcig dnga'i zla ba ni// dbyangs kyi grangs dang nyi ma nag ni// dus kyi grangs
295a1(rgyud): 'tsho'o// gal tenyi ma bcu gsum du// g.yas kyi lamanas rgyu ba ni// log cig dang ni zla ba dag/ rig byed kyi ni grangs dang ni// nyi ma dgra las me 'tshozhes// mdzes pa'i gdong can kyang
295a2(rgyud): ba // ga pa bdun phrag gnyisas ni// g.yas kyil mnas nga // lagatsugan pa gnas dang na// namathun yi byed dag las// 'tsho ba ma 'gyur du las ni// tshache dnges par skar pa
295a3(rgyud): gang nag nyi ma lnga gsum du// g.yas kyi sgo nas rlung rgyun// lo gcig na ni gdon men// gang zhig brgyad phrag gnyis su // g.yas nas rlung ni chu ba dang // de yi cha chad nges pa dag/ zlab bcu dang
295a4(rgyud): ma ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhi dag las ni// mi 'tsho bar ni ngas bshad do// gal te nyin dag bcu bdun du// g.yas kyi lam nas rlung rgyun// de nas de yi tshe tshad ni// zla ba dgu dang nyin zhag ni// bco brgyad dag
295a5(rgyud): mi 'tsho bar// gdon mi za bar bshad pa yin// nyid 'ag bco brgyad rgyun ni// zla ba dag ni brgyad dang ni// nyin zhag nyi ma 'grangs su ni// de yi du ni bshad pa yin// gal te nyin drag bcu chu
295a6(rgyud): dri yi gzhor pa rgyu ba dag/ ji srid 'tsho ba bshad par bya// zla ba dag ni bdun dang ni// nyin dag dus kyi grangs pas ni// 'tsho bar mi 'gyur gdon maza// gal te nyin 'ganyi shu ni// sgrub byung
295a7(rgyud): na ni// de mi sreg ni 'gro bar 'gyur// gam po nyin dganyi shu gcig nyi mi'i ma nas rdung chu ba// zla ba lda dang nyi ma ni// nyi ma'i grangs las mi 'cho'o// nyan dag nyi shu ga nyi sas+thA nA// bra ba reg
295a8(rgyud): dang ni// nyin naganyi shu rtsa bzhi las// mi 'tsho bar de yang dag brjod// gal te nyin dganyi shu gsum// skra gcig nas ni rlung rtun// zla ba bzhi dang / ma ni// dus kyi grangs las me 'tsha brjod/ nyir
295b1(rgyud): bdi du cu ba dang / zla ba gsum dang nyi ma ni// bcugacig dag las mi 'tshe'o// nyin na gnyi shu sa rgyun// zla ba gsum las mi mtsho'o// de las gong ma sngar bstan pa'o// grangs las mdor bsdus shes par bya// bcwa
295b2(rgyud): dang gnyis kyi rtsi pa las ni// bar bar gyi ni bstan pa yin// cha dang cha yis rim bzhin du/ khar bar nyi ma gsal bar byas// blo dman rnams kyis rtogs bya'i phyir// dus de dag ni bshad pa yin// rnal 'byor pa
295b3(rgyud): ni dus// shin tu phra ba nges bshad pa// khams rnams snyoms pa'i lus la sa ni// de dag palta zhing yid ches bya// sgoni steng du ltas 'bab pa// sde yi bar sha char gyur na// nyin zhag bdun gyis the tshom med// 
295b4(rgyud): shas dgu ni yang dag gnas// de bzhin sgo ni steng bltas las// mig gi chu ni chad gyur na// nyi ma ldan 'chi bar 'gyur// cha shas bcu ni shes bya ba// steng du ltas te 'gro ba las// rna ba g.yon dang
295b5(rgyud): pa yi// ngos kyi mtshan ma dag las ni// nyin zhag gcig las mi 'tsho'o// cha shas bcu gcig gnas pa li// gsal bar ldeng du 'gro ba las// rna ba g.yas par rten pa yis// nyin zhag bco brgyad
295b6(rgyud): 'chang// cha shas bcu gnyis de bzhin gnas// lce'i skud pa nag mthong na// lus can dus kyi nyin zhag 'chi// cha shas bcu gsum sten pa yi// de bzhin steng du 'bar ba yi// steng 'og so ni 'a
295b7(rgyud): kAr na// 'byung ba dag ni ma lus 'dren// srog ni dus grangs nyi mas 'gro// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi rten pa ni// mgrin pa'i blo na gnas pa'i rtsa// steng du bltas pa zhes grags kyis// nyin nag lnga las
295b8(rgyud): tsho// cha shes bco lnga gnas pal// zhing dubyigs pa'i mchog de la// zang gi rdzab sa gyur//  khyed na gdon mapa// cha shas 'a drug rdzogs pa'i bdag/ lte ba'i dbus kyang snang bskas pa
296a1(rgyud): sen mo khrag ni med gyur na// nyin nag bcun yang dag nya la// slar yang cha shas baH bdun ni// gnas pa'i brla yi mtshan ma las// nyin zhag nyi shu bzhin// 'chi 'gyur
296a2(rgyud): gdon mi za// cha shas bco brgyad gnas pa yi// byin pa la ni gnas pa'i rtsa// de bzhin steng du bltas pa yis// nyin dganyi ma'i grangs kyis 'chi// bcu dgu yin che shas gnas// chu song
296a3(rgyud): nga bltas pas// de dang mnyam pa'i nyin zhag gis// 'chi 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med// cha shas nyi shu gnas pa yi// pho mtshan la ni gnas pa'i rtsa// steng du bltas pa mchog dbang phyug/ 
296a4(rgyud): mas nyim nu ga dus sde ni// grangs kyis 'chi 'gyur the tshom med// re mig bcu gnyis rtsis pa la// bar bar nyi ma bstan pa dag/ lo lo rim gyis de sbyangs te// bdun cu rtsa gnyis rim pa dang // yum / 
296a5(rgyud): drug bco brgyad kyi // zla ba la sogs gorim bzhin// rim gyis rim gyi sa dbri bar bya// lhag mar gang zhig zlar ba ni// bsdus te 'tsho ba'i dus su ni// lha mo chen mo shes bya zhes// 
296a6(rgyud): kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las rtsa dang /
